description.hltext_display: Neige / Retour � l'orange pour l'Aisne et les Ardennes
description.content:
Vingt départements de la moitié nord de la France, de la Loire-Atlantique aux Ardennes, ont été placés en vigilance orange par Météo France en raison de chutes de neige attendues mercredi en fin de journée.
Par ailleurs, la vigilance orange est décrétée pour la Moselle et le Bas-Rhin en raison de risques de crue. Les chutes de neige atteindront de 5 à 10 cm sur les départements de l'Ile-de-France, sur l'Aisne (02), les Ardennes (08), l'Eure (27), l'Eure-et-Loir (28), l'Ille-et-Vilaine (35), la Loire-Atlantique (44), le Maine-et-Loire (49), la Mayenne (53), le Morbihan (56), l'Oise (60), l'Orne (61) et la Sarthe (72).
La pluie traversera dans la matinée l'Aquitaine et les Charentes avant de remonter vers le nord où, en butant sur l'air froid, elle se transformera en neige sur le nord des Pays de la Loire et les collines normandes.
"Ces chutes de neige s'étendront en soirée et la nuit suivante au bassin parisien et aux Ardennes et pourraient être précédées d'un peu de verglas", prévient Météo France.
"Cet épisode neigeux débutera vers 18h00 sur le Pays de Loire, 19h00 sur l'Ile-de-France, 20h00 sur la Bretagne, le sud de Normandie et la Picardie", selon les prévisionnistes de Météo France.

description.hltext_display: Hockey sur glace: Anaheim sans Hiller s'incline à Buffalo
description.content:
Sans Jonas Hiller laissé au repos mais avec Luca Sbisa en défense, Anaheim a perdu toutes ses illusions d'entrée de jeu. Les Ducks étaient, en effet, menés 3-0 à l'issue du premier tiers. Dans la cage, le remplaçant Chris McElhinney a été crédité de 37 arrêts.
A Dallas, le Canadien de Montréal, toujours sans Yannick Weber écarté, s'est incliné 5-2 devant les Stars.
Championnat de NHL. Les résultats de mardi: Buffalo Sabres - Anaheim Ducks 5-2. Columbus Blue Jacket - Carolina Hurricanes 3-1. Washington Capitals - New Jersey Devils 5-1. Atlanta Thrashers - St-Louis Blues 2-4. Dallas Stars - Canadien de Montréal 5-2. Colorado Avalanche - Los Angeles Kings 0-5. San Jose Sharks - Edmonton Oilers 2-1

description.hltext_display: 寄扬州韩绰判官
US food stamp dependency on the rise: 1 in 7 Americans rely on food stamps
description.author: John Atchison
description.content:
Everywhere around us are indications of just how bad the economy has gotten. Unemployment is still hovering at 9.8 percent, a number whose effects are etched across the entire landscape of this country. The lack of work causes many families to have to turn to avenues they otherwise might not explore if not for the sheer necessity of having to put food on the table. This is the reason then that the latest statistics show that 1 in 7 Americans are dependent on Food Stamps, a frightening statistic that is on the rise.
These two realities (unemployment and food stamps) are joined together. When unemployment rises, food stamp systemically seems to take the ride with it. However, this dependency level is not all about unemployment. Also a factor in this ratio is the fact that some states realize the plight of families within their boundaries and are expanding what they consider to be the poverty level in order to bring more families that are in a bad way to be included. It is a great thing to do and a sad fact that the dollar simply does not have the value that it once did.
A more careful inspection of the numbers though reveals even deeper problems if you can believe that. In some states, such as Tennessee and Oregon to name a couple, the ratio is actually 1 out of every 5 families are having to get by with the use of food stamps. Even the capital of this great nation is not immune to the problems plaguing the rest of the country. In fact, Washington D.C. actually has the largest part of its population on food stamps than does any other state. 21.5 percent are using food stamps, which means one- fifth of its people have to make due food wise with the amount they garner from food stamps.
However it is hardly a solution that people will be able to live on for any particular amount of time. According to statistics provided on the US Department of Agriculture, the typical amount of food stamps that a person is allocated a month amounts to 133 dollars. Some states fluctuate to a level a bit higher than this, but either total is extremely low. If youre a family of four, imagine what kind of groceries you can bring home with only 133 dollars a month? Simple staples are really all that youre going to be able to afford.
The government is doing what they can to help those in need as well. This can be seen in the actions of the 2009 stimulus package when it pumped in more than 10 billion dollars into the Food Stamp Program, thus giving it the opportunity to assist more families in need for longer periods of time. However, it also should be noted that the government includes those types of outlays a stimulus to the economy because it is quickly put back into the economy. Still, don't think that is what Americans had in mind when they are being told that the economy is doing better because these are artificial quick fix numbers.
Bottom line is that these food stamp dependency numbers spell out the fact that any talk of a rebound or being out of the recession at this point could very well be premature. When more jobs are provided and these numbers start to dwindle some, then it might be the case that the economy is on the rebound. Until then, Americans will have to make do with what they can.

description.hltext_display: 내년 그랜저 HG에 장착할 '신기술'
description.content:
현대모비스가 한지를 이용한 프리미엄 스피커를 개발하는 데 성공했다. 현대모비스는 22일 기존 스피커보다 환경친화적이고 맑고 청아한 소리를 재생하는 한지 프리미엄 스피커를 개발, 내년 1월 출시 예정인 그랜저 HG에 공급한다고 밝혔다.
이번에 개발한 프리미엄 한지 스피커는 닥나무에서 인피섬유를 추출해 만든 한지를 진동판 보디의 소재로 사용된 것이 특징이다. 또 진동판 보디를 본체에 고정시켜주는 엣지도 친환경적인 고무를 사용했다. 기존 스피커의 경우 진동판 보디가 알루미늄이나 폴리프로필렌ㆍ세라믹 등 금속ㆍ화학소재로 돼 있어 소각할 때 화학약품을 사용해야 하거나 유해가스가 발생하는 단점이 있다.
또 진동판 보디의 한지는 섬유장의 길이가 길어 중저역대에서 자연스럽고 안정된 소리를 낸다는 게 현대모비스 측 설명이다. 내구성이 좋아 소리의 손상이 적고 단단한 저음을 재생해 맑고 청아한 소리를 제공한다는 것이다.
인희식 현대모비스 연구소 상무는 "성능과 환경 측면에서 기존 스피커보다 우수하면서도 가격 경쟁력이 뛰어나 국내외 시장에서 해외 유명 브랜드와 경쟁할 수 있는 충분한 상품성을 갖췄다"고 말했다.
한편 프리미엄 사운드의 전세계 시장 규모는 약 3조9,000억원으로 추산되며 JBL, 인피니티 렉시콘, 하먼 카돈, 마크 레빈슨 등 유명 브랜드를 보유한 하먼인터내셔널이 45%를, 보스가 25%를 차지하고 있다. 국내 시장 규모는 약 2,000억원으로 현대ㆍ기아차는 하먼인터내셔널 제품, 르노삼성차는 보스 제품을 주로 사용하고 있다.
이에 대응하기 위해 현대모비스는 지난 2006년부터 프리미엄 사운드용 디지털 앰프와 스피커를 자체 개발, 2008년부터 그랜저(TG), 쏘나타(YF), K7, K5 등의 현대ㆍ기아차의 국내 및 미국 수출용 차량에 공급하고 있다.

description.content: 배우 임수� �이 22일 오후 서울 압구� � CGV에서 열린 `� �13회 디� �터스 컷 어워즈`에서 시네마 엔� �상을 수상하� 소감을 말하� 있다.`디� �터스 컷 어워즈`는 한국영화감독네트워크 300여명의 영화감독들이 2010년 개봉작 106편을 대상으로 투표를 통해 올해의 감독상, 연기상, � 인감독상, � 인연기자상, � �작자상, 독립영화감독상 등 총 6개 부문의 시상을 한다.[임성� 기자 tjdrbs23@]머니투데이가 만드는 리얼타임 연예뉴스� �보 및 보도자료 star@mtstarnews.com� �작권자 ⓒ 머니투데이 스타뉴스

description.hltext_display: Федерер ја доби првата пресметка со Надал
description.content: Рожер Федерер и Рафаел Надал го одиграа првиот егзибициски меч во Цирих, кој не наликуваше на таков, и кој го доби Швајцарецот со 4:6/6:3/6:3. Двајцата најдобри светски тенисери играат во т.н. "Меч за Африка", за своите добротворни фондации, и по првиот меч ќе се одигра и втор денес во Мадрид.

description.hltext_display: Boys' basketball: Momence stays unbeaten at Watseka
description.content:
ATSEKA - Momence won its sixth-straight game and stayed perfect at the Watseka Holiday Tournament on Monday.
The Redskins defeated Milford 70-27 to move to 3-0 at the tourney. If Momence defeats Beecher tonight, the Redskins will play for the tournament title Wednesday.
Deandre Wright led Momence (6-2) with 15 points. Lamar Watson finished with 12 points, and Ishawn Thomas had 10. ... Learn more about this story by subscribing to The Daily Journal's print edition or E-edition.

description.hltext_display: European shares edge up; ARM soars
description.content: LONDON, Dec 22 (Reuters) - European shares edged up in early trade on Wednesday, having hit a 27-month high in the previous session, and with Microsoft supplier, ARM, higher after media reports that Microsoft plans new windows for tablets. At 0821 GMT, the FTSEurofirst 300 index of top European shares was up 0.1 percent at 1,146.83 points, after rising 1.1 percent in the previous session to its highest close since September, 2008. "Investors will be happy to see the market close off the year with a decent gain," said Richard Jeffrey chief investment officer at Cazenove Capital Management. "There's a lot of macro information today that may influence people's thinking on 2011." Chip designer ARM rose more than 8 percent on reports Microsoft is planning new windows for tablets. Later, investors' attention will turn to U.S. economic data, such as home sales and GDP growth. (Reporting by Brian Gorman) Keywords: MARKETS EUROPE STOCKS/OPEN (brian.gorman@thomsonreuters.com; +44 20 7542 9128; Reuters Messaging: brian.gorman.thomsonreuters.com@reuters.net) COPYRIGHT Copyright Thomson Reuters 2010. All rights reserved.

description.hltext_display: BOYS' BASKETBALL: AHS goes old school on Dartmouth
description.content:
DARTMOUTH - The Attleboro High boys' basketball team may be in the Hockomock League now, but the Bombardiers did Tuesday night what they had done so many times before when they were in the Eastern Athletic Conference and briefly in the Old Colony League, and that's make the long trip home from Dartmouth High with a victory.AHS renewed acquaintances with the now non-league Indians Tuesday and moved to 3-0 overall with a steady, 69-53 victory.
Nate Robitaille had a big third quarter, part of a 23-point night, to help Attleboro gain some breathing room, the Bombardiers pulling away in the fourth quarter and down the stretch."This is what we've been able to do so far (in starting the season 3-0)," said AHS coach Mark Houle. "We've been able to defend the full court. We've done a nice job limiting teams to one shot and once we get the ball we're looking to push the ball. Plus it's been someone different every night stepping up at both ends."Robitaille's points were a game-high, but none were bigger than the eight he scored in the third quarter as the Bombardiers started to pull away. Robitaille also added four rebounds in that quarter while teammate Mahlik Johnson added five of his 13 points in the third."We opened up a nine-point lead going into the fourth and from there we continued the defensive pressure," said Houle. "I think up until then their 3-point shooting had kept them in it."Shawn Silva had a nice game off the bench for Attleboro with eight points and five boards while Houle also noted the strong defensive play of junior guard Chris Walsh.Attleboro returns to the court next Tuesday night (7:30) against North Attleboro as part of the North Attleboro Holiday Tournament.Canton 43, Foxboro 32FOXBORO - Warriors' coach C.J. Neely wasn't pleased with his team's effort, as a combination of turnovers, bad bounces and poor shot selection yielded only 18 points through three quarters."I'm pretty disappointed," said the coach. "All in all, we weren't ready to play the game. I'll take full responsibility for that."Foxboro (0-2) drew a number of late fouls, in particular Nick Couroupacis who led the team in free throw attempts for the second straight game. Along with Nick Ditullio, he led the team with 8 points.Canton's Chris Murray nailed a trio of first quarter 3-pointers and got hot again in the fourth, chipping in 9 more points for 20 total as the Bulldogs earned their first win in the Hockomock League game.The Warriors are off until the Nashoba Tech Tournament, Dec. 27-30.Norton 44, Ashland 30ASHLAND - In three quarters either Norton or Ashland was held to three or less points in this Tri-Valley League showdown. "It was a defensive struggle," said Lancers coach Marc Liberatore.Luckily, Norton thrives in such situations. Though being held to one point in the second quarter (the Lancers went 1-for-6 from the free-throw line), the Norton defense continued to dish out its signature rugged defense, putting the screws to Ashland in the fourth quarter.Junior Colin Feeney scored a season-high 21 points, 18 of which came in the fourth quarter. Feeney was riding the high of a 14-point effort against Hopkinton, and proved he can muscle in points from the paint."He's really building a lot of confidence," said Liberatore. "We really did a great job of getting him the ball."Norton (3-1, 2-1 TVL) plays Thursday night at home against Millis.Dighton-Rehoboth 84,GNB Voke 55REHOBOTH - Dighton-Rehoboth coach Bill Cuthbertson admits that there will be some defensive battles this season where 53 points might be enough to win a game. On Tuesday night, 53 points made for quite a first half.The Falcons rode the hot shooting of Dylan Barbosa and Ryan Walsh as they rolled out to a 53-23 halftime lead en route to victory in their South Coast Conference opener."Obviously we got off to a great start," said Cuthbertson, whose team nailed 12 3-pointers, a combined nine from Barbosa and Walsh. "We did a little bit of everything offensively, in transition, we hit some threes and halfcourt."Walsh led all scorers with his 24 points and five 3-pointers, 21 of his points coming in the first half. Barbosa was right on his tail with 23 points, four 3-pointers and 18 first-half points. Cam Montanino provided an inside presence with 11 points while Austin Fiero helped out with 10 points, Dighton-Rehoboth leading by as many as 37 points in the second half.D-R (2-0, 1-0 SCC) will visit Apponequet Thursday.

description.hltext_display: John William Martin III
Professora recebe prêmio por trabalho sobre queijo
description.content:
A professora do Departamento de Geografia da UFS, Sônia de Souza Mendonça Menezes, recebeu um prêmio no VI Concurso Latinoamericano e do Caribe de Experiências Exitosas en Agronegócios Rurais 2010, promovido pelo Instituto Interamericano de Cooperación para la Agricultura (IICA), com o artigo intitulado "Queijo Minas artesanal: el saber-hacer reconocido como patrimonio cultural e inmaterial".
O concurso, realizado entre os dias 11 de outubro e 18 de novembro, recebeu 14 fichas de experiências exitosas procedentes de 6 países: Argentina (5), Colombia (4), Honduras (2), Venezuela (1), Brasil (1) e Costa Rica (1). O trabalho da professora da UFS ficou em primeiro lugar.
O artigo é parte da sua tese de doutorado defendida no Programa de Pós-Graduação em Geografia em 2009, cujo tema é “A Força dos Laços de Proximidade na tradição e inovação no/do Território das Fabriquetas de Queijo Sergipano”. Esse trabalho já foi alvo de matéria em janeiro de 2010 da Agência UFS de Divulgação Científica; veja aqui.
Sônia Menezes explica que “ao pesquisar diferentes territórios queijeiros no Brasil, detectei que o avanço na produção no queijo Minas artesanal era como uma experiência exitosa no Brasil, fruto da ação política dos atores sociais que mergulharam nas denominadas 're-significações e nas re-identificações' que ativaram e fortaleceram o sinal do queijo minas artesanal”.
Com a premiação a professora recebeu um certificado e uma quantia em dinheiro. Para ela, este fato significa a valorização de uma experiência ou modelo implementado pelos agricultores familiares, juntamente com a rede institucional no meio rural brasileiro que permite a preservação de uma tradição enraizada. Segundo ela, a premiação é uma forma também de mostrar a qualificação dessa produção respeitando o saber-fazer arraigado num produto que é símbolo da identidade de uma população.

description.hltext_display: Acehnese Man Freed Of Drug Trafficking Charge
description.content: SHAH ALAM, Dec 22 (Bernama) -- An Acehnese man escaped the hangman's noose when the High Court here today acquitted and discharged him on a charge with trafficking in 7,269 grammes of cannabis last year. Justice Dr Badariah Sahamid made the decision after she was satisfied that Ishak Abdurrahman, 31, had succeeded in raising doubts against the prosecution's case. Ishak, who owns a barber shop, was charged with trafficking in the drug in front of the Tesco Supermarket, Jalan Setia Prima SU 13/5 here, about 12.30am on March 1, 2009. The offence, under Section 39B (1)(a) of the Dangerous Drugs Act 1952, carries the mandatory death sentence upon conviction. In her judgment, Badariah said the court accepted Ishak's testimony that he was arrested in front of his barber shop and not in front of the Tesco Supermarket as claimed by the police. The police, she said, also failed to investigate into claims by Ishak that the drug was found elsewhere and belonged to somebody else. "The testimony by the accused's wife and friend who saw the accused being arrested in front of his shop and saw him (accused) holding no drugs at all supported the accused's defence and failed to be challenged by the prosecution. "In conclusion, there were reasonable doubts whether the accused actually owned the drug," she added. Deputy public prosecutor Yeong Leu Shin prosecuted, while Ishak was represented by lawyer Ariff Azami Hussein. -- BERNAMA

description.hltext_display: 05:50pmDP World sells stake in local assets
description.content:
DP World Australia has sold the majority of its interests in Australia to Citi Infrastructure Investors and one other party for $1.5 billion. DP World Australia operates container terminals in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, Adelaide and Fremantle and has sold 75 per cent of its shares, but will retain an ongoing agreement to run the assets.
Formerly known as Dubai Ports, and backed by the United Arab Emirates government, DP World has sought to realise value from its Australian holdings since the start of the year and began serious discussions with Citi Infrastructure Investors in April.
DP World will retain management rights over the terminals and it is understood this agreement is ongoing with no end date.
In calendar 2009, DP World Australia generated equity-adjusted earnings before interest, tax, depreciation and amortisation of $96 million.
The transaction values DP World Australia at $1.8bn and is expected to complete in the first quarter of calendar 2011. We are delighted that Citi Infrastructure Investors are joining us as strategic partners in Australia, DP World chief executive Mohammed Sharaf said. We share a long term commitment to invest in and grow our terminals in the region over the long term, and together we look forward to building on our successful track record of operating container terminals in the region. DP World is advised by Deutsche Bank AG and Citigroup Global Markets. CII is advised by HSBC and UBS.

event_or_fact.property: We are delighted that Citi Infrastructure Investors are joining us as strategic partners in Australia

description.hltext_display: Денеска во комплетен состав
description.content:
Машката сениорска репрезентација вчера го имаше првиот собир, а утре ќе го игра и првиот од двата контролни натпревари со африканскиот вицепрвак Египет.
Македонската репрезентација на првиот собир се појави речиси во комплетен состав. Недостасуваше единствено Кирил Лазаров, но тој е дојден во Македонија. Причината поради која не се појави на прозивката во 13 часот, е затоа што пристигнал по полноќ и за да се одмори го пропушти првиот тренинг.
Иако сите играчи беа на прозивката, на тренинг не беа репрезентативците од Вардар. Синоќа Египет играше контролен натпревар со "црвено-црните", па селекторот Звонко Шундовски иако не му беше во волја, мораше да ги ослободи репрезентативците од Вардар. За среќа, нив ги има само тројца (Никола Маркоски, Милорад Кукоски и Борко Ристовски), па тоа не се одрази на квалитетот на тренингот кој требаше да се одработи.
Исто веројатно ќе биде и денеска, со таа разлика што и Кирил Лазаров ќе биде во составот.
Македонија в четврток и в петок ќе одигра два контролни натпревари со репрезентацијата на Египет, што ќе претставува централен настан на еднонеделното гостување на египетскиот состав во нашата земја.
Првиот натпревар ќе се одигра во Скопје, во 18:00 часот (засега стои дека тоа ќе биде салата "Кале"), а в петок ќе одигра контролен меч во Куманово.
Репрезентацијата на Египет ќе игра во Куманово и в недела, против домашниот суперлигаш. Цената на влезен билет за натпреварите кои ќе се играат во Куманово е 120 денари, а еден билет ќе важи и за натпреварот на репрезентацијата и за натпреварот со Куманово.
Египет е репрезентација која во јануари ќе настапи на Светското првенство кое ќе го организира Шведска. Македонија не избори пласман на мундијалот откако не ги мина ни предквалификациите во јануари годинава во Турција.
Во исчекување на новата квалификациска група, за мундијалот во 2013 година, Македонија продолжува со битката за пласман на Европското првенство кое ќе се одржи во Србија на почетокот на 2012 година. По две одиграни кола имаме 3 бода и големи шанси да се пласираме. Ќе играме уште четири квалификациски натпревари. Потребни ни се две победи и тоа над Естонија на гости и над БиХ дома. Другите два натпревари не можат да донесат голема промена (освен ако не победиме на двата), а ќе ги играме во март против репрезентацијата на Унгарија.
Токму за тие дуели се и овие подготовки, односно користење на можноста кога учениците на мундијалот се подготвуваат за настап на првенството, Македонија да одржи континуитет во работата со националниот состав.

description.hltext_display: B. De Wever oppose la Flandre à une culture latine des prébendes
description.content:
Le président de la N-VA Bart De Wever a opposé, dans un entretien au magazine Humo, une culture latine dans laquelle l'électeur tolérerait que l'autorité s'attribue des prébendes � une Flandre qui ne laisserait pas passer cela, a relevé mercredi Le Soir.
Au journaliste d'Humo qui lui rappelait un éditorial de 1994 sur l'affaire Agusta dans lequel Bart� De Wever soulignait l'urgence de l'autonomie de la Flandre face � la mentalité en vogue en Wallonie, le nationaliste flamand se défend d'avoir "dit que les Wallons avaient une nature criminogène". "Mais je constate que dans la culture latine, l'électeur ne réagit pas négativement quand l'autorité s'attribue des prébendes alors qu'en Flandre, on est pourfendu pour moins que cela. Regardez les résultats électoraux en Hainaut : rien n'a changé", commente-t-il.
Bart De Wever a donné cette interview le mardi 14 décembre, soit le lendemain de la publication dans Der Spiegel d'un entretien où il qualifiait la Belgique de "malade de l'Europe" et comparait les transferts Nord-Sud � une perfusion de drogue pour un "junkie".
Dans Humo, il se plaint également d'être "épuisé physiquement et mentalement" et affirme que "c'est très dur" pour lui. "Il faut une percée mais je ne sais pas si cela réussira. Et j'ignore les conséquences d'un échec. Cela me hérisse", dit-il.22.12.10 - 08:59 Le président de la N-VA Bart De Wever a opposé, dans un entretien au magazine Humo, une culture latine dans laquelle l'électeur tolérerait que l'autorité s'attribue des prébendes � une Flandre qui ne laisserait pas passer cela, a relevé mercredi Le Soir.

description.hltext_display: Donald Ray Dressell
description.content:
PALESTINE — Funeral services for , 67, of Palestine will be at 10 a.m. Thursday at Sacred Heart Catholic Church with Msgr. Zach officiating. Burial will follow in Roselawn Park. Arrangements are under the direction of Bailey & Foster.
Mr. Dressell died Monday in Tyler.
He was born Jan. 14, 1943 in Anderson County to Tony and Verna Huggins Dressell. He was a brakeman and conductor for Missouri Pacific Railroad and a member of the St. Vincent DePaul Society.
Mr. Dressell was preceded in death by his parents; a sister, Barbara Melton; and a brother, Paul Dressell.
He is survived by his wife, Gail Dressell of Palestine; daughter, Dana Lowe and husband Tucker of Fruita, Colo.; son, Donald Dressell Jr. and wife Ashley of Palestine; sister, Joella Hackett of Palestine; brother, Tony E. Dressell of Palestine; grandchildren, Raegan Lowe, Zachary Lowe and Madison Lowe; and numerous nieces and nephews.
Pallbearers will be Larry Miller, Steve Susdorf, George Torma, Bud Wacker, Ron Wood and Ray Jenkins. Honorary pallbearers will be Curtis Fitzgerald and Don Gage.
Rosary will begin at 6 p.m. today at Bailey & Foster Chapel.
He was a devoted husband and father and a faithful friend to many. He left a legacy of faith to his children and grandchildren.
In lieu of flowers, donations can be made to St. Vincent de Paul in Palestine or to a charity of choice.
To view online, leave condolences or sign guestbook go to www.baileyandfosterfuneralhome.com

entity.property: conductor for Missouri Pacific Railroad and a member

description.hltext_display: Cash Cow Heads for Greener Pastures
Firehouse adds first menu addition in two years
description.content:
Tags: Business Strategy and Profitability, Food & Beverage, Sandwich
12/21/10
Firehouse Subs has blazed a path for its new Turkey Bacon Ranch sandwich, the first menu addition for the chain in nearly two years.
The Turkey Bacon Ranch is made with smoked turkey breast, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese topped with peppercorn ranch and piled on a toasted sub roll.
This is the first addition to the menu since early 2009, when the chain introduced the Smokehouse Beef & Cheddar Brisket, a menu favorite. Prior to launching the Smokehouse Beef & Cheddar Brisket, Firehouse Subs had not added a new menu item in nearly 10 years.
"We take great time and consideration when making changes to our menu, and with confidence we are ready to introduce the Turkey Bacon Ranch, one of our best yet," said co-founder, Robin Sorensen.
Firehouse Subs was founded in 1994 in Jacksonville, Fla., by former firefighting brothers Chris Sorensen and Robin Sorensen. Today, there are 400 units across the United States.

description.hltext_display: MHS swimmers rout Mason City
description.content:
MASON CITY - The Marshalltown boys' swimming team will take a 4-1 dual record into the holiday break after scoring its first CIML Iowa Conference dual victory of the season, topping Mason City 58-36 on Tuesday night.
The Bobcats evened their league record at 1-1 by winning seven of 11 events and applying their depth against Mason City's smaller squad.
MHS established 15 new lifetime-best swims with 31 new season-bests, continuing to drop time despite the rigorous training according to head coach Mike Loupee.
"For this squad it's a real strong reflection of how hard the guys are working every day," Loupee said. "Again we figured this to be a very close meet but the guys just swam exceptionally well."
Mike Gettemy scored individual wins in the 200-yard freestyle and the 500 freestyle, establishing season-best times in both wins. Teammate Connor Dilger was second to Gettemy with his season-best in the 200, and Grant Hoffman accomplished the same in the 500.
Brian Bacon added two individual wins to the mix, going low in both the 50 freestyle (22.15 seconds) and the 100 backstroke.
Zach McLain had three lifetime bests according to Loupee, highlighted by his part in the Bobcats' runner-up 200 freestyle relay. MHS won both freestyle relays.
Dilger and Glenn Van Staalduine took a 1-2 finish in the 100 freestyle as well.
The Bobcats are off for the holiday break, returning to action Jan. 3 at Indianola.

event_or_fact.property: For this squad it's a real strong reflection of how hard the guys are working every day; Again we figured this to be a very close meet but the guys just swam exceptionally well.

SAN FRANCISCO, CA--(Marketwire - 12/22/10) - Melrose Jewelers (MelroseJewelers.com), USA's #1 online Rolex watch retailer, today announced its Last Chance Christmas Sale on select Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers is offering up to $200 off select Rolex Datejust watches, and up to $500 off select Rolex President watches in honor of the yearly holiday. The Christmas sale is going on now at http://www.melrosejewelers.com.
Since their inception, Rolex watches have been designed to last forever. In fact, it is quality and timelessness that have been and will be the hallmark of Rolex for years to come. In keeping with the Rolex tradition, there are few better ways to show your appreciation for a loved one than to bestow upon them a gift that will truly last forever.
In fact, AskMen.com ranks wristwatches #1 on their Top 10 List for the best Christmas gift ideas. Since a Rolex is the best watch available, and a wristwatch is the best Christmas gift idea, then buying a Rolex for that special friend or family member is a no-brainer. Furthermore, Melrose Jewelers makes this purchase affordable by selling completely authentic and fully restored pre-owned Rolex watches with a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee and a full authentication and appraisal by the Associated International Gemological Laboratory.
The Top Five Best Selling Melrose Jewelers on sale watch models are the: (Simply visit MelroseJewelers.com and enter the 3 digit code below into the search box)
1) Men's Silver Dial Beadset Bezel Rolex Datejust Super President (923)
2) Men's Champagne Dial Rolex Day Date President (292)
3) Men's Stainless Steel Black Dial Fluted Bezel Rolex Datejust (322)
4) Ladies Champagne Dial Rolex Super President (404)

The Christmas promotions on the Men's and Ladies Rolex watches include special discounts on the Men's and Ladies Stainless Steel Rolex Datejust and Two-Tone Rolex Datejust watches as well as the Men's Rolex Day Date President and Mens Rolex Day Date Super President watches. The sale is exclusive to Christmas and will only last for a limited time. Purchasing a watch from Melrose Jewelers also entitles you to free overnight shipping via FedEx to ensure that you have the watch in time for Christmas. Purchase a Rolex today in order to give a gift that will last a lifetime.
About Melrose Jewelers
Melrose Jewelers is the nation's leading online retailer of Rolex wrist watches including mens watches and ladies luxury watches and its associates have, collectively, over 220 years of experience in importing, restoring, and retailing Rolex watches and other luxury watches. Melrose Jewelers was founded with one simple premise: Buying Rolex watches or other luxury watches shouldn't be mysterious or complicated. Similar to the innovative yet simple business models of Progressive Insurance, CarMax, or Blue Nile, Melrose Jewelers provides customers with low, no-haggle pricing, luxury Rolex watches that are either new and unworn or pre owned and restored to original factory specifications both inside and outside, and a comprehensive 2-year warranty. Melrose Jewelers also employs a staff of top university-educated Trained Experts that provide customer service that extends from your initial sales call until years after you've received your purchase. Melrose Jewelers is a proud member of the Jeweler's Vigilance Committee, the Manufacturers and Jewelers Association of America, the International Watch & Jewelry Guild, the National Association of Watch Collectors, and the California Sheriff's Association. Melrose Jewelers uses only Conflict-Free Diamonds and those imported through the Kimberley Process as signed into act by U.S. Congress in 2003. Melrose Jewelers is not an authorized agent or affiliated with Rolex Watches, Rolex USA, Rolex S.A., Rolex International, Breitling, or Patek Philippe luxury watches. Rolex Day Date, Rolex President, Rolex GMT Master, Rolex Daytona, Rolex Oyster Perpetual Datejust, Rolex PearlMaster, Rolex Masterpiece, Rolex Super President, Rolex Submariner, Rolex Yacht-Master, Rolex Explorer and Rolex Sea Dweller are all trademarks of Rolex S.A. Melrose Jewelers' watches contain custom, aftermarket diamonds which will void the warranty of new Rolex watches. Melrose Jewelers warranties its watches directly and Rolex S.A. has no obligation to warranty any watches sold by Melrose Jewelers.
Melrose Jewelers, the leading online retailer of the Ladies Rolex President, also hosts the Melrose Jewelers (MJ) Rolex Watch Blog. The MJ Rolex Watches Blog is the world's largest independent forum website about Rolex events and Rolex and other luxury watches in pop culture. With over 300 user-posted articles and new articles and commentary updated daily, the Melrose Jewelers Rolex watches blog contains articles about Rolex watches owned and popularized by Barack Obama, Warren Buffett, Steve Jobs, Cristiano Ronaldo, Sienna Miller, Sean Penn, Courtney Cox, Andy Roddick, LeBron James, Tara Reid, Danica Patrick, Matthew McConaughey, Steven Wynn, Calvin Klein, Jamie Lynn Sigler, Eva Longoria Parker, Tobey Maguire, Michael Dell, Ashton Kutcher, the Jonas Brothers, Rafael Nadal, Roger Federer, Colt McCoy, Sam Bradford, who is an avid fan of the Rolex Daytona Adriana Lima, Arnold Schwarzenegger, Bill Murray, Barry White, Anne Hathaway, Michael Jackson, Tony Soprano, Lindsay Lohan, Eddie Murphy, Anish Kapoor, Tom Selleck, Jennifer Garner, Donald Trump, Jennifer Lopez, Lance Armstrong, John Mayer, Cameron Diaz, Justin Timberlake, Brad Pitt, Drew Barrymore, Matt Lauer, Sophie Marceau, Tim Tebow, Jay-Z, Zara Phillips, O.J. Simpson, Madonna, Ana Ivanovic, Jennifer Aniston, Paris Hilton, Orlando Bloom, Tupac Shakur, Cuba Gooding Jr, Lily Allen, & Wiley. description.hltext_display: โพลเผย นร.-นศ.ไทยดื่มเหล้ากว่า 3 ล้านคน!
description.content:
ภาพประกอบจากอินเทอร์เนต “เอแบคโพลล์” เผยนักเรียน-นักศึกษาจาก ป.5 ถึงปริญญาเอก ดื่มเหล้า 3,631,706 คน สูบบุหรี่ 1 ล้านคน นักเรียนนักศึกษาชายมีสัดส่วนของคนที่สูบบุหรี่และดื่มเหล้าสูงกว่านักเรียนนักศึกษาหญิง
ดร.นพดล กรรณิกาผู้อำนวยการศูนย์วิจัยความสุขชุมชน มหาวิทยาลัยอัสสัมชัญ เปิดเผยผลวิจัยเชิงสำรวจต่อเนื่องภายใต้โครงการวิจัยเพื่อเฝ้าระวังรักษาคุณภาพชีวิตเด็กและเยาวชนไทย เรื่องประมาณการตัวเลขนักเรียน นักศึกษาผู้ใช้ยาเสพติด จากตัวอย่างนักเรียนชั้นประถมศึกษาปีที่ (ป.) 5 ถึงนักศึกษาปริญญาเอก ทั้ง 76 จังหวัดทั่วประเทศ จำนวนทั้งสิ้น 21,572 ตัวอย่าง ระหว่างเดือนพฤศจิกายน-21 ธันวาคม 2553
ผลวิจัยพบว่า นักเรียนนักศึกษาชายมีสัดส่วนของคนที่สูบบุหรี่ และดื่มเหล้า สูงกว่านักเรียนนักศึกษาหญิง คือ ร้อยละ 15.8 ต่อร้อยละ 5.1 สูบบุหรี่ และร้อยละ 33.8 ต่อร้อยละ 27.9 ดื่มเหล้า
เมื่อทำการประมาณการจำนวนตัวเลขนักเรียนและนักศึกษาที่ดื่มเหล้าจากกลุ่มเป้าหมาย 9,240,981 คน พบว่ามีนักเรียนนักศึกษาตั้งแต่ ป.5 ถึงปริญญาเอก ดื่มเหล้า 3,631,706 คน และสูบบุหรี่ 1,090,436 คน
แต่ที่น่าเป็นห่วงต่อคุณภาพเด็กและเยาวชนของประเทศ คือ จำนวนเด็กนักเรียน/นักศึกษาตั้งแต่ป. 5 จนถึงปริญญาเอกที่ใช้ยาเสพติด ไม่นับรวมเหล้าบุหรี่ ยานอนหลับ ไม่นับรวมยาแก้ปวด พบว่า มีนักเรียนนักศึกษาที่ใช้ยาเสพติด 711,556 คน
ยิ่งไปกว่านั้น เมื่อจำแนกตามประเภทตัวยาเสพติดที่ใช้กันในกลุ่มนักเรียน/นักศึกษาตั้งแต่ป. 5 ถึงปริญญาเอก พบว่า มีจำนวน 316,110 ใช้กัญชา อีก 298,480 คน ใช้กระท่อม ใช้สาระระเหย 214,020 คน ใช้ยาบ้า 148,010 คน สี่คูณร้อย 134,480 คน ยาไอซ์ 100,040 คน ยาอี อ็กซ์ตาซี ยาเลิฟ 63,550 คน และใช้ยาเค เคตามีน 53,300 คน ที่เหลืออีก 65,880 คน ใช้ยาเสพติดอื่นๆ เช่น เฮโรอีน มอร์ฟีน โคเคน เป็นต้น
ประเด็นที่น่าพิจารณา คือ ผลการใช้หลักสถิติวิจัยพบว่า นักเรียน/นักศึกษาตั้งแต่ ป.5 จนถึงปริญญาเอก ที่สูบบุหรี่มีโอกาสเข้าไปเกี่ยวข้องกับยาเสพติดสูงกว่าเด็กนักเรียน นักศึกษาที่ไม่สูบบุหรี่ถึง 9 เท่า หรือ 9.052 เท่า และเด็กนักเรียนนักศึกษาที่ดื่มเหล้ามีโอกาสเข้าไปใช้ยาเสพติดสูงกว่าเด็กนักเรียนนักศึกษาที่ไม่ดื่มสูงถึง 4 เท่า หรือ 4.413 เท่า
นอกจากนี้ คณะผู้วิจัยยังได้ทำการสำรวจกลุ่มข้าราชการตำรวจระดับผู้กำกับ รองผู้กำกับและสารวัตรหัวหน้าสถานีตำรวจจำนวน 612 แห่งทั่วประเทศ พบว่าสิ่งที่น่าเป็นห่วงคือ ส่วนใหญ่หรือร้อยละ 69.0 บอกว่า อาวุธของขบวนการค้ายาเสพติดมีประสิทธิภาพมากกว่า อาวุธประจำกายของตำรวจ ในขณะที่ร้อยละ 31.0 ระบุว่า อาวุธประจำกายของตำรวจมีประสิทธิภาพมากกว่า ประเด็นที่น่าเป็นห่วงอย่างยิ่ง คือ ถ้าตำรวจประสบเหตุต่อสู้กับขบวนการค้ายาเสพติด ร้อยละ 34.4 ระบุมีปัญหาประสานงานล่าช้าจากทหารในการเข้าถึงที่เกิดเหตุ ในขณะที่ร้อยละ 32.6 ระบุมีการประสานงานล่าช้าในการเข้าถึงที่เกิดเหตุจากฝ่ายปกครอง ในขณะที่ร้อยละ 11.1 ระบุมีปัญหาประสานงานล่าช้าเข้าถึงที่เกิดเหตุจากทั้งฝ่ายทหารและฝ่ายปกครอง และร้อยละ 21.9 ไม่คิดเช่นนั้น
สำหรับข้อเสนอแนะพบว่า ส่วนใหญ่หรือร้อยละ 61.1 ระบุงบประมาณในการปราบปรามขบวนการค้ายาเสพติด รองลงมาคือ ร้อยละ 39.1 ระบุอุปกรณ์การตรวจสารเสพติด อาวุธประจำกาย ร้อยละ 14.9 ระบุความทันสมัยของเครื่องมือและเทคโนโลยีต่างๆ ร้อยละ 13.5 ระบุการเลื่อนขั้น เพิ่มสวัสดิการ รองๆ ลงไปคือ การปรับปรุงกฎหมาย สนับสนุนการปราบปรามยาเสพติดมากขึ้น เพิ่มความรวดเร็วเมื่อประสบเหตุ และกำลังพลในการปฏิบัติหน้าที่จากฝ่ายทหาร ฝ่ายปกครอง ยานพาหนะ ค่าน้ำมัน การอบรมด้านการใช้อาวุธ ให้ความสำคัญเด็ดขาดกับผู้ค้ายาเสพติด และวางนโยบายหลักในการปราบปรามขบวนการค้ายาเสพติดอย่างจริงจัง เป็นต้น
ผอ.ศูนย์วิจัยความสุขชุมชนกล่าวว่า “รั้วโรงเรียน” ตามแนวนโยบายของรัฐบาลอาจได้รับความพึงพอใจตามความรู้สึกของสาธารณชน แต่ในข้อเท็จจริงที่ปรากฏของผลวิจัยครั้งนี้ชี้ให้เห็นว่า รั้วโรงเรียนยังมีปัญหาเพราะปัญหายาเสพติดในกลุ่มนักเรียนนักศึกษายังมีให้ปรากฏอยู่เป็นจำนวนมาก และการทำงานเชื่อมประสานกันระหว่างหน่วยงานของรัฐที่เกี่ยวข้องก็มีปัญหา มีช่องว่างเกิดขึ้นในทางปฏิบัติ วัสดุอุปกรณ์ อาวุธประจำกายของเจ้าหน้าที่ก็ได้รับการยืนยันจากผู้ปฏิบัติว่าด้อยประสิทธิภาพกว่าอาวุธของขบวนการค้ายาเสพติด การเบิกจ่ายเบี้ยเลี้ยงไปถึงมือผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาต้องได้รับการตรวจสอบอย่างเข้มข้นว่า พวกเขาที่เสี่ยงภัยในพื้นที่เหล่านั้นได้รับเต็มเม็ดเต็มหน่วยไม่ตกค้างในมือของผู้บังคับบัญชาระดับสูง
“ดังนั้น รัฐบาลและกลไกของรัฐในทุกระดับต้องกระชับลดช่องว่างในการปฏิบัติการตามแนวนโยบายโดยในระยะสั้นน่าจะเร่งสนับสนุนการทำงานเต็มรูปแบบไปยังสถานีตำรวจทุกสถานีให้พร้อมรองรับการร้องเรียนจากสถาบันการศึกษาต่างๆ เพื่อ “เคลียร์” ให้จบในระดับพื้นที่ไม่ปล่อยให้ลุกลามบานปลาย เพราะปัญหายาเสพติดมันเกินขอบเขตความสามารถของผู้บริหารสถาบันการศึกษาจะแก้ไขได้เพียงลำพัง สุดท้าย รัฐบาลน่าจะลองพิจารณาให้การสนับสนุนองค์กรภาคประชาสังคมทำหน้าที่ตรวจสอบหน่วยงานของรัฐอย่างเข้มข้นอีกชั้นหนึ่ง” ดร.นพดลกล่าว
จากการพิจารณาลักษณะทั่วไปของตัวอย่าง พบว่าตัวอย่างร้อยละ 58.1 เป็นชาย ร้อยละ 41.9 เป็นหญิง ตัวอย่างร้อยละ 38.1 อายุต่ำกว่า 15 ปี ร้อยละ 42.7 อายุระหว่าง 15-20 ปี ร้อยละ 10.2 อายุระหว่าง 21-25 ปี และร้อยละ 9.0 อายุมากกว่า 25 ปีขึ้นไป ตัวอย่างร้อยละ 21.2 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับชั้นประถมศึกษา ร้อยละ 33.8 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับชั้นมัธยมศึกษา ร้อยละ 13.0 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับ ปวช. ร้อยละ 11.8 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับ ปวส. ร้อยละ 9.8 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับปริญญาตรี และร้อยละ 10.4 กำลังศึกษาอยู่ในระดับสูงกว่าปริญญาตรี

description.hltext_display: Swedish Government Decision On Guarantees To Volvo Cars...
description.content:
The Swedish government said it will present its decision regarding state guarantees for the European Investment Bank's EUR600 million loan to car maker Volvo PV at 1000 GMT, Wednesday.
Last week the European Union Commission officially approved the terms of the Swedish government's state guarantees to Volvo Cars, the Sweden-based car maker that is owned by China's Geely Automobile Holding Ltd. (0175.HK).
The EIB loans to Volvo are conditional on the Swedish state guaranteeing the entire loan sum in return for collateral provided by Volvo.
The previous negotiations for Volvo Cars' EIB loans were put on hold this spring when Volvo Cars was sold to Chinese automaker Geely. The Swedish government wanted a clearer picture of Volvo Cars' ownership structure before it continued negotiations.
Speaking to Dow Jones Newswires on Nov. 11, Volvo corporate spokesman Per-Ake Froberg said Volvo Cars plans to use the loans for a number of environmental projects that are either ongoing or about to be launched.
-By Jens Hansegard and Sven Grundberg, Dow Jones Newswires; +46-8-5451-3098; sven.grundberg@dowjones.com

event_or_fact.property: Volvo Cars plans to use the loans for a number of environmental projects that are either ongoing or about to be launched

description.hltext_display: What To Talk To Girls About
description.content:
Do you always find yourself stumbling into awkward silences in midst of long conversations with girls?
Do you often find yourself not knowing what to talk to girls about?
Well, not to worry!
For in this article, I will be discussing on what to talk to girls about.
Here are some tips on what to talk to girls about
1) Talk to girls about your dream and ambition.
Let the girl know your ambition and dream. Let her know what do you wish to achieve in life. By sharing with her your dreams and ambition, she will know that you are someone who has a purpose and direction in life and not some wandering bum leading life aimlessly.
2) Have a sensor of humour - Throw in a few jokes and stories.
Having a sensor of humour is definitely beneficial in keeping the conversation flowing continuously.
Share with her funny things that have happened in your life or funny jokes which you have heard from others.
Knowing when to include funny stories or jokes in midst of the conversation will trigger her to laugh and this is important as she will view you as interesting person to hang out with and will thus, hang out with you more.
3) Let her talk more about herself.
As quoted by The Dalai Lama "Sometimes one creates a dynamic impression by saying something, and sometimes one creates as significant an impression by remaining silent."
All girls are born to be talkative.
Therefore, don't be afraid to let a girl talk more about herself. Actively listen to what she says and be receptive to what she is saying Show interest to what she is saying. Let her know that you are a good listener and she will be more keen to share with you her problems and woes. Over time, her interest in you will increase gradually.
4) Play around - show her your playful nature occasionally.
This is an awesome technique to master, especially if your conversation has reached a stagnant point and you are totally clueless about what to talk about with her.
Throw in a joke or funny moment during awkward silences to get her laughing and lighten the mood.
Here is a good trick in tackling awkward silences.
Laugh to yourself when there is a moment of silence in the conversation. Your laughter will trigger her curiosity and will prompt her to ask you" hey, what are you laughing about, care to share? " When she ask you this, you reply in a sneaky way that will trigger more of her curiosity hormones, " Nah, nothing much, you won't want to know, is a guy thing." She will then respond, " tell me, I want to know! ". So there you go, an awesome technique to lighten the mood.
It will also show that you are someone who is a relaxed, and not too serious person - a characteristics which girls like.
There are thousand and one topic to talk with girls.
However, knowing what to talk with girls about will up the attraction meter she have towards you.
Therefore, do keep these tips on what to talk to girls about during your next date with your dream girl the next time.

description.hltext_display: Under the sea (133)
description.content:
Commercial diver Roger Hermansen believes he was "internally wired" to be a professional diver.
Umpqua Post/Deborah Yates
Commercial diver Roger Hermansen believes he was "internally wired" to be a professional diver.
Previous Next
Photo 1 of 3
Wednesday, December 01, 2010 | No comments posted.
Kmart? Scuba gear? Who would have thought?
Back in 1972, in Utah of all places, Kmart sold U.S. Divers brand scuba gear, including tanks, regulators, and basic gear needed to take a person beneath the surface of a body of water. Roger Hermansen, owner of Orca Divers in Winchester Bay, was 15 years old then, when he and his best friend Eric Ness chanced upon this amazing discovery.
“I grew up in the suburbs of Salt Lake City,” Hermansen said. “When Eric and I saw the scuba gear at Kmart, we rushed to the nearest telephone book to find the closest scuba diving school.”
The boys found a school in downtown Salt Lake City. Attending that school was so important that they rode their bikes to the diving classes.
“We were so young when we took up diving that we were considered junior divers,” said Hermansen.
The boys spent as much time as they could learning to scuba dive.
“After months of training, we were allowed to travel to Monterey, California for our open-water class.” Hermansen said. “If we passed the class, we received our diving certification.”
For Eric, this meant adventures in nearby lakes and an occasional ocean dive. But for Hermansen, it meant a career and a whole new way of life.
The summer following their certification, Hermansen hauled hay on his grandparents’ farm.
“I made $150 a month,” Hermansen said. “I saved every penny. My grandmother wanted me to purchase school clothes, but I spent every cent on diving gear.”
After Hermansen graduated from high school, he went on the become a welder and pipefitter. His on-the-job training gave him experience with steel fabrication and the various methods of welding.
In 1995, he attended commercial diving school in Seattle.
“I was the oldest student in my class by about 10 years,” Hermansen said. “I attended the school not only to learn about underwater welding, but to become eligible to purchase the proper insurance for my business. This insurance allows me to work on any kind of construction project whether it’s on the surface or underwater.”
Hermansen likes all phases of his work, but construction is his very favorite.
“I like construction best because it is a planned project with a positive outcome,” Hermansen said. “Salvage, on the other hand, is crisis-oriented. The outcome of the project is never predictable.”
Helmets, rather than scuba gear are used for commercial diving. Helmets provide the diver protection that is not afforded by scuba gear.
“Using helmets provides fresh air from the surface,” Hermansen said. “They also allow communication with the surface. If the diver is doing anything critcal, it is important to be able to talk with the crews on the surface.”
The other advantage of helmet diving is that a physical line is attached to the diver.
“If anything goes wrong, we can follow the air hose directly to the diver,” Hermansen said. In the dark, cold, murky environment in which they work, he added, finding a scuba diver is nearly impossible.
Due to the cold water temperatures, which are often around 40 degrees, Hermansen wears a wet suit and/or a dry suit with his helmet.
“We no longer wear the canvas diving suits and large helmets,” Hermansen said. “The helmets have changed over the years. They are now much more comfortable to wear.”
Hermansen must always be aware of the laws of physics when he dives. He must carefully calculate his bottom time, depth of water, work load, and time needed to return to the surface.
“Nitrogen saturation is an issue we must constantly be aware of when diving.” Hermansen said. Therefore, a decompression chamber is always on board the boat, work platform or located somewhere nearby.
The least favorite time of any dive for Hermansen is the time spent waiting on the surface of the water.
“That time between leaving the water and returning to the boat or work platform is when I feel most vulnerable,” Hermansen said. “There are things swimming in the water that I cannot see when I am on the surface. I am much safer when I am underwater.”
Hermansen has done all kinds of welding work around Winchester Bay and the greater Reedsport area.
“I can’t go out into the harbor or into town without seeing my surface work everywhere,” said Hermansen. “But it is the work that I have done working underwater that is my favorite. It is where my heart really is.”
Staff writer Deborah Yates can be contacted at dyates@theworldlink.com, or (541) 271-7474, ext. 206. This and other articles can be found online at www.theumpquapost.com

event_or_fact.property: In the dark, cold, murky environment in which they work
?We were so young when we took up diving that we were considered junior divers,?
?I can?t go out into the harbor or into town without seeing my surface work everywhere,?

description.hltext_display: IPO一年不到18公司十八变 烂项目凑数支撑超募
description.content:
根据《第一财经日报》不完全统计，类似杭氧股份这样的“变脸”公司不在少数。深交所披露，2010年有将近18家上市公司在IPO后未满一年的情况下，宣布更改募集资金投向，或更改项目，或更改实施地点。
IPO中最能显示企业融资需求的就是募投项目，投资者也正是相信企业需要资金去做大做强这些项目，才出钱支持企业上市。然而融资过后，公司突然告诉投资者，这些项目或已经投产，而且情况良好，不需要募集资金；或因为投资项目主体已经搬迁到另外一个城市；或是觉得此项目不如彼项目好，于是更换项目。
上海某投行人士告诉记者：“这个情况出现在创业板上市公司中还比较说得过去，因为创业板公司处于创业期，公司战略可能会变动较大。但出现在中小板企业就有些奇怪了，这些企业一般来说质地和公司战略都较为稳定。”
变更公告真相大白
在变更中，各公司讲的“故事”各不相同，但大致上分为以下几种：一、该项目已经完工投产，不需要资金；二、该项目的公司已经变了，因此改变实施地点；三、市场出现变化，有更好的项目可以投资。
这些公司中最为蹊跷的是杭氧股份，短短三个月就变更了投资项目。
该公司公告称：“首次公开发行股票募集资金投资项目‘河南杭氧气体有限公司新建20000m3/h空分工程’(下称‘河南气体项目’)于2008年4月开始实施，并于2009年5月完工投产。”
“该项目建设的主要资金来源为河南杭氧气体有限公司(下称‘河南气体公司’)通过银行借款融资10000万元，杭氧股份原计划利用募集资金对河南气体公司增资，并由河南气体公司利用上述募集资金归还银行借款，但因河南气体公司经营情况良好，目前已归还50%的银行借款，该公司利用自有资金可以归还全部银行借款，不会对其财务状况构成不利影响，因此，为提高资金使用效率，加快公司气体业务的发展速度，杭氧股份拟将原计划用于河南气体项目的募集资金13600万元转用于其他气体投资项目。”
记者查阅杭氧股份的招股说明书，该招股书中只在土地使用风险中提示过河南气体项目已经建成投产，未披露建成投产的时间。
但随后的募投项目介绍中，该项目一系列表述就变为：“依据《供气合同》的相关约定，公司拟利用本次发行募集资金，由河南气体公司负责新建1套制氧量为20000m3/h的空气分离设备”、“宏观经济形势不会对河南气体项目及吉林气体项目的可行性构成重大影响”、“未来两年内，本公司发展气体业务的具体措施包括……立足现有气体公司，合理布点，抓紧新建河南气体项目和吉林气体项目，并以点带面，逐步实现区域性集中供气。”
如此一来矛盾已经非常明显，在杭氧股份IPO的2010年6月，河南气体项目已经建成投产一年，何来所谓的“抓紧新建”？而从现在来看，对该项目的投资实际上是用来偿还贷款的，并非直接投资，招股书中没有详细披露用途。
另一位投行人士表示：“只要招股书中有披露就不算重大遗漏，是否误导了投资者则另当别论。”
变相超募
至于另外两种变更募集资金投向的原因，上海投行人士向记者表示：“项目变更是创业板的通病，创业初期调整比较频繁。中小板也频繁变更则比较奇怪。”
记者发现多数的变更募集资金事项企业都热衷于变更实施地点，而在实施地点中争议较多的集中在地价问题上，如卓翼科技(45.70,-0.10,-0.22%)(002369.SZ)的项目实施地点从深圳南山区搬到了松岗，梅泰诺(23.320,0.00,0.00%)(300038.SZ)的项目地点则从北京市西二环改到了北四环附近。这些区域的地价差异直接反映为项目的成本问题，在其他投资不变的情况下，这无异于变相“超募”了一部分资金。
“超募现象在IPO里面可谓屡见不鲜了，这种变相的超募实际上只是九牛一毛。”上述投行人士说，“这也是创业板一直不推出再融资办法的原因之一，各种超募的钱就够它们用上一段时间了。”
上海投行人士则向记者透露：“其实有些募集项目的规模在评估的时候就虚高了，往往是各地要求投资的强度，各企业在报项目的时候就掺杂了水分。”
多家上市公司IPO后旋即更改募投项目，再加上最近的胜景山河数据被质疑造假事件，保荐人在上市过程中是否尽职调查饱受争议。该上海投行人士表示：“长久以来，募投项目一直不是保荐机构在IPO中关注的重点，因此这一块经常变动，但以后关注点会逐渐向募投项目倾斜。”
另一位投行人士也说，“保荐人对于募投项目一般会委派律师看一看，就怕牵涉到一些法律问题，有时候自己也会亲自考察。但不可否认的是，有相当一部分保荐人对‘烂项目’还是十分疏忽的，有些项目只是拉过来凑数目的。”

description.hltext_display: Македонија игра пријателски натпревар со Кина
description.content: Македонската фудбалска репрезентација денеска во 12 часот и 30 минути по македонско време во Гуанг Жао ќе одигра пријателски натпревар против домашната селекција на Кина. Македонија во Кина не отпатува со најдобриот состав, бидејќи селекторот Мирсад Јонуз одлучи да им даде шанса за докажување на потенцијалните репрезентативци за следните квалификациски натпревари. И покрај тоа што репрезентацијата не е во најсилен состав од македонските фудбалери најавуваат позитивен резултат. - Овие фудбалери немаат претходно искуство кога е во прашање настап во Кина, но од она што можевме да го видиме очигледно е дека се работи за солидна селекција која игра добар и организиран фудбал. Денеска нема слаби репрезентации. По скромниот настап на претходното гостување време е да ја оствариме првата победа на кинеска територија. Се надеваме на фер игра и фер судење што ќе ни овозможи на двете селекции да се прикажеме во најдобро издание, изјави македонскиот репрезентативец и играч на белградски Партизан, Александар Лазевски.

description.hltext_display: Тутунарите револтирани, не се почитува постигнатиот договор
description.content:
Прилеп, 21 декември 2010 (МИА) - Тутунарите од Прилепско кои денеска го однесоа родот на пунктовите обвинија дека откупувачите ги манипулираат и не го почитуваат вчера постигнатиот договор, проценката да се врши во три класи, а просечната цена да биде околу 185 денари за килограм.
Количините што беа преземени достигнаа најмногу 140 денари.
Според Данчо Милески, претседател на Сојузот на тутунските здруженија на Македонија, по вчерашните четири часа убедување со откупувачите, очигледно ништо не се постигна. Тој побара од производителите до идната недела да не го носат тутунот на откупните пунктови.
- Ако вака продолжат фирмите, тутунот не го даваме. Ќе инсистираме на нова средба и не отстапуваме од она што го бараме – 185 денари просечна откупна цена. Тутунот е квалитетен, во регионот е намалено производството и на берзите постигнува цена. Затоа не може просечната да биде пониска од ланските 192 денара, рече Милески.
Тој информира дека во цела Македонија моментно, дневно се предава по само еден тон тутун. Тоа го прават производителите што мораат за да ги поминат празниците.
На вечрашниот состанок во Министерството за земјоделство тутунарите побараа реална проценка на квалитетот, преземање на тутунот во три класи и просечна цена од 185 денари. Од средбата излегоа задоволни и рекоа дека откупувачите покажале расположение за „поблага“ проценка на тутунот.

description.hltext_display: 尚雯婕做客西部网娱乐名人� � 庆生聊时尚
description.content:
西部网娱乐名人堂之尚雯婕
西部网娱乐讯 超女冠军、华谊兄弟旗下“潮流女皇”尚雯婕携带全新大碟《全球风靡Fashion Icon》于12月22日13:00做客西部网娱乐名人堂，现场吹蜡烛过生日，并与广大网友一起畅聊音乐。
新专辑：我已不当小资好多年
主持人：各位西部网的网友大家好，这里是西部网名人堂，今天我们请来了一位大明星，首先我们欢迎尚雯婕。
尚雯婕：西部网的网友大家好！我是尚雯婕。
主持人：欢迎雯婕！首先给我们网友分享一下这张专辑。
尚雯婕：这张专辑有三首是电子舞曲，还有七首是慢歌。有一些很好听的，像后面对唱歌曲，包括大家已经熟悉的一些影视歌曲，比如《唐山大地震》的主题歌，《云上的日子》的主题歌，还有世博会的馆歌。
主持人：可以说包罗万象。还有精装版的600块钱一张。
尚雯婕：都是用来送给媒体朋友，还有一些客户和好朋友。
主持人：定位在艺术收藏？
尚雯婕：作为一个礼物送出去。
主持人：如果歌迷想拿到精装版比较难？
尚雯婕：有一些慈善拍卖，前不久在一个电台慈善当中拍出了一个挺好的价格。
主持人：我看这个非常厚，像一本书一样，前一段看了你在国外拍的写真，这个里面都会有吗？
尚雯婕：都会有，小本没有那么全，大本里面有加拿大、比利时所有街拍的照片。
主持人：刚才讲到这次音乐的曲风有很多电子的东西，以前是文艺小资，你现在在转变是这样吗？
尚雯婕：我不做小资已经很久了，都是我原创的，我骨子里面是比较摇滚和电子的，这是我以后发展的方向。
主持人：我们在新专辑发布会上得到消息，你明年也要到国外去学习音乐，可能会暂别国语流行乐坛一段时间？
尚雯婕：一到两个月时间，之后还会回来写歌。
主持人：不再发行国语流行音乐专辑？
尚雯婕：是。
主持人：其他还是有可能的？
尚雯婕：在风格上有一些突破，因为想做一些新鲜一点的，更具有尚雯婕个人标签的音乐风格，所以才要继续学习，所以有刚才的感受，今后我会比较特别一些。尚雯婕特征更明显一些。

description.hltext_display: Insiders Buying This Fixer-Upper Bank Stock
ING Vysya looking to hike base rate in next quarter
description.content: MUMBAI, Dec 22 - ING Vysya Bank VYSA.BO is looking at hiking its base rate in next quarter, a top official told reporters on Wednesday. "Deposit rates have gone up, so when banks including us revise base rates they are likely to be higher," Managing Director and Chief Executive Shailendra Bhandari said. The bank's current base rate is 7.75.

description.hltext_display: Top travel stories of 2010 and Fees, fares and the future of air travel
description.content:
Orlando's Holy Land Experience aims to look, sound, and feel a world away from the gravity drops, splashy screams and mouse ears that fill other nearby family attractions.Last week, the Department of Transportation reported that U.S. airlines collected $2.56 billion in baggage fees during the first nine months of the year, a 29 percent increase over the year before. The biggest hauls went to Delta, $733 million; United, $431 million; and US Airways, $388 million.
Perhaps that explains why US Airways President Scott Kirby recently told analysts that he expects fees for checked bags and other ancillary services to represent 100 percent of the airline(TM)s profitability this year.Think about that. For an industry that transports people from one place to another, solvency through surcharges represents a structural change (Kirby(TM)s words), not just for US Airways, but for the rest of the industry and travelers, as well. [Read the full article]
The world's busiest international airport told infuriated passengers not to expect full service until Thursday, five days after a five-inch snowstorm turned hundreds of thousands of holiday plans into a nightmare of canceled flights and painful nights on terminal floors.Travelers' anger boiled over into politics as Britain's prime minister offered to put troops on snow-clearing duty. Europe's top transport official threatened tougher regulation of airports unable to cope with unusually wintry weather.Prime Minister David Cameron said his government had "offered military assistance" to the company that operates Europe's busiest airport and others in Britain.But British Transport Secretary Philip Hammond told Sky News that Heathrow operator BAA, owned by Spain's Ferrovial, had turned down the help in clearing snow from runways. [Read the full article]

description.hltext_display: Атина и денеска без сообраќај поради штрајк
description.content: Атина, 22 декември 2010 (МИА) - Атина и денеска ќе биде под штрајкувачка опсада, бидејќи нема да се движат никакви превозни средства од јавниот градски сообраќај поради 24-часовниот протест на вработените во него, кои се незадоволни од антикризните мерки на Владата. Во грчкиот Парламент денеска завршуваат дебатите за буџетот за следната година и до полноќ треба да биде изгласан. Двата најголеми синдиката - Заедничката конфедерација на трудот (ГСЕЕ) и Федерацијата на државните службеници (АДЕДИ) повикаа на тричасовен прекин на работата од 12 до 15 часот во областа Атика. На овој протест ќе се приклучат и пристанишните работници. Во организација на овие два синдиката денеска во 13 часот ќе се одржи митинг на централниот плоштад „Синтагма" во Атина. За утре транспортните работници, кои ги опслужуваат предградијата на главниот грчки град , најавија петчасовен прекин на работата. Во меѓувреме, кабинетот на премиерот Јоргос Папандреу соопшти дека спорниот нацрт-закон за либерализација на т.н. затворени професии ќе биде оставен за разгледување по празниците, најверојатно на почетокот на февруари. На тој начин ќе се обиде да ја намали зголемената тензија меѓу фармацевтите, адвокатите, возачите на камиони и други кои извршуваат слободни професии. Фармацевтите од денеска започнуваат 48-часовен штрајк. Грчката Влада планира целосна либерализација на 160 професии. Станува збор за сектори, каде лиценците за работа не се сменети по неколку десетина години.

description.hltext_display: Redknapp's game will not work with Mapgies
description.content:
TAP the words ‘Harry Redknapp’ and ‘Wheeler Dealer’ into Google and you get a pretty succinct answer from the Tottenham manager to accusations that he plays the spiv in the transfer market.
But his four-letter rebuttal of that particular charge loses some of its credibility when you consider the latest round of reports linking the Spurs boss with a move for Andy Carroll.
The weekend’s tabloid revelations had Tottenham in for Carroll for £20million, with £10million worth of talent in Robbie Keane and Peter Crouch chucked in for good measure.
It was classic Redknapp, the start of a time-honoured process when it comes to the Spurs boss. First let it be known with a nod and a wink to friendly reporters that you’re interested in a player – on or off the record – and then hope that the star in question is dazzled by the prospect of joining his all-star cast at White Hart Lane.
Well on this occasion he is wasting his time. And so, despite what you will probably read throughout the January transfer window, are Manchester United, Arsenal, Chelsea and Manchester City.
Because while Mike Ashley has proved time and time again that he has the hide of a rhinoceros when it comes to making tough calls – most recently firing Chris Hughton – making this most unpopular decision has not even entered his thinking.
Undoubtedly, the figures involved are eye-watering. A valuation of £30million is remarkable given the fact Carroll was struggling to get in the team this time last year, and Ashley’s propensity to fly in the face of reason when it comes to matters black and white will mean United fans will be unable to shift that modicum of doubt that the club will be tempted by a big offer.
But rest assured that senior club sources recognise that selling Carroll is unthinkable – and confirmed that to Alan Pardew when he took the job.
Not only would it would prompt howls of derision from the terraces – and probably louder and more sustained protests than met the Hughton decision – but it would also undermine the fabric of Ashley’s plan for Newcastle.
The Academy is key to Ashley’s blueprint and the club’s power brokers know that having someone like Carroll wearing the number nine with distinction is their best argument for turning Newcastle into a self-sustainable business within the next five years.
Similarly, they know the numbers involved with flogging Carroll don’t make sense. £30million is a huge wedge of cash but finding a striker capable of knocking in 15 Premier League goals a season will cost at least that, maybe more – not to mention the fact that their new number nine is starting to make them some pretty tidy amounts in merchandise.
So you can give it a rest Harry. Carroll won’t be leaving the banks of the Tyne any time soon.

description.hltext_display: » WestJet to lease Boeing 757-200
description.content:
» Kenya Airways becomes new E190 operator and Jetscape customer
Jetscape announced the acquisition of a new Embraer E190-100IGW aircraft and delivered it on lease to Kenya Airways, Nairobi, Kenya. The aircraft is part of a two aircraft transaction. The second E190 aircraft will be delivered to Kenya Airways in May 2011. Both aircraft will be leased for an eight-year term. These E190 aircraft will join Kenya Airway’s existing Embraer fleet of five E170 aircraft. Previously, Jetscape had successfully remarketed two used E170 aircraft to Kenya Airways on four-year leases, on behalf of Finnair, Helsinki, Finland.

description.hltext_display: 航天作家揭秘航天禁忌 放屁也要栽跟头
description.content:
日前，在重庆科技馆的人文大讲坛上，我国著名航天作家、中国宇航出版社副社长石磊专程来渝举行“中国航天”讲座，揭秘了宇航员背后鲜为人知的故事。
据石磊介绍，宇航员在太空中不能吃黄豆和可乐。因为这两种食物都是产气的食品，可乐吃了要打嗝，黄豆吃了要放屁。“平时这些小事经常都会发生，可在太空中，排出来的气可是威力十足！”原来，飞船船舱往往非常小，在太空中是没有重力的环境，人在里面本来就是“轻飘飘”的，打嗝、排气不但污染环境，而且一喷出来就是一个“发动机”，一个嗝就能让宇航员摔个大跟头。
想当宇航员，到底有些啥条件？石磊告诉市民，宇航员一般要求身高1.6米至1.72米，体重55公斤至70公斤，最好是40岁左右的已婚男性。因为已婚宇航员有家庭、有孩子，生理、心理会比未婚人士更成熟，更具家庭责任感。除了完成国家的任务外，对家人的惦念，也会使其产生强烈的决心，一定要克服各种困难回到地球。
最让听众感到神奇的是，孩子用的“尿不湿”最开始竟然是发明给宇航员用的。石磊说，美国的航天技术刚开始发展时，一位宇航员曾在船舱内等待发射等了9个小时。“我能不能去上完厕所再回来呀？”他憋了半天，终于忍不住向指挥中心提出请示，谁知火箭发射了，宇航员再也忍不住，尿在了身上。为解决宇航员的上厕所问题，航天部门才发明了“尿不湿”，后来演变成婴儿专属用品。

description.hltext_display: Louisville tops Southern Miss in Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl
description.content:
Chris Philpott kicked the go-ahead 36- yard field goal in the fourth quarter, and Louisville held on for a 31-28 victory over Southern Miss in the Beef 'O' Brady's Bowl.
Jeremy Wright returned a kickoff 95 yards for a touchdown earlier in the fourth to help the Cardinals (7-6) overcome a deficit and secure a winning season in head coach Charlie Strong's first year. Louisville also recorded its first postseason victory since the 2007 Orange Bowl.
Justin Burke threw for 178 yards and two touchdowns for the Cardinals, while Bilal Powell ran for 75 yards and a score.
"It was a total team effort," Louisville head coach Charlie Strong said. "That's what this team is all about."
Austin Davis passed for 205 yards and two scores for Southern Miss (8-5), which was making a ninth consecutive bowl appearance, but lost for the second straight year.
Southern Miss took a 28-21 lead on the opening play of the fourth quarter. The Golden Eagles had driven from midfield to the eight before Austin Davis completed a pass to tight end Zeke Walters on the right edge of the end zone.
But on the ensuing kickoff, Wright made his way through traffic to the left sideline, picked up one final block and sprinted into the end zone to even the game again.
Louisville forced a punt and took over deep in its own territory. Burke led the Cardinals into Southern Miss territory, but the drive stalled and Philpott kicked his field goal with 6:30 to play.
Cardinals linebacker Brandon Heath made a key third-down sack of Davis on the next Southern Miss possession, forcing a three-and-out. The failure to move the ball doomed the Golden Eagles, whose defense stopped Louisville too late. Southern Miss got the ball back with only seconds remaining and couldn't pull off a miracle play.
The Golden Eagles got out to a 14-0 lead on two first-quarter touchdowns. Quentin Pierce had a 32-yard TD reception about three minutes into the game, while Desmond Johnson scored on a 62-yard run with 10:12 left.
Louisville made up the deficit, though, by reaching the end zone three times in the second quarter.
Cameron Graham caught an 11-yard strike from Burke with 11:21 on the clock to get the Cardinals on the board. Southern Miss responded about two minutes later when Davis caught a 17-yard touchdown throw from Pierce, a wide receiver.
But Josh Chichester's 10-yard reception and Powell's six-yard run later in the half allowed Louisville to go into halftime tied, 21-21.
"I think we had chances to make more plays on offense," Davis said. "We missed on a couple plays that keep you up at night."
Game Notes
Johnson ran for 102 yards on 10 carries for Southern Miss...Louisville's Doug Beaumont led all receivers with seven catches for 57 yards...Southern Miss out-gained Louisville, 396-287, but averaged just 18.5 yards on four kickoff returns.

That's what this team is all about.

description.hltext_display: Lima Penipu Kupon Berhadiah Kopi ABC Dibekuk
description.content:
TEMPO Interaktif, BOGOR - Jajaran Sat Intel dan Reskrim Polres Bogor Kota membekuk 5 orang tersangkan penipuan undian berhadiah yang disebar melalui bungkus prosuk Kopi ABC. pada selasa (21/12) malam.
kelima pelaku yang tercatat sebagai warga Makasar, berinisial An, Rs, Ad, Rd dan Bhn, dibekuk di rumah kontrakan di Desa Megamendung Kec. Megamendung Kab. Bogor itu, pada selasa (21/12) malam. ''Dari hasil pemeriksaan untuk sementara produk yang dipergunakan kopi ABC,'' ujar Kasat Reskrim Polres Bogor Kota Ajun Komisatis Polisi Indra Gunawan Sik, Rabu (22/12), di Mapolres Bogor Kota.
Indra menjelaskan, modus operasi yang dilakukan dengan cara memasukkan kupon pundian palsu kedalam bungkus kopi, selanjutnya para pelaku kemudian menyebar bungkus kopi tersebut ke sejumlah kota. ''Kopi yang sudah diisi kupon palsu disebar hingga Kalimantan dan Jepara,'' terang Indra.
Dalam menjalankan aksinya, kelima pelaku membagi tugas, seperti memasukkan kupon, menyebar dan menerima telepon jika ada yang menghubungi tersangka. ''Dalam kupon tertera nomer yang bisa dihubungi untuk mengurus hadiah,'' papar Indra.
Pada saat korban menelpon, lanjut Indra, tersangka memandu korban yang pada akhirnya korban harus membayar sejumlah biaya administrasi yang nilainya rata-rata 2 hingga 4 juta. ''Tersangka membimbing korban supaya membayar biaya administrasi, pada saat itu tersangka sudah menyiapkan no rek yang siap menerima transfer,'' kata Indra.
Dari pengakuan tersangka mereka hanya memasukan kupon palsu kedalam kemasan kopi bermerek ABC, selain itu korban baru 10 orang. ''Kita masih kembangkan kemungkinan produk merk lain, dan apakah mungkin ada korban serta tersangka lainnya,'' ujar Indra.
Selain kelima tersangka petugas juga berhasil mengamankan sejumlah barang bukti seperti Laptop, printer, hanphone, alat pres serta berbagai macam tinta printer.
Pada kesempatan itu Indra menghimbau kepada masyarakat supaya tidak tergiur dengan iming-iming hadiah besar yang ada dalam prosuk tertentu. Ia juga menghimbau supaya masyarakat yang menjadi korban untuk segera melapor polisi. ''Sampai sekarang banyak telepon yang masuk, ketika kita kasih tahu kalau ini polisi mereka kaget,'' ungkap Indara.
Akibat perbuatannya ke lima tersangka dijerat pasal 378 KUHP, tentang penipuan dengan ancaman hukuman lebih dari lima tahu. ''Tersangka sudah Kami tahan, dan masih dimintai keterangan,'' kata Indra.

description.hltext_display: Сакам независна истрага
description.content: Приштина, 21 декември 2010 (МИА) - Косовскиот премиер Хашим Тачи изјави денеска дека сака независна истрага за да се „растера маглата" по обвинувањата дека предводел убиства на луѓе и продажба на органи од киднапирани цивили. Тој изјави за американски медиуми оти нема што да крие и додаде дека косовските власти ќе бидат кооперативни во истрагата по обвинувањата од Дик Марти, известител на СЕ дека ОВК убивала голем број Срби, како и Албанци на Косово и ги продавале нивните органи. - Сето тоа е магла и јас ќе работам на тоа да ја растерам, изјави Тачи. Според него, обвинувањата се насочени на „поткопување на косовската декларација за независност од 2008 година".

description.hltext_display: Побарана отворена расправа во ЕУ за членството на Турција
description.content:
Атина, 22 декември 2010 (МИА) - Атина побара отворена дебата во Европската унија за членството на Турција, соопштуваат грчките медиуми.
Таква отворена расправа во рамки на Европската унија е нужна дури и на највисоко ниво, за да може процесот на приклучување на Турција да биде поставен на правилна основа, изјави министерот за надворешни работи Димитрис Друцас за време на дебатата во грчкиот парламент за буџетот на земјата за 2011 година.
-Со Турција ние не зборуваме за да дадеме, како што некои тврдат, туку напротив, за да побараме и за да добиеме гаранции за нашите права, предвидени со меѓународното право, рече шефот на грчката дипломатија и додаде дека двете земји треба да разбијат некои митови, всадени со текот на времето.
Друцас смета дека таквата отворена дебата за турското членство може да се одржи во Европската унија по изборите во јуни во Турција.

description.hltext_display: 淘汰陈旧的性爱观：其实女人比男人更性致勃勃(2)
description.content:
刻板观念三：“女人复杂而男人简单”
而就算你决定要主动掌握自己的欲望及性生活，你也可能发现事情未必那么容易。“怎么会呢？”你或许疑惑，“现在很多女性都能享受自由的性生活、同时不会被指指点点或遭到道德批判啊！”确实，但我们所说的困难不在外界，而在女性自己。“就算是一个非常独立、非常知性、受过高等教育的女性，对自己的性欲都可能非常茫然，”EstherParell指出：“直到今天，女性在亲密行为中的角色大多还是被动的、被控制的，而这背后有一套缜密的系统与意识形态：例如说，你不该主动释放欲望，而应该成为男人欲求的对象等等。”
而另一名女性A片导演则认为，女性的性本能，其实跟男人一样：“我认为女人对性的原始兴趣，其实远远高于社会容许她们的范围，但事实上，女人是可以跟男人一样为性而性的，女人更是跟男人一样的视觉动物──看看时尚跟美妆吧，这些产业背后的驱力是什么？无非就是性吸引力！”
当然，男性和女性之间还是有所不同，但不是老生常谈的“女性的欲望细致复杂”、“男性的欲望直接简单”，这样的刻板归类，其实只会让男女两方都感到不公平甚至不满意；许多学者与性别运动者认为，现在最重要的议题，早就不再是性解放，而是女性对“性”这回事的自信，也就是说，不需要媒体或他人告诉你“怎样才算正常”；你的性爱不一定要像纯爱片，也不一定非要像色情片──你就是你。而电影《暮光之城》的巨大成功或许可以做为脚注：它不曾直接探讨性爱，可是却描绘出女性内心一种原始的欲望。 怀疑 再多一点怀疑
“性不只是性”，EstherParell这样认为：“它跟自由与成就感密不可分，而对女人而言，还要加上自尊与自我接受，所以女性的性生活常常随着经验与岁月而质量愈来愈好，但你若一直处于被动、不试着探索，又不可能有真正的体会。”
那么，到底该怎么发现自己真正的欲望所在呢？──人们常常知道自己“不要”什么，却对自己“要什么”一无所知──但这其实没有标准答案，或许唯一的方式，就是怀疑，再多一点怀疑：质疑自己长久以来的认知、质疑别人告诉你的这些那些、质疑各种主流观念，甚至质疑自己的经验，然后告诉自己，人生只有一次，一场值得的冒险就从现在开始。

description.hltext_display: Вељаноски на средба со спикерот на израелскиот Кнесет
description.content:
Ерусалим, 22 декември 2010 (МИА) - Со официјална церемонија и државни почести денеска во Ерусалим ќе биде пречекан претседателот на македонското Собрание Трајко Вељаноски од спикерот на израелскиот Кнесет, Реувен Ривлин.
Вељаноски од вчера е во официјална посета на Израел, а тој е истовремено и првиот претседател на македонскиот Парламент во посета на оваа пријателска земја.
Како што јави известувачот на МИА, предвидено е пристигнувањето на претседателот на Собранието Вељаноски да биде означено со звукот на фанфарите, по што ќе следува кревање на јарболи на знамињата на двете земји, интонирање на химните и смотра на израелската почесна гарда. Потоа претседателот на македонскиот Парламент ќе положи венец на споменикот на паднатите борци во израелските војни.
Вељаноски ќе оствари билатерална средба со спикерот на Кнесетот Ривлин, по што тој и членовите на македонската парламентарна група за соработка со Парламентот на Израел Павле Трајанов, Славица Грковска и Џевад Адеми ќе имаат разговори и со Асоцијацијата за парламентарно пријателство на Кнесетот, предводена од Лиа Шемтов.
Претседателот на македонското Собрание треба да биде поздравен од израелските пратеници на пленарна седница. На разговорите се очекува да стане збор за интензивирање на соработката меѓу двата парламента.
За време на последниот ден од посетата на Ерусалим, Вељаноски ќе биде примен и од израелскиот претседател Шимон Перес.
Претходно, вчера тој оствари средба со вицепремиерот и израелски министер за надворешни работи Авигдор Либерман, а го посети и Меморијалниот центар на холокаустот „Јад Вашем“, каде во Холот на сеќавањето положи венец.

description.hltext_display: Changement de saison: début de l'hiver - journée la plus courte
description.content: GÉOSCIENCES - Selon la théorie de la «boule de neige», notre planète était entièrement recouverte de glace il y a 700 millions d’années. En se fragmentant, l’immense bloc continental de terre émergée a fait diminuer le taux de CO2 dans l’atmosphère. Aujourd’hui, phénomène inverse: les activités humaines causent un rejet massif de CO2 et réchauffent le climat.

description.hltext_display: Почна зимата
description.content: Скопје, 22 декември 2010 (МИА) - Ноќеска 39 минути по полноќ и календарски почна зимата на северната полутопка на Земјата. Во исто време за жителите на јужната Земјина хемисфера почна летото. Првиот ден од зимата е најкраток, а ноќта најдолга. Сонцето во Скопје изгреа во 6 часот и 58 минути, а ќе зајде во 16 часот и 5 минути. Денот ќе трае 9 часа и 7 минути, а ноќта 14 часа и 53 минути. Зимата ќе заврши на 20 март кога почнува пролетта.

description.hltext_display: 大学生求职屡遭就业歧视 专家支招反歧视 12-22
description.content:
“要求广州户口”、“25岁以下”、“限招男生”、“身高1.7米以上”……目前又进入应届大学生求职高峰，在求职当中，此类条款屡见不鲜。众多求职者在愤愤不平之余，却又� 可奈何。事实上，权威专家明确指出，这� �的条款不合法、不合理，是不折不扣的就业歧视！
求职现象：常见就业歧视逐个数
所谓就业歧视，是指基于一个人的性别、身高、相貌、年龄、家庭出身、身体特征、残疾等与个人能力� 关的� � ，用人单位对应聘者或其雇员采取不合理的区别对待，从而剥夺或者损害公民的就业机会或职业机会均等或待遇平等的行为。
歧视一：相貌歧视 � 小姐以优异的成绩从某名牌大学毕业，求职中却屡屡碰壁，原� 是她� �子“长得丑”。� 小姐也有自知之明，求职方向主要针对内部的技术岗位，但用人单位基本不给她机会，就算面试也通不过。� 小姐觉得很不公平：为什么自己有专长却难以为社会作出应有的贡献？
歧视二：身高歧视
冯先生报考某事业单位办公室职员岗位，笔试成绩一路过关，但最终在体检时却“卡了壳”，他的身高不足1.60米，用人单位说他没有达到最低身高� �准。冯先生质疑：在办公室工作，有什么理由说长得“高大威猛”就一定要比“短小精悍”干得好？
歧视三：户籍歧视 硕士� �究生杨先生向一家知名企业求职，在面试的时候就被刷了下来，对方的理由是这份工作只录取本地人。杨先生认为这� �的规定毫� 理由，这项工作的性质与户籍没有关系，本地人能干得好，凭什么外地人就不能干好？
歧视四：性别歧视
王小姐是某知名大学中文系毕业，她应聘一家大型国企的文秘工作，对方说公司王小姐条件很优秀，但公司希望招男的，今年就不招女生了，请王小姐“理解”。王小姐表示“很不理解”：凭什么用人单位“希望招男的”就能成为不给女性求职者机会的理由？
专家访谈：特殊职业需要不算歧视 就业歧视已成为过街老� ，但现实中很多用人单位口头说不搞“就业歧视”，实现上却做着就业歧视的一套。对一些读者关注的热点，羊城晚报记者采访了知名专家、华南师大劳动法和社会保障法� �究所所长周贤日博士。 羊城晚报：是否所有对求职者的区别对待，都可归入就业歧视？
周贤日：并非所有的区别对待都构成歧视，如果某项区别对待(限制条件或优� 条件)系出自某一职业的内在客观需要，则不应视为歧视。比如，出于职业本身的客观、特殊需要，如演员一般对相貌有一定要求，女监狱的狱警、妇科的护士一般由女性充当等等；� 某种临时特别情况出现需要给予特殊优待，如对怀孕或哺乳妇女的优� 措施等；� 某类人群的劣势而给予特殊的照顾，如对残疾人的优� 措施和特殊保护，等等。区别对待只有在缺乏客观性和合理性时，才构成歧视。
羊城晚报：不少老板担心，反对就业歧视会影响企业的效益。
周贤日：这种担心没有道理，反歧视并不影响企业的效益。反歧视所要求的不是去雇佣不适合职业要求的人，而仅是要求在符合职业本身的客观、特殊需要的时候，同等的情况下，不能歧视那些具有某些与工作性质要求� 关特征的人。如反歧视并不要求雇主雇佣一个腿有残疾的人进行搬运工作，但是不能以此特征拒绝他谋取一个会计或者在电脑前工作的职位。同时，各级政府应当由投资性财政更多地投入到公共服务和社会保障投入，扶持残疾人、其他弱势人群的就业，推进对所有劳动者在养老、医疗、工伤、失业和生育保险上的平等权利。
羊城晚报：遭遇就业歧视，该怎么办？
周贤日：相关求职者可以寻求法律与社会援助，比如各种法律援助中心、劳动与社会保障部门、各级工会、妇联、残联等其他相关社会团体。如果是用人单位在招聘中或劳动关系存续期间对劳动者进行歧视，可以向其所在地人民法院提起民事诉讼(后种情形需先劳动仲裁)。如果是国家机关在招录公务员过程中存在歧视，可以向当地人民法院提起行政诉讼。 此外，如果是法规、规� 等以及其他规范性文件中的歧视性规定，还可向全国人大常委会书面提起审查、修改、撤销相关规范性文件的建议。(记者 马汉青 通讯员 谢平平)
法律链接：
法律会为求职者撑腰
目前我国反就业歧视领域已经建立相对完整的法律体系。我国《宪法》、《劳动法》、《劳动合同法》、《妇女权益保护法》、《残疾人保障法》、《就业促进法》等明确禁止性别歧视、民族歧视、残疾人歧视、健康(� 染病)歧视、身份(农民工)歧视等。 《劳动法》：劳动者就业不� 民族、种族、性别、宗教信仰不同而受到歧视。
《残疾人保障法》：残疾人在政治、经济、文化、社会和家庭生活等方面享有同其他公民平等的权利。禁止歧视、侮辱、侵害残疾人。在职工的招用、聘用、转正、晋级、职称评定、劳动报酬、生活福利、劳动保险等方面，不得歧视残疾人。
《就业促进法》：违反本法规定，实施就业歧视的，劳动者可以向人民法院提起诉讼。

description.hltext_display: [오늘의 메모] 12월 23일
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
▦구주주유상청약=현대상선 ▦보통주추가상장=휠라코리아(전화우선주의 보통주전환) 대유에이텍(스톡옵션행사) 기아차·STX조선해양(신주인수권행사) 금호산업(유상 제3자배정) ▦신규상장=현대HCN(126560)
▦공모주청약=티에스이(주관사 한국) KB스팩(KB투자) ▦구주주유상청약=코다코 ▦일반공모유상청약=동양텔레콤(주관사 동부) ▦보통주추가상장=지앤알(유상) 텔로드·하나마이크론·디브이에스·모빌리언스(국내BW) 오성엘에스티(국내CB·BW) ▦주권변경상장=확인영어사(감자) ▦매매거래정지=아이피에스(구주권제출)
