description.hltext_display: 九城联合三VC设1亿美元基金投资移动互联网
description.content:
来源:速途网 作者:王佩 时间:2010-12-21 20:32 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
速途网12月21日消息 第九城市(以下简称“九城”)携知名投资公司华岩资本、成为基金和险峰华兴创业投资于今日联合宣布，四方携手组建投资基金“成就基金”(Fund9)，共同投入1亿美金用于投资国内外移动互联网领域。
九城携华岩、成为、险峰华兴启动移动互联网投资基金(速途网独家拍摄)
九城表示，“成就基金”(Fund9)的投资项目重点，主要针对国内外移动互联网应用产品及应用平台两大领域的开发团队或公司而设置。只要是基于移动互联网领域的相关项目，无论是国内外的团队或公司，都可提交基金评审委员会进行评估，对通过评估的项目基金将采取灵活机动的资本合作方式，包括收购、控股和战略性投资等开展合作。
九城今日启动OpenFeint国内运营，预计将于明年3月正式发布。OpenFeint中文版将首先在Andriod平台推出，稍后会覆盖iOS等智能手机平台。
据了解，“成就基金”(Fund9)基金管理委员会由九城、华岩资本、成为基金和险峰华兴创投四家共同组成。除了资金方面的支持之外，基金管理委员会还将为入选项目提供办公行政、市场推广、产品运营等多元化的资源支持。
九城董事局主席兼CEO朱骏表示：移动互联网正在全球蓬勃发展，无论是应用或平台的开发，都具有巨大的需求。特别是在中国市场，高速增长的智能手机用户数蕴含着庞大商机。九城注意到国内的开发团队在人才和创意方面都有着良好的资质，如果他们在资金及市场推广和运营等方面的资源能获得强而有力的支持，成功的机会将大大提高。此外，该专项资金也将关注海外的移动互联网应用及平台开发团队。(王佩)

description.hltext_display: Why men should only wear cotton underwear
description.author: s.e. Jones
description.content:
If you happen to go to a store that sells underwear for men, you are likely to find a lot of choices, a lot of which have garments that are made out of materials that are not all cotton. Dont buy or wear those except for the very special occasions; heres why. Because of the male anatomy, men need a reasonable amount of airflow around their parts. Nature never dreamed wed one day wind up covering our genitals and thus we developed in ways that came to rely on the natural flow of air and heat.
One of these ways we developed is in how male bodies produce sperm. The male testicles are on the outside for a reason, and that is because the sperm they produce need to be kept at a lower temperature than the rest of the body. Putting on and wearing undergarments and then over garments goes against everything evolution had in mind for us. Without air circulation, it is difficult if not impossible to keep the temperature down inside the testicles and thus sperm counts go way down. Cotton underwear isnt perfect, but its far better than silk or polyester or other manmade materials because it allows for more air flow which means carrying warm air away from our bodies. It has been suggested, but not proved, that forcing reduced sperm in our testicles can raise our risk of testicular cancer.
Air flow is at the root of the other reason to wear cotton underwear and that is because without proper air flow, the testicles tend to sweat underneath where they hang against the thigh. This in turn causes general itchiness. Also, because things get hidden away inside underwear and trousers, this added heat and sweat can lead to conditions conducive to fungus, and that is why men wind up getting jock itch, a nasty and embarrassing problem that can be difficult to fix.
There is another reason to wear cotton underwear and that is because of the way skin is made. In short, skin has pores and wants to breathe; anything you put on or wear that causes problems for that can lead to problems with the skin. For men, this can mean pimples and bumps both fore and aft, rashes, and general irritation. This happens because air cannot flow properly through the pores of the skin. This is why even those men who choose to wear boxer shorts are better off choosing those brands that are made of pure cotton, because other fabrics simply dont allow the pores to breathe in those areas where the material does still come in direct contact with the skin.

description.hltext_display: '위도폰7' 탑재 스마트폰 돌풍분다
description.content:
마이크로소프트(MS)가 스마트폰 시장을 겨냥해 개발한 새 모바일 운영체제(OS) '윈도폰7'을 탑재한 스마트폰이 출시 6주만에 150만대를 판매했다. 22일 MS에 따르면 지난 10월 공개 후 11월부터 공식 판매에 들어간 윈도폰7은 삼성전자ㆍLG전자가 생산한 제품이 판매호조를 보이면서 출시 6주만에 150만대를 팔았다. 애킴 버그 MS 윈도폰부문 부사장은 "윈도폰7 제품 판매가 탄력을 받고 있다"고 강조했다. 정보기술(IT) 업계에서는 내년 윈도폰7 판매 규모를 2,500만대로 전망하고 있다.
MS는 윈도폰7 판매 확대를 위해 전용 애플리케이션 확대에도 총력을 기울이고 있다. 앱스토어인 마켓플레이스에 등록된 애플리케이션 수도 두 달만에 4,000개를 넘어서는 등 콘텐츠 확보도 빠른 속도로 이뤄지고 있다.
시장조사 업체인 IDC는 MS의 마켓플레이스 애플리케이션 수가 내년 리서치인모션(RIM)의 블랙베리 OS, HP의 웹 OS, 노키아의 심비안 OS용 마켓 등을 제치고 애플의 앱스토어, 구글의 안드로이드 마켓에 이어 3위를 차지할 것으로 예상하고 있다.
하지만 윈도폰7이 애플의 아이폰이나 구글의 안드로이드폰의 아성에 도전하기에는 여전히 역부족일 전망이다. 내년 아이폰 예상 판매량은 6,000만대, 안드로이드폰은 최대 1억대에 육박할 것으로 보여 2,500만대 수준인 윈도폰7과의 격차가 좁혀지기 어렵다는 것이다.
정보기술(IT) 업계의 한 관계자는 "윈도폰7이 한 달 여만에 150만대가 팔리는 등 선전하고 있지만 애플이나 구글 등을 따라잡을지는 아직 미지수"라고 평가했다.

description.hltext_display: Focus on the Landâs top stories of 2010
description.content:
A story about a $120,000 scholarship established in memory of a Gisborne man who left a huge impression on the wine industry in New Zealand is the most read story from the Focus on the Land section on The Gisborne Herald website.
Dr Rod Bonfiglioli, who died in May last year, was “one of those people who make a mark on your road through life”, said New Zealand Winegrowers president Stuart Smith.
He believed that the best wines start with healthy vines and much of his career focused on applied research in conjunction with nurseries, growers, viticulturists and winemakers.
New Zealand Winegrowers Research hoped the Rod Bonfiglioli Memorial Scholarship will inspire research that reflects Rod’s special qualities as a scientist: that is, a mix of academic excellence, practical grounding, leadership and a clear vision in any aspect of research for the wine industry.
The second most read story was about a hard-grafting, community-spirited farming couple from Putere, who sold their farm and headed to pastures new.
John and Suzanne Paterson left a huge void in the close-knit Putere community but said the time to move on had come.
After 30 years of farming at Putere the Patersons retired to a smaller block at Puketapu which will allow them to continue farming.
A story about the potential for commercial macadamia nut farming here took the number three spot.
With macadamias needing warm temperatures to get a good commercial crop, the potential in this district is huge, said Torere Macadamia’s Vanessa Hayes.
Based in Gisborne, she has been a leader in the macadamia industry since her research into commercial varieties in the early 1980s.
She says coastal areas would be best- suited and some larger Maori blocks are looking at the prospect of planting macadamias on underutilised land.
A story outlining the positive aspects of the Gisborne wine industry took fourth place in the list of top stories while a story from March outlining the bumper harvest activity on the Flats in the district placed at fifth.
An in depth look at feijoa growing in Gisborne with Gisborne grower Brian Scragg took sixth and a colour story about the district’s two biggest pig hunts, at Tiniroto and Marumaru was the seventh most read.
A feature looking at Mike and Bridget Parker’s organic basil growing enterprise came in at eighth and former Waipaoa Station farm cadet Rupert Barton’s being named Young Inventor of the Year at the National Agricultural Fieldays at Mystery Creek took ninth, while an especially good Matawhero cattle sale made the last spot on the top 10 most-read stories in the farming section.

event_or_fact.property: coastal areas would be best- suited and some larger Maori blocks are looking at the prospect of planting macadamias on underutilised land
Dr Rod Bonfiglioli, who died in May last year, was ?one of those people who make a mark on your road through life?

description.hltext_display: 四川未来教育规划 富余� �舍优先用于办幼儿园 12-22
description.content:
四川未来10年的教育发展蓝图如何规划？昨日，我省教育工作会议召开，正式出台《四川省中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要（2010－2020年）》（以下简称《规划纲要》）。《规划纲要》详细解读了未来10年我省各个教育领域改革的发展目� �及保障措施，明确提出由财政厅牵头，把教育作为财政支出重点领域予以优先保证，确保到2012年按可比口径计算的全省各级各类财政性教育支出� 全省财政支出的比例达到18%。《规划纲要》把促进教育公平摆在重要位置，强调重点要促进义务教育均衡发展，把缩小区域、城乡教育差距作为首要任务，保障公民依法享有受教育的权利。针对人们关注的“幼儿园入园难、入园贵”、“减轻中小学生课业负担”、“改革考试招生制度”等教育热点，提出了相应解决方案。 1、� 快普及学前教育 关键词：综合办园、关注早教
到2015年，普及学前一年教育，发达地区普及学前三年教育，到2020年基本普及学前三年教育，毛入园率达75%以上。
重视发展农村学前教育，优化城市幼儿园布局。大力发展公办幼儿园，鼓励社会力量办园。中小学布局调整后的富余� �舍，优先用于办幼儿园。 重视0到3岁婴幼儿教育。要求遵循幼儿身心发展规律，防止和� 正“小学化”倾向。 2、全面提高义务教育
关键词：减负、“5个不得” � 大“义务教育示范县”推进力度，实行县域内教师、� �长交流制度。切实缩小� �际差距，着力解决择� �问题。 减轻中小学生课业负担。不得随意� 用学生法定休息时间集体补课或上新课；不得以任何形式下达升学指� �；不得以升学率对地区和学� �进行排名奖惩；不得设置重点学� �和重点班；不得将各种竞赛成绩作为入学升学的依据。
3、普及高中阶段教育
关键词：课程改革、培养模式
到2020年普及高中阶段教育，全面提高高中学生综合� 质。 高中阶段教育全面落实课程改革，注重学生综合� 质培养，全面实施高中学业水平考试。 � 强城乡薄弱高中建设，逐步消除大班额现象，扩大优质教育，鼓励举办特色高中和综合性高中，推进培养模式多� �化。 4、大力发展职业教育
关键词：比例增长、新兴产业 到2015年中职学� �与普通高中招生比例达到5.2:4.8左右。
大力发展适应战略性新兴产业的职业教育。有限发展电子信息、装备制� 、能源电力、油气化工、钒钛钢铁、饮料食品等产业。
同时，全面推进民族地区“9+3”免费职业教育。
5、提升高等教育水平
关键词：就业指导、新技术产业化 到2020年，高等教育人才培养、科学� �究和社会服务整体水平全面提升，在西部领先的优势进一步巩固。
落实教授为低年级学生授课制度。推进和完善学分制，促进文理交融。� 强就业创业教育和就业指导服务。 支持高� �融入区域技术创新体系，推进地区新技术产业化。
6、支持民族教育发展
关键词：优先发展、双语教学
到2020年，民族地区教育整体实现跨越发展，普及学前一年双语教育，基本普及学前两年教育，巩固提高九年义务教育水平，普及高中阶段教育，近一步办好高� �民族预科班。 大力推进双语教学，尊重和保障少数民族使用本民族语言接受教育的权利。
7、推进特殊教育发展
关键词：免费教育、提高待遇
到2015年，基本实现市（州）和30万人以上、残疾儿童少年较多的县（市）都建有一所特殊教育学� �。� 大对家庭经济困难残疾学生的资助力度，逐步实施残疾学生高中阶段免费教育。
将特殊教育教师培训纳入培训计划，提高专业水平和待遇，在教师评优表彰中提高特殊教育教师比例。 8、� 快发展继续教育 关键词：终身教育、社区学� 构建终身教育服务平台，稳步发展学历继续教育。� 强广播电视大学开放教育，办好开放大学，依托各类学� �和各种学� 型机构，逐步完善社区大学、社区学院、社区教育中心和村（居）民学� �四级社区教育网络。 积极发展社会培训，支持面向企业职工和农村的职业培训。
9、改革考试招生制度 关键词：自主招生、综合� 质 实行政府宏观管理，专业机构组织实施，学� �自主招生，学生多次选择的招考办法，建立有利于选拔创新人才、培养多� �化人才、保证教育公平公正的考试招生制度。 小学入学：坚持义务教育阶段公办学� �就近免试入学制度。 初中入学：全面实施学业水平考试与综合� 质评价相结合的高中招生制度。 高中入学：建立完善评价机制，探索多� �化的普通高中招生方式。 中职入学：实行中等职业学� �自主招生或� �据学业水平考试和综合� 质评价注册入学。 高� �入学：建立在高中学业水平考试和综合� 质评价基础上，以统一考试录取为主，与分层次、多元化选拔和多� �化录取方式相结合的高� �考试招生制度，逐步扩大高职院� �自主招生试点。 到2020年我省教育事业发展主要目� � 幼儿园在园人数达到223.3万人，学前三年毛入园率75%以上 九年义务教育在� �生902万人，巩固率95%以上高中在� �生（含中等职教学生）220万人，毛入学率90%以上职业教育中职教育在� �生110万人、高职教育在� �生89万人高等教育（含高职学生）在� �生192万人，其中� �究生13万人，毛入学率40%以上主要劳动年龄人口平均受教育年限提高11.2年以上，其中受过高等教育的比例达到20%

description.hltext_display: Hornets throw KP for a loss
description.content:
WRENTHAM - Using a balanced scoring attack that included 20 made free throws, the Mansfield High girls' basketball team held off a spirited challenge by King Philip, 58-51, in a Hockomock League game Tuesday night.The two teams combined for 57 free throws, with KP actually enjoying a 29-28 edge in attempts (making 15).
"We had the mind-set to play a tough, defensive game," said KP coach Jim Leonard. "I think the game played closer than the score indicated."Mansfield led by seven after the first quarter and held a 31-22 advantage at halftime. Mansfield held KP's leading scorer, Lauren Trudeau, scoreless through the opening quarter, but the senior forward heated up and finished with a game-high 18 points.Colleen Copley led the Hornets with 13 points, followed by Kelli McPherson and Kathryn Campbell with 10 apiece. Michaela Bowes and Tori Shannon chipped in eight points each.The Hornets (2-0, 2-0 league) will next participate in the Chelsea Tournament, Dec. 27-28, while the Warriors (0-2, 0-2) will play in the Hingham Holiday Tournament on Tuesday, Dec. 27.Dartmouth 66, Attleboro 59ATTLEBORO - Molly Brown hit two big 3-pointers in the fourth quarter and the Indians held off a determined Bombardier rally in a non-league game.The Bombardiers trailed 31-26 at halftime, but eventually whittled the lead down to two with 31/2 minutes remaining. But Brown nailed a long three and the Indians made good on a steal for a jumper to take back the momentum."We can be proud of the way we played," said Attleboro coach Mike Riley, whose team falls to 0-4. "The girls did some good things and played well."Briana Hochwarter led Attleboro with 17 points while Savanah Boyle had a nice all-around night with 12 points and 13 rebounds. AHS also got 10 rebounds from Rachel Daley. Brown finished with a game-high 28 points, including five 3-pointers.The Bombardiers will next host the Attleboro Area Girls' Holiday Tournament on Monday, Dec. 27. At 6:30 p.m., Bishop Feehan takes on Taunton, followed by Attleboro-North Attleboro at 7:30 p.m.Canton 59, Foxboro 53CANTON - Captain and inside-presence Leigha Tacey fouled out, giving Canton an energy boost and more space to attack from as the Bulldogs sealed a Hockomock League win over the Warriors."I think Canton outplayed us," said FHS coach Sarah Behn after the loss. "We did really good things at time and other times we didn't have as much composure."Foxboro took a 7-0 lead to start the game, looking smooth out the shoot. But turnovers were again a problem for Foxboro, as the Warriors couldn't put Canton away.Foxboro (3-1, 1-1 league) will play New Bedford at home on Dec. 28.Ashland 55, Norton 37NORTON - The early-going doomed the Lancers, as Norton fell to a 16-4 deficit after a rough first quarter in the Tri-Valley League contest."The first quarter we were just very stagnant," said Norton coach Nicole Nunes. "We picked it up and turned it around."That turnaround started in the second quarter and carried into the third, when Norton narrowed the gap to within 6 points. Shannon Hanson's 8 rebounds and Rebecca Wasylow's 6, most of which came in the second half for each, helped spark a more productive offense in the physical battle, but Ashland stormed back with a 19-point fourth quarter to put the game away.One more game awaits Norton (2-2) before the holiday break, as the Lady Lancers travel to Millis on Thursday.GNB Voke 52, Dighton-Rehoboth 39NEW BEDFORD - D-R's plan to shut down Greater New Bedford inside threat Stephanie Antoine pretty much worked to perfection, only the Falcons didn't have an answer for guard Vanesa Conceicao, who poured in a game-high 23 points in the Bears' South Coast Conference victory.The loss dropped Dighton-Rehoboth to 0-3 on the season, 0-1 in the SCC."What we worked on in practice was so that Antoine wasn't going to beat us, and we held her to 10 points, which I was very proud of," noted D-R coach Jon Pacheco, "but the Conceicao kid lit us up from the outside. She just killed us. She made a lot of steals and had a lot of easy baskets."Conceicao, a junior guard, had 11 of the team's baskets, including the Bears' only 3-pointer.Dighton-Rehoboth was led offensively by junior Samantha Bednarz (12 points), Emma Klinkhamer (10) and Cady DeBlois, who added nine. The Falcons, who trailed just 25-23 at halftime, were within six points in the fourth quarter before GNB Voke put the game away late."We were in it the entire game," added Pacheco. "They'd get (the lead) to 10 and we'd cut it to six. We got it down to one at one point but couldn't make that one more push and towards the end they made some easy lay-ups when we were taking chances."D-R hopes to crack the win column Thursday with a home game against Apponequet.

I think Canton outplayed us; We did really good things at time and other times we didn't have as much composure.
What we worked on in practice was so that Antoine wasn't going to beat us, and we held her to 10 points, which I was very proud of
We can be proud of the way we played; The girls did some good things and played well.

description.hltext_display: Tips On How To Attract And Meet Women Online
description.content:
The fascination with online dating is amazing. Most people find that they are too busy with their career (or other life issues) that they haven't even thought about dating. Dating and their career is very important to them, but becomes difficult to juggle the two. This is when they turn to alternative ways to date. Dating online has become very popular over the years because of how convenient it is. You can get to know someone very well using the web, in the comfort of your own home. In this article I will be discussing tips on how men can attract and meet women online. It is a fact that a man thinks a little different than a woman when it comes down to certain things.
It is much different to meet someone in the mall or grocery store than it is on the web. For example, if you are the shy and timid type male you may not feel comfortable walking up to a women on the street. On the internet you may feel more at ease. First impression is everything and it would not be good to lose out on the possible love of your life because of nerves.
Lack of face to face communication is not always ideal for men. Dating online has some great advantages when it comes to that type of hesitation. You are able to set up profiles that describe the type of person you are and even add pictures of yourself. The main purpose of dating on the web is to find the best match to fit your hobbies, thoughts, ideas and morals.
Some people create an online romance, which means they talk on the computer for hours at a time and never meet face to face. Online dating was created to talk through emails, chats, and instant messaging to eventually meet in person once you've established a comfort level. Your goal is to see if there is any possible chance to further enhance your relationship.
Online dating is great for those who are good at turning your expressions into words. It's always a plus if you have a way with words. Your conversations shouldn't turn into your life story. Most websites give you a chance to tell most about yourself in the profile. Your emails and such should be brief and precise sentences.
Another tip would be to never initiate sex talk if you are not yet comfortable with her. Women tend to bypass a man that does that or may even feel offended. If there was a rule book on dating, this would be at the top of the list. This is only suitable when your main and only goal is sex. There are some people in this world with very healthy sexual appetites, in this case they may not have a problem with the sex topic.
Honesty is also an important key in any form of dating. Just think about it, things could be bad if you lie from the beginning and then decide to further pursue that person in the future. Patience is a virtue, meaning you don't want to send so many messages that she begins to feel harassed or stalked.
These are all the basic tips I have for men to be more successful at attracting women on the internet. Of course there may be more, but for the most part, these listed should be sufficient enough to get the job done. Good luck!

description.hltext_display: Ángel Aguirre ha recorrido 7 regiones de la entidad, 57 de los 81 municipios
中信银行推出银保联名卡
惠普WebOS平板机新料：USB 3.0+4G网络
description.content:
在惠普WebOS平板机Topaz曝光后不久又有消息称，惠普将在下月进行的CES大会上展示多款WebOS平板机机型，它们将支持新一代4G无线网络，配备USB 3.0接口。
FoxNews在报道中仍然使用了此前传言的PalmPad平板机名称，他们引用可靠消息称，惠普将在CES上展示三款PalmPad不同机型，并且将运行此前从未披露的WebOS 2.5.1系统（可能是平板机专用系统），可以看做是HP Slate的后继机型。其中的三款差异较小，主要针对家用消费领域，配备迷你HDMI接口，支持Sprint的4G网络，前后各置一摄像头（前130万像素，后300万像素）。
惠普第四款机型则主要针对大学在校生，适合阅读，并附带内部教育软件，可以进行硬件配置定制，适合大部分用户。据称它将配备一个8.9寸显示屏，明年秋天推出，但它不会在下月的CES上亮相。
虽然三款要在CES上展示的WebOS平板机机型配置等信息还没有最终确定，但预计它搭载的显示屏将大于8.9寸，接近iPad的9.7寸，并且要比前者更薄，重1.25磅，配备USB 3.0接口。
此前惠普高层Todd Bradley在其电话会议上对其股东表示，其WebOS产品将在明年初亮相，据此预计惠普有可能在明年三月份将WebOS平板机推向市场。
PalmPad设计图

description.hltext_display: Agora, a UFS possui 38 programas de pós, sendo 28 núcleos de mestrado acadêmico
description.content:
A Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (Capes/MEC) aprovou mais dois cursos de mestrado acadêmico da UFS. São eles: Direito e Engenharia Civil. O resultado foi divulgado sexta-feira, 17, na 123ª Reunião do Conselho Técnico-Científico da Educação Superior (CTC-ES), que ocorreu de 6 a 10 de dezembro em Brasília.
Leia também:
Os últimos cursos de mestrado que a Capes concedeu parecer favorável foram os seguintes: Ciências Fisiológicas, Matemática, Arqueologia e Geociências e Análise de Bacias. Esses dois últimos estão com inscrições abertas: Arqueologia até 14 de janeiro de 2011 (há 20 vagas) e Geociências e Análise de Bacias até o dia 15 do mesmo mês (há 14 vagas). Não haverá inscrições no período de 23/12/2010 a 02/01/2011. Veja o edital.
Outro curso que a Capes também aprovou em 2010 foi o mestrado profissional em Matemática em rede, do qual a UFS faz parte. O braço do MEC para a pós-graduação ainda falta avaliar as propostas de criação dos mestrados em Administração e Serviço Social.
Em 2011, a UFS ministrará 38 cursos de pós stricto sensu, sendo 8 de doutorado, 28 de mestrado acadêmico e 2 de mestrado profissional. Para efeito de comparação, em 2004 a instituição possuía 9 cursos: 1 de doutorado e 8 de mestrado acadêmico.

description.hltext_display: 蔡依林圣诞节开唱 村上隆跨刀打� JOLIN公仔
description.content:
Jolin插画
蔡依林为演唱会试装
“Volkswagen_2010蔡依林MYSELF_CUXI-世界巡回演唱会”将在本月24日至26日，一连三天在台北小巨蛋登场，与歌迷欢度圣诞夜，为了纪念这一刻，华纳音乐自12月24日再推出《Jolin 2010Myself-Dance with me Remix》高音质黑胶唱片（LP）限定盘。演唱会的周边纪念T恤更请到日本知名艺术插画家村上隆担任总监，为Jolin设计一款插画图，未来村上隆还打算推出蔡依林等身一比一公仔。
今年中旬蔡依林因为拍摄国际时尚中文版杂志与村上隆见面，两人用英文相谈甚欢，不仅合影留念，村上隆对Jolin的爱犬屋虎也很喜欢，回到日本后更看着Jolin照片，神来一笔亲自画了一幅插画寄给Jolin，让Jolin受宠若惊，对这插画也爱不释手。这次村上隆得知蔡依林要在圣诞节举办巡回演唱会，于是两方有了新的合作计划，由村上隆挂名总监，然后把蔡依林和爱犬的照片给了旗下设计师团队，派出最一流的艺术家森次庆子设计，森次庆子曾设计出多款脍炙人口的卡通造型人物，更设计过红遍亚洲的神奇宝贝（口袋怪物）卡通、多部电玩软件的角色设计。
这一次由村上隆挂名总监、森次庆子绘出Jolin和woohoo的可爱插画。插画中，Jolin身穿新专辑《Myself2010概念专辑》中的主打宣传服，连牛仔短裤口袋边细微的蕾丝；最令Jolin印象深刻的更是画里的她还摆着voguing姿势，简单的插画却让人感觉栩栩如生，让Jolin直呼好厉害。村上隆也表示，森次庆子画了很多草图给他看，在众多草稿中选出了这一幅画，一看上去直觉就是这幅画了，连他自己都很喜欢，村上隆甚至考虑要依照这图像中的Jolin做出与真人一比一的等身公仔。而12月24日-12月26日演唱会的场外，就会率先贩卖有此插画图像的T恤，让歌迷纪念收藏。
日前，蔡依林也再度为演唱会试装，Jolin身穿一袭历史已逾百年的古董蕾丝洋装，市价过百万。拍照当天也请来设计师为这件古董洋装再加工，在肩膀上做了巧思，结合了古典与前卫，蕾丝及垫肩都是今年时尚相当流行的单品，Jolin表示，演唱会上除了精彩的表演内容，服装上也不会让歌迷失望。拍照当天，屋虎也一起到了摄影棚，本来工作人员还担心屋虎会一直跳到Jolin身上，勾破古董蕾丝洋装，但屋虎彷佛知道衣服看起来价值不菲，一直乖乖的呆在Jolin身旁，也索性让摄影师捕捉到Jolin和屋虎的酷模样，Jolin笑说“好乖喔，很识相啦，古董洋装要是有一丝一毫损伤都是不行。”
12月24日-26日为期3天的《Volkswagen_2010蔡依林MYSELF_CUXI-世界巡回演唱会》，华纳音乐也推出《Jolin 2010Myself-Dance with me Remix》高音质彩胶唱片（LP）限定盘，而彩胶（彩色的黑胶唱片）唱片更是从德国原装产制、极限量特殊的桃红透明胶套包装以及烙印专属流水标号，更附上全新造型双面海报。

description.hltext_display: 경남銀 4,000억대 대출 사기
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
은행 직원·브로커·M&A 전문가·변호사·공제회까지 가담
검찰, 22명 무더기 기소
은행 직원과 브로커, 기업 인수합병(M&A) 전문가, 변호사, 공제회 등이 얽힌 4,000억원대 금융비리가 검찰에 적발됐다.
서울중앙지검 금융조세조사 1부(부장검사 이석환)는 4,000억원대 금융사고인 경남은행 비리와 관련해 경남은행 직원 등 22명을 무더기로 기소했다고 밝혔다. 이번 경남은행 대출 사고는 개인이 일으킨 금융 비리로는 사상 최대 규모인데다 변호사와 건설근로자공제회 직원까지 가담한 것으로 확인돼 충격을 더하고 있다.
검찰은 경남은행의 금융사고를 수사한 결과 사기∙배임∙횡령 등의 혐의로 7명을 구속 기소하고 15명을 불구속 기소하는 한편 1명은 기소중지 처분했다고 이날 밝혔다.
검찰은 경남은행장 명의의 지급보증서 등을 위조해 3,262억원의 보증 손해를 야기한 은행 간부 장모씨 등 2명을 특정경제범죄가중처벌법상 사기 등의 혐의로 구속 기소했다. 이들은 지난 2008년 10월부터 올 4월까지 17개 회사 명의로 16개 금융기관 은행장 명의로 사기대출을 받으면서 경남은행에 3,262억원의 보증책임을 지게 한 혐의를 받고 있다.
검찰은 또 골프장 대주주에게서 뒷돈을 받고 특정금전신탁형태로 300억원을 경남은행에 맡겨 골프장에 투자하도록 하고 1억여원을 챙긴 혐의(배임수재)로 손모(62) 전 건설근로자공제회 이사장도 구속 기소했다. 골프장 대주주 손모(58)씨 등 2명은 배임증재 등의 혐의로 구속 기소됐다.
아울러 경남은행 직원과 결탁해 400억원 상당의 사기대출을 받아 회사를 인수한 뒤 회사 돈 150억원을 횡령해 또다시 M&A를 시도한 변호사 송모(43)씨도 불구속 기소했다.
이 밖에도 '경남은행에 사학연금 자금을 투자해달라'는 부탁과 함께 뇌물 5억여원을 받은 허모(46) 전 사학연금관리공단 본부장과 아파트 시행사에 210억원을 대출해주고 7억원 할인된 가격에 호화 펜트하우스를 분양 받은 저축은행 C사의 조모(49) 이사도 불구속 기소됐다.
검찰은 경남은행 직원들과 변호사, 브로커 등이 일으킨 사고는 총 30건이며 사고금액은 4,136억여원에 이른다고 전했다. 경남은행 직원들이 부실투자로 손실이 발생하자 이를 돌려 막는 과정에서 부실이 확대 재생산됐고 결국 최대 규모의 사고로 이어진 것으로 알려졌다.
검찰의 한 관계자는 "이번 사건은 금융기관 직원 개인에 의한 금융사고 중 사상 최대 규모"라며 "내부 통제 시스템이 취약했고 감시ㆍ감독이 소홀한 점이 화를 키웠다"고 말했다.
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: Pick Up Stix rings in 2011 with new owner
description.content:
Carlson Restaurant Inc. has sold its 74-unit chain Pick Up Stix to Lorne Goldberg, principal of West Coast Capital.
Brands in the West Coast portfolio include Leeann Chin, Mandarin Express and Chin’s Asian Fresh. Carlson also is the owner of T.G.I. Friday’s.
Terms of the deal include 70 Pick Up Stix corporate locations and four franchised units, all located primarily in Southern California.
Goldberg is a Los Angeles-based former investment banker and owner of Stix Holdings LLC. He entered the restaurant industry in 2004 with the purchase of the Mandarin Express chain, which now has 35 units. In 2007, he bought 43-unit Leeann Chin.
After their purchase, Goldberg invested in décor and menu improvements for both Mandarin Express and Leann Chin. He said he plans to do the same for Pick Up Stix. He also plans to move the chain to Bloomington, Minn., where Leann Chin and Mandarin Express are based.

description.hltext_display: Wrestling preview: Area rich in mat talent
description.content:
It's the same old thing at Wilmington, which will again vie for state supremacy. The Wildcats return 12 of their top 14 wrestlers, and transfer Spence Butler from Reed-Custer. He joins Jeremy Bailey, Steve Liaromatis, Blake Olson and a solid group that will make the Wildcats a threat to win the Class A championship.
Coach Byron McNally had a nice turnout for the new Beecher-Grant Park co-op. Things are off to a positive start with several wins on the junior varsity level.
Manteno had a tough break -- literally -- when senior Brendan Toler broke his fibula and dislocated his ankle in the wrestling room before the season. He was a state qualifier last year.
Here's how the teams shape up.
Beecher/Grant Park
Coach: Byron McNally
Key wrestlers: Devin Mahnke, Phil Salmon, Kevin McNally, Tyler Tempco
It's officially Beecher's second year competing, but Grant Park's first. Mahnke, a sophomore, was Beecher's lone wrestler last year, and he went to the state tournament. Grant Park sophomore Tempco (140 pounds) is a remarkable story: he was born without a left hand, and his right hand is underdeveloped. McNally says his goal is to get him the state finals by his senior season. Salmon and McNally, the coach's son, bring valuable experience. The co-op program may not win a lot this winter, but the elder McNally is focused on academics: he has created a "3.0 Club" for wrestlers who can maintain a "B" average. He notes that trophies for staying in that group are bigger than any a wrestler would get for on-the-mat performances.
Bishop McNamara
Coach: Dave Zinanni
Key wrestlers: Rocco Zinanni, Jackson Zirkle, Channing Dolliger, Dalton Major
The Fightin' Irish are low on numbers, but have a nice blend of talent and experience. Zinanni's reliable at heavyweight. Zirkle missed last year but should make a run at qualifying for state this year at 160 pounds. Dolliger, who saw time at quarterback for the football team, came in third last year in Class 1A at 215 pounds. Sophomore Major was one step from the state finals last year and should be in contention this year. Zinanni's goal is to get as many guys as possible to the state finals and have them place.
Bradley-Bourbonnais
Coach: Bryan Smith
Key wrestlers: Adam Dahl, William Thompson, Tyler Villareal
Jacob Gingerich is gone to Illinois. Smith hopes Villareal can fill the void. Dahl and Thompson give the Boilers a nice 1-2 combo. Both could make it to the state finals. Smith said up to seven freshmen and sophomores may contribute. Senior Chris Foster should also play a role.
Central
Coach: Travis Williams
Key wrestlers: Mike Morrison, Kory Kleinert, Kate Noden
The Comets got off to a good start with a win over Reed-Custer, which was ranked 13th in Class 1A in an early poll. Morrison qualified for state last year, and Kleinert was an alternate. Both have good chances to head to Champaign this year for the individual state meet. The Comets could run into Reed-Custer or Wilmington in regional competition, so heading to the state team finals will be tough.
Coal City
Coach: Mark Masters
Key wrestlers: Tony Francisco, Robert Shoemaker
The Coalers are ranked 16th in Class 1A by Illinois Best Weekly after wins over Central and Gibson City-Melvin-Sibley. They got off to a 4-0 start, which Masters joked was "four more victories than I thought we'd have right now." Francisco (215 pounds) and Shoemaker (130 pounds) give Masters two solid seniors to lead what he called "a youthful squad." Both qualified for the state meet last year. The Coalers did catch a tough break when senior Jake Chambers dislocated his elbow earlier this year. Senior Nick Scrapates should also provide support. Coal City was 9-11 last year and should finish noticeably better this winter.
Dwight
Coach: Lenny Tryner
Key wrestlers: Lucas Fink, Christian Kulla
Dwight went just 1-27 last year, but things should improve this winter. Fink (160 pounds) and Kulla (215) give Tryner two senior captains that will lead an inexperienced group. The duo could make it to Champaign. Tryner should benefit from higher numbers in the program. He'll have nine guys this year after only four last year. Dwight's schedule is tough, but the green Trojans should get better as the season wears on.
Herscher
Coach: Neil Posmer
Key wrestlers: Brandon Malone, Joey Malone, Aiden Witheft, Nick Hinrichs
Herscher's had some solid finishes to start the season. The Tigers placed second at the Seneca Fighting Irish Invitational, and they're ranked 20th in Class 1A in Illinois Best Weekly. That's the first time the publication has ranked the Tigers. The Tigers picked up a win over Central at their triangular last week. Brandon Malone won the 103-pound bracket at Seneca. Joey Malone (125), Witheft (130) and Hinrichs (140) medaled. Posmer is hoping to finish in the top half of the I8.
Manteno
Coach: Cory Blanchette
Key wrestlers: Zack Dietsch, Zakk Yuhasz, Mark Deery, Brendan Toler (injured)
The Panthers suffered a big blow when Toler broke his fibula and dislocated his ankle in an early season workout. Blanchette said there's an "outside chance" the senior can return for regionals. The Panthers are also dealing with six wrestlers out for disciplinary reasons early. Until everything settles down, Dietsch, Yuhasz and Deery will need to step up. They should keep the Panthers steady and in contention for an upper half I-8 finish. Deery and Yuhasz have already earned second-place finishes at the Seneca Fighting Irish Invitational.
Peotone
Coach: Mike Heywood
Key wrestlers: Jake Hilliard, Tyler Nagel, Alex Young
Peotone should fare well in the Interstate Eight if the Blue Devils can stay healthy. Last year, Heywood had to deal with open weights, injuries and illness. That left him hurting when he tried to to fill out a full lineup. He likes his upperclassmen, and said the underclassmen should do a good job of filling out the card. Hilliard, Nagel and Young are all threats to make the Class 1A state finals.
Reed-Custer
Coach: Andy Gleixner
Key wrestlers: Trent Lyons, Steve Rosenburg, Billy Chancey, Matt Engel, Zach Boyer
The Comets should have a solid winter. They're ranked 22nd in Class 1A by Illinois Best Weekly. Lyons (112/119), Rosenburg (119/125), Chancey (145), Engel (135/140) and Boyer (160/171) give Gleixner a group of five that could land the Comets in the state finals. All have a good chance to go as individuals, and Gleixner said his team has "built the room" around that group. Senior Luke Vandermyde (160/171) and junior Shane Speed (189) should also contribute.
Wilmington
Coach: Rob Murphy
Key wrestlers: Jeremy Baily, Blake Olson, Steve Liaromatis
The Wildcats are loaded. Illinois Best Weekly ranks them tops in Class 1A. After a fourth-place finished last season, Wilmington to return to the top spot, which it held in 2007-2009. Eight wrestlers who qualified for state are back. Three-time qualifier Bailey is on the mend from football. Olson and Liaromatis are two-time qualifiers. Murphy says his team is "very, very young" and need to be strong when the state tournament rolls along. Several wrestlers are expected to make it to the state individual meet.

description.hltext_display: [22/12/2010] Radar volta na Av. Assis Brasil
description.content:
Notícia >> Radar volta na Av. Assis Brasil (22/12/2010)
Érica Samara da Silva
Motoristas que trafegam pela Avenida Assis Brasil com velocidade acima de 40 km/h já estão sujeitos a tomar multa.
A Secretaria Municipal dos Transportes admite que apesar de a via estar inserida na lista de pontos monitorados com radares móveis, a fiscalização estava suspensa porque a sinalização era inadequada e insuficiente.
Ontem, após adequação e pedidos dos próprios moradores, o equipamento voltou a ser utilizado para coibir os abusos dos condutores. A fiscalização ocorrerá de maneira aleatória até o final deste mês e a via será inserida na programação de janeiro, quando será definida a periodicidade do radar na via.
O limite de 40 km/h é alvo de críticas dos motoristas, mas a Secretaria alega que a velocidade máxima ideal para prevenir acidentes é essa em função da proximidade de escola e igreja. Além da Vila Camargo, a Avenida Assis Brasil também liga bairros populosos como o Nova Suiça e Vila Cavinato ao Centro.

description.hltext_display: Minico hangs close, loses to 5A Highland
description.author: Ryan Howe Times-News writer Magicvalley.com
description.content:
RUPERT - Minico can chalk up Tuesday's 44-32 loss to Highland as a moral victory.
While it was much better than the 59-20 mercy rule beat-down Minico received Nov. 30 at Highland, the Spartans were still no match for the long, quick and athletic Rams.
But then again, nobody has been.
Class 5A Highland remained undefeated, improving to 11-0. The Rams shot 42 percent from the field and played an aggressive, in-your-face defense that frustrated the Spartans into 24 turnovers.
"We did what we wanted to do and we did some things well tonight," said Minico coach Joe D. Shepard. "The idea was we were going to delay a little bit, and it worked in the first half."
Indeed it did, as Minico trailed by only two midway through the second quarter.
However, a Highland run late in the quarter made it 21-12 at halftime as Minico had as many turnovers as points.
"Their press is what hurt us the most because they had to have 20 points off steals and layups," Shepard said. "We had spurts where we turned the ball over, but it's a lot better than when we played at Highland. Once we got the ball up the floor and got in an offense, I thought we got some good shots, and shots that we normally make."
Taylor O'Connell led Minico with 11 points and Marlee Chandler followed with eight.
The last time these two teams played, Highland's sophomore duo of Dylan Gonzalez and Dakota Gonzalez combined to score 32 points. But on Tuesday, Minico employed a triangle-and-two defense that held the sisters to only 14. Dakota Gonzalez scored 12 to lead the Rams, while senior post Cassidy Elgan had 10.
Just past the midway point of the season, Minico's record is now 3-8 (1-3 Great Basin Conference). When the Spartans return from the holiday break, they will have a vital stretch of five straight conference games, starting at Jerome on Jan. 6.
Highland 44, Minico 32

Minico 8 4 9 11 - 32

description.hltext_display: Parliament Divided
description.content:
The sharp division of the Parliament of Ghana over the Petroleum Revenue Management Bill, 2010 is set to continue this week as official debate of the Bill begins on the floor of the House.
At the level of a Joint Committee of Finance and Mines and Energy which was tasked to examine the Bill, MPs failed to reach consensus on the use of portions of petroleum revenue as collateral for loans and other government liabilities; the percentage of petroleum revenue that should be channeled into annual budgets; and the establishment of a Public Interest and Accountability Committee (PIAC) to enhance public accountability and transparency in the management of the petroleum revenue.
It is understood that these three knotty issues will be subjected to voting by all members of Parliament on the floor of the House. The debate began on Friday and anticipated voting on the issues has generated anxiety, particularly as Ghanaian MPs are noted to vote on policies and legislations along political party lines.
The comforting news, perhaps, is that in the case of these three provisions, "It is not straight-jacketed government versus opposition," Hon Dominic Nitiwul, a member of the Joint Committee of Finance and Mines and Energy of Parliament, informed participants of a roundtable discussion on the Transparency Provisions in Ghana's Petroleum Bills held in Accra last Friday.
On the particular issue of the PIAC, Hon Nitiwul, who is also the New Patriotic Party (NPP) Member of Parliament (MP) for Bimbilla, argued that "It is not true that all MPs are against the PIAC. It is a sharply divided house; it is 50-50 down the line."
The view of many stakeholders in the petroleum sector is that this week will herald an interesting moment in the history of the Ghanaian Parliament when electorates can monitor to see whether their MPs will vote to secure Ghana's oil money against its use as collateral for loans and other liabilities or not. It is also time to ascertain whether MPs would welcome the introduction of another layer of public oversight, in the form of a Public Interest and Accountability Committee to monitor adherence to the Revenue Management Act when passed.
In the interim, Public Agenda can confirm that Hon Nitiwul and Maxwell Kofi Jumah, MP for Asokwa, are two of the MPs who want the provision for the establishment of a PIAC to be maintained. In addition, the duo is against legislating for the use of future oil revenue as collateral for loans and other government liabilities. The paper's information is that many more MPs from both the majority and the minority sides see merit in the provisions under contention.
The Petroleum Revenue Management Bill, 2010 was presented and read the first time in Parliament in July. It was subsequently referred to the Joint Committee of Finance and Mines and Energy for consideration and report in accordance with the Constitution of Ghana and Standing Orders of the legislature.
The Joint Committee has since held extensive consultations on the Bill with various stakeholders and visited some oil producing countries which are globally acclaimed as models of best practice to gather views and draw lessons on petroleum operations and management of petroleum resources.
"Whilst the Committee reached consensus on majority of the clauses of the Bill, there were few clauses that the Committee was unable to reach consensus on," says a report by the Joint Committee on the Petroleum Revenue Management Bill, which this paper has sighted.
Ironically, these "few clauses" include clauses that have been described in civil society circles as the embodiment of transparency in the bill. Specifically, clauses 53-59 of the Bill, which address the establishment of a PIAC have become thorny.
Against this backdrop, the CSO Platform on Oil and Gas organized last Friday's roundtable to deliberate on these and other matters bordering on transparency and accountability in the Petroleum Revenue Management Bill, as well as, the Petroleum (Exploration and Production) Bill, 2010, which was withdrawn last week for further deliberations outside Parliament.
Since the PIAC seems to have become an albatross, at least in the view of some MPs, it is important to understand the rationale for making a provision for it. According to Mangowa A. Ghanney, who is the Deputy Director, Legal, Ministry of Finance and Economic Planning, the PIAC was provided for in accordance with current international best practice trends where transparency is progressively being underscored.
Besides, the Executive wanted to have as many levels of oversight as possible. Again, she said, it is in fulfillment of the wishes of over 85% of the people who were part of consultations on the Petroleum Revenue Management Bill in March this year. This proportion of the stakeholders "were interested in an oversight that was not governmental; they wanted something that was aside government," Mrs Ghanney indicated.
Hon Kofi Jumah, who sides with the introduction of the PIAC, points out that "If that public interest committee is allowed, it will help all of us...because you need an independent oversight body out there."
The view of Emmanuel Kuyole of the Revenue Watch Institute is that transparency provisions such as the one on the PIAC sets Ghana apart from other oil producing countries. "The lack of transparency and accountability is why other countries are having problems," he stressed.
According to Kojo Pumpuni Asante, Head of Programs at the Ghana Center for Democratic Development, the inclusion of the PIAC in the Bill "is a reflection of the fact that we [Ghana] have learnt lessons. We know what has happened in other countries and we want to avoid them. We should be proud of that. It's a positive addition."
On the other hand, he called for clarification of issues relating to the selection of people unto the PIAC, their term of office and security of tenure.

description.hltext_display: Anunció el gobernador la creación del Parque del Bicentenario en la capital
How To Attract And Meet Women Online
description.content:
Meet women online with the click of a mouse. With the advance of the internet, the world wide web has open new doors for people all over the globe to get to know each other. If you have a computer, internet service, and the time, you can find a woman.
Meeting someone over the internet can help make the dating game a little or a lot easier. It just depends on whether or not you are a shy person or not. Some people have no problem finding that special person when out in about, while others cringe at the thought of approaching women. No matter your personality or circumstance, using the world wide web to do your searching will not hurt a bit. Just be sure to be safe and choose who you agree to meet offline wisely.
Utilize your favorite search engine and begin your search by typing in what you are looking for. For example, if you are interested in dating a woman who is Asian, type in the search bar, meet Asian ladies. Just be specific if you are looking for a particular type. There are loads of dating websites so you could very easily find yourself joining dozens if you are not used to this process.
When you do sign up with a site you are comfortable with you will have to do a profile for yourself. It is wise to know how to attract women online and that way you will get better success. Your profile should be enticing and inviting. There has to be something that is eye catching that will make her want to know more about you. Of course there is no need for over kill. You do not want to make yourself sound pretentious.
Be honest about yourself so that you will not get caught up later trying to maintain a lie you may have told in a previous conversation. This will also prevent you from ending up with someone you really are not compatible with. When you are dating someone over the internet you will have to make honesty a priority.
Every one embellishes a little bit whether over the web or over the phone. You just have to have enough self discipline to not let it get out of control. You should be honest with the person you at chatting with and demand the same respect from them.
This will help to cut down on confusion. There will be a time when you and the woman you met over the internet will want to meet. This is why you should be as honest as possible from the start especially about your looks because one day the truth will reveal itself.
It can be a new and exciting experiment to meet women online. Just remember to always be careful with the information you give and the information you believe. The Information super highway is a very big place with a lot of people on it so take your time finding the right one.

description.hltext_display: Wolverines move happily into holiday break
description.content:
GARWIN - A senior-dominated group ended a string of losing seasons last winter.
The problem for GMG was that it had to start over with a new group in 2010-11. The Wolverines have had their growing pains to start the boys' basketball season, but will go into the holidays on a high note after collecting their first win of the season Tuesday - 63-57 over Dunkerton.
Brandon Lolwing led GMG (1-7, 1-6 Iowa Star) with 20 points to go with 10 rebounds. Kyle Warren added 17 points and 11 rebounds for the first win in the Wolverines' new gymnasium.
GMG started the year dropping their first seven games by an average of 24 points per contest. The Wolverines returned only 28 total points scored from last season's 14-7 squad.
"We have very little varsity experience," said GMG head coach Dean Aldrich. "These first eight games are the only varsity experience we have. We've had some growing pains, but we're learning. It means a lot to win that first game, especially a close game."
The Wolverines, which failed to reach double digits in wins in the decade previous to last year, pushed ahead by as many as 12 in the second half before Dunkerton (1-7-, 1-6) stormed back.
GMG's lead dropped to two in the final 2 minutes, but the Wolverines held on. GMG missed seven of its first eight free throws in the fourth quarter before finishing the game by making its final four.
Wade Barritt, who finished with 11 points and five rebounds, made a pair from the line with 11 seconds left to extend the lead back to five. He then made another with 4 seconds remaining for the final margin.
"Barritt made free throws at the end for us and we were able to win it," Aldrich said. "We made some free throws and handled the pressure better, we didn't handle it perfect but it was better. We missed too many, but got the free throws when had to."
GMG led 30-27 at the intermission and started the second half on a 9-0 spurt, led by Warren, to quickly build a double-digit advantage.
"We told the guys that we've got this brand new building and we've got to start taking it to people," Aldrich said. "We had a good start tonight and wanted to do the same in the second half, and we did."
Lolwing scored 15 of his 20 in the first half as the Wolverines led by as many as eight.
GMG held Dunkerton to six points in the first quarter and then again shut them down in the third quarter (seven points).
"On defense we were able to switch things up tonight," Aldrich said. "It's pretty much been zone all the way up to now, we had to get our legs under us and we don't have a lot of depth. We were able to go to man tonight and we'll continue to do more switching on defense."
Point guard Chris Read finished with seven assists for the Wolverines, who return to action Jan. 4 as CAL comes to Garwin.
Jacob Salisbury finished with 14 points for the Raiders. Dillon Anderson added 13 and Shane Gamerdinger 12.

We have very little varsity experience; These first eight games are the only varsity experience we have. We've had some growing pains, but we're learning. It means a lot to win that first game, especially a close game.

description.hltext_display: 외국인 강세장에 베팅한다
description.content:
이달 들어서만 3조원 순매수…지수 상승 이끌어
최근 북한 리스크에도 불구하고 외국인이 국내 증시에서 연일 주식을 사들이고 있다. 외국인들은 이달 들어서만 3조원이 넘는 자금을 쏟아 부으며 2,000시대를 주도하고 있다. 전문가들은 외국인들이 올해에 이어 내년에도 국내 증시의 강세가 이어질 것으로 보고 이에 베팅을 하는 것으로 진단하고 있다.
22일 코스피지수는 전날보다 1.02포인트(0.05%) 오른 2,03.11포인트에 거래를 마쳐 올 최고치 행진을 이어갔다. 특히 전날 316억원을 순매도하며 잠시 숨 고르기에 나섰던 외국인들은 이날 다시 3,562억원어치를 사들이며 국내 기관의 매도 물량(4,637억원)을 받아냈다.
지난 9ㆍ10월 한 달 평균 4조원 안팎의 자금을 투입하며 장을 이끌었던 외국인들은 지난달 순매수 규모가 1조6,000억원에 그치며 잠시 소강상태를 보이기도 했지만 이달 들어 22일 현재 3조1,722억원을 사들이며 주가를 2,000선 위로 강하게 끌어올렸다.
외국인들은 특히 최근 한반도의 지정학적 리스크 재부각에도 아랑곳하지 않고 ‘바이 코리아’에 나서고 있는 모습이다. 과거에는 지정학적 리스크가 부각된 경우 비록 단기적이기는 하지만 부정적인 대응을 했지만 최근에는 학습효과 때문에 악재가 생길 때마다 되레 주식을 사들이는 양상이다.
실제로 2003년 외국인들은 13조원의 돈을 국내 주식시장에 쏟아 부었지만 같은 해 3월 북한의 미사일 발사가 있던 당시에는 해당일 1,085억원을 순매도한 것을 시작으로 5거래일 연속 매도 우위를 보였었다. 하지만 연평도 해상사격 훈련에 따른 북한의 재도발 우려감이 높았던 20일 외국인은 1,831억원을 순매수하면서 오히려 지수를 떠받쳤다.
한 외국계 증권사 전무는 “연평도 사격 훈련이 있던 당시 외국계 자산운용사에서 별 다른 문의전화가 없었다”며 “이제 외국인들 사이에서는 오히려 북한 악재를 주식 매수의 기회로 인식하려는 경향마저 있다”고 전했다.
결국 외국인들은 미국 등의 양적완화를 통해 풍부해진 유동성을 바탕으로 글로벌 금융위기 이후 국제 경쟁력이 높아진 국내 기업 주식의 편입을 늘리고 있는 것이다.
전성민 골드만삭스 상무는 “선진국을 중심으로 풀린 돈은 성장성이 높은 곳을 찾기 마련인데 전세계적으로 리스크가 상대적으로 적으면서 글로벌 기업들이 다수 포진한 한국 증시에 외국인들이 관심을 기울일 수밖에 없는 것”이라고 말했다.
최근 미국의 경기 회복세가 예상보다 빠르게 진행되고 있는데다 양적완화 정책도 당분간 유지될 것으로 전망돼 외국인에 의한 상승 장세가 당분간 지속될 가능성이 높다는 분석이다.
박중제 토러스투자증권 연구원은 “최근 한 달간 US철강지수 상승률이 S&P500지수를 웃돌고 있고 미국 최대 건축자재 전문업체인 홈데포 역시 다우지수 종목 중 가장 높은 상승률을 보이는 것은 미국의 경기회복을 강하게 시사하는 대목”이라며 “미국의 양적완화 정책도 당분간 지속될 것으로 보여 주식시장에는 우호적인 환경이 조성되고 있다”고 말했다.
여기에 원ㆍ달러 환율이 추세적으로 하락세를 보이고 있어 외국인들은 주가 차익에 이어 환차익이라는 덤까지 얻을 수 있는 상황이다.
이종성 하나대투증권 연구원은 “블룸버그에 따르면 우리나라 원화가치는 내년 8.4% 정도 절상될 것으로 전망된다”며 “이는 환차익에 의한 글로벌 유동성 유입을 촉진시키는 촉매가 될 것”이라고 내다봤다.

description.hltext_display: 百度诉360不正当竞争一审胜诉 360可能上诉
description.content:
昨天上午，百度诉360不正当竞争一案在北京市二中院有了一审结果。法院一审认定奇智软件(北京)有限公司和北京三际无限网络科技有限公司的行为构成不正当竞争，判决二公司停止侵权，刊登声明以消除影响，赔偿原告北京百度网讯科技有限公司以及百度时代网络技术(北京)有限公司经济损失及诉讼合理支出共计38.5万元。
360“恶评插件”锁定百度
原告诉称，今年3月初，两被告在其360安全卫士7.0软件版本中，将两原告共同经营的百度工具栏和百度地址栏两款软件定义为“恶评插件”，并描述为“此类插件具有恶意行为，可能会危害您的电脑，建议您立即清理”。按照360安全卫士之提示进行操作可以在默认情况下删除该两款软件，且两被告在www.360.cn网站将该软件描述为“具有强制安装，自身无法正常卸载”。
同年7月，原告又收到网民举报，两被告在其最新升级后的360安全卫士7.3beta版不但继续对百度工具栏和地址栏进行恶意贬损和诋毁行为，而且在“360杀毒”和“查杀木马”功能中，将该两款软件作为“病毒查杀”，并描述两软件对用户电脑构成“安全威胁”，用户按照360杀毒默认设置，即可卸载百度工具栏和地址栏软件。
百度起诉360索赔千万
原告认为，两被告打着安全检测的幌子，肆意篡改百度搜索页面结果，借助百度知名度为其www.360.cn网站非法攫取流量，并且对百度工具栏和百度地址栏两软件进行恶意贬损，阻碍该两款软件的传播和运行，以期通过这种非法手段抢夺原告用户，已构成不正当竞争并索赔1000万元。
奇智软件公司和三际无限公司答辩称，公司与百度网讯公司和百度时代公司不构成竞争关系，并不存在百度网讯公司和百度时代公司指控的各项不正当竞争行为。
负面介绍属不正当竞争
法院认为，奇智软件公司在其所有的360安全卫士软件、三际无限公司在其所有的360安全中心网站中将百度工具栏和百度地址栏软件称为“恶评插件”和“恶评软件”的行为;奇智软件公司所有的360安全卫士软件在查杀病毒、木马时将上述两款涉案软件标识出来并进行虚假描述诱导用户删除的行为，以及三际无限公司在其经营的360安全中心网站中无依据地对上述两款涉案软件进行负面介绍的行为，均构成不正当竞争。
关于两被告指控二原告人为操纵网络用户对于上述两款涉案软件的投票结果的主张，以及关于三际无限公司故意删除网络用户对于上述两款涉案软件的好评，构成不正当竞争的主张，法院认为证据不足，不予支持。

description.hltext_display: 联力发布“大型”迷你塔式机箱PC-A04
description.content:
台湾联力近日又发布了一款机箱新品“PC-A04”，虽是迷你塔式结构，但内部空间非常充裕。
PC-A04依然采用全铝结构，整体尺寸460×386×188毫米，净重4.1公斤，兼容Micro ATX、Mini-ITX规格主板，顶部有一个USB 3.0、一个USB 2.0、一个eSATA和两个音频口，内部依然提供了多达七个3.5寸硬盘位，模块化设计，可左右或前后移动，另有两个外部5.25寸光驱位并可在其中安装一块2.5寸硬盘或固态硬盘。
机箱中还有四个扩展插槽位，显卡最大允许长度也达到了370毫米，足以放下一块巨大的双芯型Radeon HD 5970。
散热方面，前面板和顶部分别预装了两个、一个120毫米系统风扇。
PC-A04提供了银色(PC-A04A)、黑色(PC-A04B)两种外观，即日起上市，台湾地区建议零售价3100元新台币，约合人民币690元。

description.hltext_display: 调查称八成人认为存汉语应用危机 专家呼吁保护 12-22
description.content:
据《长江日报》报道，今年1月23日、24日两天，同济大学、华东师大等六所上海高� �自主招生测试密集举行，考生人数逾万。其中4所高� �要么是理科生不考语文，要么是全部考生只考数学和英语两科。这一“学科歧视”现象引起众多考生、教师的关注。漫画：朱慧卿
提要
《汉语的危机》作者、《文艺争鸣》杂志编审朱竞：汉语危机的背后，是中华民族的文化危机。汉语表达的日益粗鄙化，以及公众对汉语的普遍� 视，反� 出当代中国人与自身� 统文明之间出现了难以弥合的断裂。汉语使用的碎片化与不规范化，还会给国人相互间的交流与理解带来巨大困难，从而可能危害国人的文化认同与民族认同。 不久前举行的首届中国语言生活学术� �讨会上，中国人民大学文学院副院长贺阳教授，对当前大学生汉语应用能力表示担忧，引起不少网友共鸣。
有网友表示，在“外语热”、网络语言泛滥，以及影像文化盛行等� � 的冲击下，不只是大学生，很多国人的汉语应用能力都下降了。 上周，中国青年报社会调查中心通过清� �咨询和民意中国网，对3269人进行的一项民意调查显示，80.8%的人确认我们当前存在汉语应用能力危机，另有19.2%的人不赞成这一说法。
受访者中，54.4%的人具有大学本科及以上学历。
汉语应用能力差，可引发汉语退化
2009年，贺阳的学生对清华大学、中国人民大学、北京外国语大学和中央戏剧学院319名学生进行了一项测试。结果显示，在语言文字能力上，30%的学生不及� �，68%的学生得分在70分以下。 对中国人民大学部分学生进行测试时，贺阳发现，66.2%的人存在信件书写� �式问题，86.5%的人存在行文语气问题，100%的人存在语法问题。 北京某高� �� �究生王平(化名)虽然对自己的汉语应用能力很自信，但他依然觉得自己有问题，特别是在应用文的行文� �式与语气运用上，有些拿捏不准。 在给一家用人单位写实� 自荐信时，王平曾上网仔细� �对了自己的行文� �式，发现信里存在一大� �毛病。“虽然我在小学时也学过应用文写作，但由于平时写得太少，久而久之就忘得差不多了。”
上海某私企员工李君(化名)说，不论是说话还是写作，自己经常会感到词穷，要么语塞，要么不知道什么情境该用什么词。“在表达某个观点时，我总依赖于一个固定的词语，感觉自己找不到合适的替代词。”
本次调查中，受访者坦言自己在汉语应用中存在不少问题——“词语储备不够，经常感觉词穷”(64.8%)、“词语的使用、搭配存在问题”(28.6%)、“行文� �式存在问题”(27.8%)、“语法错误比较多”(17.4%)、“不认识的汉字太多”(16.4%)等。
贺阳指出，“汉语应用危机”一方面是指人们运用汉语的能力下降，出现交流障碍；另一方面是指汉语作为母语，其本身的结构变得混乱，功能发生萎缩，进而遭遇被其他语言替代的危险。
“汉语应用能力差，如果变成一种长期而且普遍的存在，那汉语本身就会受到侵蚀，作为母语的汉语本体就会出现退化。”贺阳说。
汉语应用能力危机源于“外语热”？ 什么原� � 成了我们汉语应用能力的危机？73.2%的人认为，原� 在于“网络时代，人们在使用汉语时不太规范”。
《汉语的危机》作者、《文艺争鸣》杂志编审朱竞指出，网络语言的流行虽然是汉语适应社会进步的结果，但也会带来汉语的碎片化。不规范的网络用语，对于不常上网的人来说很难理解，久而久之，不同群体间的交流，会变得越来越困难。
在贺阳看来，我们不必过于担心网络语言会冲击国人的汉语能力。“语言系统具有自我净化功能，一种新的语言要� 要想进入大众语言系统，首先要被大众广泛接受。而网络语言只被少数人使用，很难对汉语本身� 成污染。” 调查中，52.0%的人认为，汉语危机的原� 在于“很多人重视外语学� ，轻视汉语学� ”。此外，还有“现在人喜欢解构汉语，稀奇古怪的词语层出不穷”(43.6%)、“影像文化� 据绝对优势，文字越来越不重要”(30.1%)等。
“如今英语比汉语更受重视。”李君说，在学� �里，英语是必修课，而大学语文只是选修课。许多学生为了学英语，连专业课都不好好上，更别说专心上语文课了。
在找工作时，用人单位也更看重应聘者的英语水平，这让很多大学生对英语等级证书趋之若鹜。“但工作后� 会发现，不论是写文件、作报告，还是与人交流，汉语的使用率和作用远大于英语。”
朱竞指出，如今不单是大学生和用人单位过度重视英语，就连许多中国作家的作品，也开始带着一股“西文腔”。
“试问，当一个国家的母语教育还未得到切实保证，就盲目地推广外语教育，甚至把外语等同于母语去推广的时候，这不是本末倒置吗？当越来越多的中国学生将人生最宝贵的时间，用来死记硬背那些不属于自己民族文化的外语时，后果又是什么呢？”
贺阳指出，语言的生命力表现为，在不同时空条件下，它都能够给使用者提供得体的表达方式。但我们现在的许多年轻人，总是喜欢反叛和解构，认为只要与众不同就是创新，经常把正式场合与非正式场合用语随意混用。然而，混合后的新式语言不论用在哪种场合，都显得不太合适，都伤害了汉语的表达功能。
“在这一过程中，许多媒体起着推波助澜的消极作用。比如现在网上流行的‘给力’一词，本是非正式场合使用的词语，但现在却铺天盖地，出现在公共媒体上。”贺阳说。 汉语日益粗鄙化，反� 出中国人与自身文明之间的断裂 本次调查显示，47.1%的人将汉语危机的原� ，归咎于“当前汉语教育存在问题，让许多人不愿花力气学汉语”。
“汉语听、说、读、写能力，本应是中小学教育解决的问题，但现在汉语在应用上遭遇危机，使我们不得不反思当前的汉语教育。”贺阳说。
调查显示，仅两成人(23.5%)对当前汉语教育有好评，而且仅有4.0%的人认为当前汉语教育水平“非常好”。更多的人(57.1%)认为，我们的汉语教育“一般”，16.5%的人觉得“比较差”，2.9%的人认为“非常差”。
李君认为，当前的语文教学存在很大问题，教学方式太过生硬死板。语文课上，教师往往要求学生总结每段话的中心思想，并一再强调“� �准答案”，目的只有一个，就是应付考试。 陕西省安康市某小学语文教师陈叶(化名)说，在教学制度没有改变的前提下，呼吁课外阅读和批判应试教育，都只是徒劳。“学� �对教师的考� �，最主要的是学生考试成绩。为了‘保饭碗’、‘争优秀’，老师很难按照自己的想法教学。”
近来，民国时期的语文教材《开明国语课本》，受到不少网友热捧，甚至多次重印后仍面临断货。
此书的出版负责人介绍，出版此书也是对现行语文教育不满的一种表达，语文教育不能只是“一课一练”，它更应该是对孩子心灵的熏陶。
朱竞认为，《开明国语课本》确实能体现汉语教育的精髓——学生在学� 充满美感语言的同时，还能受到道德教育。“我们应该让孩子去阅读更多汉语经典，自然� 得汉语中所蕴含的道德准则与行为规范。” 汉语教育怎� �才能提高呢？本次调查显示，“语文课应列为大学必修课”(71.1%)呼声最高，其次还有“要让大家认识母语水平对自身发展的重要性”(65.4%)，“应该更� 注重汉语的实际应用”(60.7%)，“应� 强对汉语� 统经典的学� ”(57.5%)，“制定汉语基本� �准，并推广汉语水平测试”(50.6%)，“语文教学避免死记硬背”(45.9%)等。
贺阳表示，汉语不仅是人们日常生活中的交流工具，更担负着民族认同与文化认同的重任。汉语教育不应仅仅存在于语文课上，更应进入人们的日常生活。
“汉语的应用分为‘看得懂’、‘通顺’和‘给人以美的享受’三个层次。我们不能只讲求‘用’，还要考虑在什么层次上用。我们不能只教会学生‘看得懂’，还要在学� �、社会和媒体的引导下，让年轻人追求得体的、给人以美的享受的汉语应用方式。”
“保卫汉语势在必行。”朱竞认为，汉语应用能力危机的背后，是中华民族的文化危机。
她认为，汉语表达的日益粗鄙化，以及公众对汉语的普遍� 视，反� 出当代中国人与自身� 统文明之间出现了难以弥合的断裂。汉语使用的碎片化与不规范化，还会给国人相互间的交流与理解带来巨大困难，从而可能危害国人的文化认同与民族认同。� � � 实� 生 向�

description.hltext_display: 郭美美新专辑性感来电 神秘男子现场频接送
description.content:
郭美美
(查看更多娱乐新闻，点击进入娱乐频道)
继2007年的专辑《我的答铃》后，郭美美时隔三年，于2010年终于推出最新国语唱片《我是郭美美》。近日，她在接受《hello星乐坊》节目采访时表示，自己继“螳螂舞”之后，远赴韩国又学到了不少新的舞蹈动作，在新专辑里均有体现。同时，她还惊爆在录音的时候，父亲为了不打扰其录音，经常会扮装神秘男子去录音现场接送她回家。字里行间，幸福至极。
据了解，为了这张筹备近两年的新专辑，郭美美所在的华纳唱片不惜狠砸百万送她到韩国，重金礼聘韩国性感女星李孝利的舞蹈老师Feel为专辑的首波主打《和我来电》编舞；封面和内页部分则邀请曾为亚洲天王Rain拍摄专辑《Rainism》封面的摄影师李在允掌镜；MV更是由当红女子团体《少女时代》的MV导演赵修贤执导，专辑份量可见非同一般。
同时，她还向网友透露，除了精良的外包装，《代我爱他》、《海水正蓝》和《许愿树》更是由她自己亲自创作：像《放了爱》是描述恋人思念情人，而《二人同行》和《代我爱他》是演唱难度颇高，而使她声线的转变更为成熟。
在现场，郭美美十分活跃，不仅现场演绎歌曲，还当起了老师教主持人自己在新专辑的舞蹈动作。在《hello星乐坊》的互动环节时，酷狗网友都纷纷表达了对郭美美的喜爱，有不少网友表示，喜欢郭美美的音乐，虽然不够性感，但很甜美，，她的情歌有她自己的特点，不比刻意的低沉，没有流泪的宣泄，静静地唱给你听，却带着小女生对感情的认真，执着。对此番评价，美美自然笑的乐得花，并表示，将继续努力出好作品，献给这些歌迷朋友。

description.hltext_display: How to wear animal print with style
description.author: Kimberley Heit
description.content:
Animal print is currently making a big fashion comeback, and without fail it tends to do so every few seasons. It can prove a tricky trend to master, so the following article provides a few tips on how to wear animal print with style.
Six tips for wearing animal print with style:
1.Keep it simple
A piece of animal print apparel is bound to make a statement, so make sure it forms the focal point of your outfit. This means the rest of your outfit should support your animal print piece, rather than compete for attention.
2. Pair it with neutral colors
Generally it is best to stick to pairing animal print with neutral colors. Think black, beige, brown, grey and white. In addition it is a good idea to stick to prints that actually resemble animal colors. For example, a tiger print in tones of white, black and orange would be a natural choice, but a black print on an electric blue background is best left to those in the youth age group or those with a real flair for creative dressing.
3. Wear it in the most flattering places
Prints draw attention to wherever you wear them, some give some consideration to where youd like to highlight and make sure you avoid wearing a print on an area youd rather downplay. For example if you are pear shaped, it would be best to wear an animal print on your smaller top half, rather than on your fuller bottom half. If you arent quite sure what areas you should be highlighting and what areas you should be downplaying check out . 4. Stick to one species at a time
A time honored rule that very few people successfully break is to only wear one style of animal print at a time. So if you are wearing leopard, stick to leopard, tiger, stick to tiger and so forth.
5. Work it right
There are two key ways to work animal print in a stylish manner. The first is in a laidback natural way. Think casual prairie chic style. For example, an animal print top would look good with a denim skirt and a pair of neutral colored suede boots. The other is to do it in a lady like way. For example, a leopard print skirt could look very glamorous paired with a cream blouse, black patent belt and pearl studs.
6. Be as subtle as you like
If you feel comfortable and confident working an animal print dress or another fairly dramatic piece, feel free to indulge in doing so. If however, you are a more conservative dresser it is best to wear animal print in a way that feels right to you. For some this may be in the form of an accessory such as a scarf, belt, shoes or purse. For others it may be even more subtle. For example, you could wear a garment with an animal print lining that others only occasionally catch a glimpse of. Or you could even buy yourself some animal print lingerie for behind closed doors. Its dressing to feel confident and attractive in yourself that counts!

description.hltext_display: [22/12/2010] Ciganas usam crianças para sensibilizar e faturam até R$ 150 por leitura de mão
description.content:
Notícia >> Ciganas usam crianças para sensibilizar e faturam até R$ 150 por “leitura” de mão (22/12/2010)
Ciganas usam crianças para sensibilizar e faturam até R$ 150 por “leitura” de mão
Érica Samara da Silva
Concorrência desleal com comerciantes, bebês e crianças nas ruas e constrangimento dos consumidores, na melhor época do ano para o comércio. Esses são os reflexos da migração de ambulantes e ciganos, que lotam ônibus e desembarcam diariamente na rodoviária de Limeira há duas semanas.
Os dois ônibus que transportam ciganos saem de Mogi Mirim e chegam a Limeira às 6h e às 7h30. Segundo Elton Rodrigo da Silva Parada, agenciador da viação que faz o trajeto intermunicipal, parte dos ciganos desembarca em Limeira e o restante toma ônibus rumo às cidades da região. “Eles se dividem, mas no final do dia, às 17h40, tomam os ônibus de volta para Mogi Mirim”, explica. Essa rotina, segundo ele, começou no início do mês, desde quando começaram a se revezar. “Quem fica em Limeira em um dia, no outro vai para outra cidade e vice-versa”,
O gasto com passagem dos que passam o dia em Limeira é de R$ 22,10, entre ida e volta. No entanto, nas ruas, alguns alegam que vieram de Pouso Alegre, (MG). Na tarde de anteontem e ontem pela manhã, ciganas se posicionaram em locais estratégicos como no entorno da Praça Toledo Barros, inclusive próximo aos bancos, além de trechos movimentados de ruas como Tiradentes, Carlos Gomes e Senador Vergueiro. Nesta última, uma mulher de 60 anos estava em prantos e precisou ser consolada por familiares. “Deixei ela ler minha mão e ela falou coisas horríveis. Disse que tinham feito macumba para mim e que eu estava muito mal”, disse emocionada, com vergonha de ser identificada. A cigana, segundo ela, mostrava R$ 150 que teria faturado, lendo apenas uma mão. Um homem de 50 anos discutiu com outra cigana, anteontem. “Ela me chamou três vezes para ler minha mão perto da gruta e falei que não acreditava. Ele rogou praga e falou que minha mulher estava me traindo”, contou.
Além do constrangimento do consumidor, crianças são usadas para sensibilizar até dentro das casas lotéricas, como ocorreu na manhã de ontem na Rua Dr. Trajano. Uma criança de quatro anos abordou um cliente da fila e entregou uma mensagem escrita a mão: “Preciso de sua ajuda para comprar uma cesta de Natal”. Várias pessoas fizeram doações.
Ao avistarem a presença da reportagem nas principais ruas do Centro, as ciganas mudaram de lugar e alegaram que não leem as mãos.
AMBULANTES
Com os ambulantes, os mais diversos produtos são encontrados, desde alimentos, pomadas e objetos. Mulheres que vendiam mel ontem, no cruzamento das ruas Dr. Trajano e Carlos Gomes, alegaram que vieram de Minas Gerais e passariam somente quatro dias em Limeira. “Não estou fazendo nada demais”, alegou a ambulante, que admitiu não ter nenhum tipo de autorização para atuar em Limeira.
O secretário de Segurança Pública, Siddartha Carneiro Leão, alegou que a Guarda Municipal (GM) está disponível para dar apoio em operações que eventualmente sejam desenvolvidas por outros setores públicos, como Centro de Promoção Social Municipal (Ceprosom) ou Secretaria de Agricultura, na fiscalização de ambulantes. “Os guardas não podem simplesmente tirar uma cigana da rua, a menos que ocorra estelionato, como o conto do vigário. Em alguns casos oferecem um serviço, mas não necessariamente preveem o futuro”, analisa.
A assessoria de imprensa da Prefeitura foi procurada, mas não se manifestou sobre os problemas registrados na região central.
“Migrante deve ser qualificado na rodoviária”, afirma delegado
O delegado seccional José Henrique Ventura lembra que a presença de ciganas na cidade é periódica, mas o limeirense não deve ser exposto ao se xingamento, ao negar à leitura da mão. Na sua opinião, esses migrantes devem ser qualificados ainda na rodoviária. “Checar documentos, carteira de trabalho e a finalidade da vinda a Limeira inibiria o assédio ao consumidor no Centro”, afirma. Segundo ele, a prática não impede o direito constitucional de ir e vir, mas reduziria a vinda dos ciganos ao município. “Eles não gostam de ser qualificados e nem de informar sua origem”. (Érica Samara da Silva)

description.hltext_display: 온라인몰 넘버 1 불꽃 경쟁
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
GS샵 올 누적매출 업계 첫1,000억 돌파
롯데닷컴 불과 106억원 차이로 선두 내줘
홈쇼핑 강자 GS와 오프라인 유통공룡 롯데가 온라인 쇼핑 시장에서 불꽃 접전을 벌이고 있다.
22일 관련 업계에 따르면 GS샵(GS홈쇼핑 브랜드명)의 온라인 몰은 올해 3·4분기 누적 매출(수수료 기준) 1,074억원을 기록했다. 국내 온라인 종합쇼핑몰 가운데 3·4분기 누적 수수료 매출이 1,000억원을 돌파한 것은 이번이 처음이다.
롯데그룹의 종합쇼핑몰 롯데닷컴은 같은 기간 968억원의 매출을 기록했다. 106억원 차이로 선두 GS샵에 이어 종합쇼핑몰 2위 자리를 확보한 것이다.
이에 따라 양사는 온라인 쇼핑 시장에서 구색 확대와 서비스 강화에 나서며 업계‘넘버 1’ 자리를 차지하기 위해 치열한 각축을 벌이고 있다.
승부를 가를 것으로 예상되는 올해 총 매출에 있어서 GS샵은 지난해 보다 약 14% 성장한 1,400억원 대 이상을 올릴 것으로 전망하고 있고, 롯데닷컴은 34% 가량 늘어 역시 1,400억 대 매출을 기록할 것으로 내다보고 있다. 이에 따라 업계 1위는 박빙의 차이로 결정될 전망이다.
한편, GS샵은 지난해 11월 TV홈쇼핑, 온라인몰, 카탈로그 등 판매채널 별로 따로 운영하던 상품사업부를 통합하고 단일 브랜드를 운영한 성과를 거둔 것으로 자체 분석하고 있다.인터넷 히트 상품을 홈쇼핑 방송에 편성하기도 하고, 홈쇼핑 상품을 인터넷에서도 구매할 수 있도록 해 소비자들이 다양한 판매채널을 통해 상품을 접할 수 있도록 한 것이 주효했다는 얘기다.
롯데닷컴은 롯데백화점 상품(전체 30%)뿐 아니라 온라인 전용 상품군을 크게 확대하고 제휴, 할인, 이벤트 등 고객마케팅을 활발히 펼친 덕을 봤다. 또 지난해부터 시작한 렉스(LECS)사업도 성장에 한 몫하고 있다.
렉스(LECS: Lotte.com E-Commerce Service)는 브랜드 및 소매유통기업의 온라인 쇼핑 사업을 지원하는 롯데닷컴의 통합시스템으로 현재 렉스 서비스를 이용하는 곳은 유니클로와 폴햄 두 곳이다. 롯데닷컴은 두 업체의 온라인 쇼핑몰을 구축, 운영하며 연간 300억 규모의 매출을 기록하고 있다.
롯데닷컴은 내년중 렉스를 통해 1~2곳의 브랜드 온라인 몰을 추가로 오픈할 예정이다.
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]

description.hltext_display: 速報：国連安保理、朝鮮半島緊急会合声明採択ならず
코스피지수, 사상 최고치 돌파 전 '숨고르기'
description.content:
코스피지수가 이틀째 상승하며 연중 최고치를 또 경신했다.
22일 코스피지수는 1.02포인트(0.05%) 오른 2,038.11에 마감했다. 미국 뉴욕증시가 상승 마감했다는 소식에 코스피 역시 장초반 2,045.39까지 올랐지만, 기관 매수세에 밀리며 보합권에서 숨을 고르는 모습이었다. 개인과 외국인이 각각 1,913억원, 3,533억원 어치 순매수 했지만, 3,000억원 가까이 팔아치운 투신권을 포함해 기관이 4,637억원 어치나 순매도 했다. 프로그램 매매는 1,895억원의 매도우위였다.
업종별로는 운송장비(1.83%), 전기가스업(1.72%), 의약품(1.46%), 음식료품(0.91%) 등이 상승했고, 금융업(-0.74%), 증권(-0.68%), 서비스업(-0.31%), 운수창고(-0.20%) 등은 하락했다.
시가총액 상위종목 가운데선 삼성전자가 D램 가격하락으로 나타난 경쟁업체의 감산이 오히려 긍정적이라는 분석에 힘입어 0.32% 상승한 93만9,000원에 마감, 이틀째 사상 최고가 기록을 경신했다. 현대건설 인수에 따른 우려감이 작용했던 현대차(0.20%), 현대모비스(2.59%), 기아차(4.51%) 등 자동차주도 반등했다. LG화학(0.66%), 한국전력(1.82%)은 올랐고, 신한지주(-0.57%), 삼성생명(-1.19%)은 내렸다.
상한가가 8개종목을 포함해 340개종목이 상승했고, 하한가 없이 470개종목이 하락했다. 거래량은 3억2,846만주, 거래대금은 6조230억원을 기록했다.

description.hltext_display: How To Tips For Flirting With Women
description.content:
Flirting with women is one task that many guys feel uncomfortable doing. In fact, there are a lot of men that are scared to approach women because they feel if they do the individual they approach may lash out on them in an adverse manner. However, before you begin to involve yourself in the flirting game it is crucial that you have an understanding of what this term means first.
The term flirt is a complicated term that is used to describe pickup. Guys, typically talk about picking up girls, while girls are the ones that tend to use the term flirt whenever a guy tries to pick them up for a date or special engagement. A woman will generally think of the term pickup as being sexually oriented, therefore they prefer to utilize the word flirt whenever a man is trying to get their attention for one reason or another.
There are a few things that you can do in order to make this task a successful one. The task should end with getting the girl; if it doesn't then you are doing something wrong.
The first thing you need to do when engaging in this task is to give clear signals of your intentions. A woman will not want to pursue anything with a man that cannot be direct with her. If you desire to get to know someone you need to let them know. There are so many men that give mixed signals when engaging in these tasks that many females do not know if the guy is into them or not.
Carry something that will cause a woman to notice you. This means, always dress to impress and try to accessorize the process. Wearing a shiny watch or some other type of jewelry will catch the attention of the girl you are trying to impress. Plus, it will give you guys something to talk about after you have approached her for the first time.
Never approach a woman that is surrounded by a large group of friends. A lot of men tend to make the mistake of walking up to a group of congregated ladies. Not only can this increase your discomfort level, but it will also give the females friends a reason to make fun of her and you. Try to only approach a lady if she is on her own. You will have a better chance of wooing one lady then a group of her closest girlfriends.
Be interesting by staying interested in what the woman is talking about. There are so many men when they approach beautiful ladies that will simply stare at them and not listen to a word they are saying. A woman wants a man that not only appreciates her beauty but also appreciates her brain. Therefore, be prepared to sit back and listen to what the lady has to say before trying to dominate the entire conversation.
Men you all must remember to be yourselves. There are way too many guys out there that pretend to be something they are not when they are trying to pickup a beautiful girl. By being yourself, you will show the woman you are interested in that you are a genuine male.

description.hltext_display: 英国研制出防炸内裤 可阻止炸弹碎片伤及下体
description.content:
据国外媒体报道，英国科学家近日为驻扎阿富汗的英军部队研制了一款高科技防炸内裤。这套防炸内裤能抵抗轻微爆炸、防止炸弹碎片伤及下体。由于这款内裤可以在战场上对男性士兵的下体起到很好的保护作用，所以也被命名为“炸弹遮阴布”。
据悉，这款“防炸内裤”为迷彩色，外表看起来像是一个贴在身体前后两侧的笨重布片。众所周知，人类腹股沟处不仅有很多对生命至关重要的动脉，而且腹股沟处在高温条件下还很爱出汗。通常情况下，内裤常常会被汗水浸透，但这款用丝绸材料制作的特殊的内裤不仅不会被汗水浸透，而且防炸功能也不会因为汗水而减弱。这款防炸内裤虽不能令士兵“毫发无损”，但可防止细小炸弹碎片伤及下体以及关键动脉。
科学家在制作材料上选用了具有超强弹性、且质地十分柔软的丝绸。“防炸内裤”的设计负责人艾伦・哈派尔（Alan Hepper）表示，研究小组在为防炸内裤选择制作材料时考虑了很多因素，虽然用丝绸来做“防炸内裤”有些奢侈，但考虑到丝绸具有强大的防炸效能，再加上它的高效透气性能，所以选择昂贵的丝绸作为材料是非常值得的。
英国科学家经调查发现，很多被炸伤士兵的主要受伤部位大多都集中在下体和骨盆一带。英军军医表示，士兵下体受伤个案越来越常见，受重伤的更有九成需接受外科手术。美军的一项调查显示，下体受伤会对士兵心理造成影响。所以英国科学家希望这款高科技“防炸内裤”能够减少类似的伤害发生。
据了解，现在已经有45000只“防炸内裤”被派送到阿富汗战场的英军部队，另外的15000只“防炸内裤”准备送给其它盟国部队使用。新一代的防炸内裤能覆盖到大腿部位，以及更大面积的腹部区域。

description.hltext_display: 南科大首批学生明年3月入学 系教改实验班学生 12-22
description.content:
南方科技大学昨（21）日消息，� �据目前计划，南科大在全国范围内招收的首批50名教改实验班学生将和其他高� �一� �，于明年3月1日正式入学。 近日，备受各界关注的南方科技大学宣布，在未获得教育部“招生许可证”的情况下“先行先试”，尝试自发文凭与学位的做法再次引发社会热议。 12月18日，南科大在� �园举行招生咨询会，场面火爆，千余家长学生前去咨询。与此同时，针对中国科技大学少年实验班生源招生的16名考生也开始进行笔试、复试。 昨日，南方科技大学创� �� �长朱清时告诉记者，南科大首期教改实验班的生源主要有三部分，第一部分是面向全社会招生的生源，第二部分是国内各个高中推荐的生源，第三部分是报考中国科技大学少年实验班未被录取的生源。在18日的招生咨询会举办后，南科大已经陆续收到很多学生的报名，对于具体的报名数字，� �方将统一发布。 同时，近日参� 复试的16名考生属于第三部分生源，南科大从报考中科大少年实验班的落选考生中挑选了40人参� 笔试，有16人进入复试，从目前阅卷的情况看，16人中有可能有10人以上被南科大录取。此外，各个高中推荐的生源也正在组织中。
朱清时称，所有生源都必须经过南科大的笔试和面试，经过这两道“关口”后才能进入南科大接受教育。� �据目前的计划，面向社会招生的生源和高中推荐生源将在明年2月进行笔试、面试，所有50名首批教改实验班学生将和其他高� �一� �，在明年3月1日正式入学。（记者 邢世伟）

description.hltext_display: 'World's first' glasses-free 3D TV hits Japan stores
description.content:
TOKYO (AFP) - Toshiba on Wednesday launched in Japan what it calls the world's first television that allows viewers to see 3D images without the need to wear special glasses, amid intensifying competition in the market.
Curious shoppers stopped to test out the screen at an electronics store in central Tokyo as the 12-inch model of Regza GL1 Series went on sale.
The new model with a liquid crystal display carries a price tag of 119,800 yen (1,400 dollars). A 20-inch model will be released on Saturday.
The new 3D TV does not require users to wear special glasses, whereas other 3D-capable models require glasses that act as filters to separate images to each eye to create the illusion of depth.
Toshiba's screens use processing technology to create depth-filled images and the Regza GL1 Series allow users to switch between 2D and 3D on normal TV programmes.
Kazuhito Gunji, a public relations official at electronics retailer Bic Camera, said the company had received many inquiries from customers on when they can get their hands on the product.
Electronics stores are hoping that the release of the latest technology will help offset declining sales as government incentives for purchasing environment-friendly home appliances were reduced this month.
The hugely competitive TV sector is a challenge for many electronics makers given that customers are increasingly accustomed to declining prices, making it difficult for the industry to generate profits.
Sony on Monday said it may fall short of its sales goal of 25 million liquid crystal display TV sets this fiscal year as it struggles to be profitable in the sector, and has also embraced 3D TV technology.
Most shoppers were curious but also cautious about the new device on Wednesday, however.
"I want to watch on a big screen," said a 47-year-old man who has a 37-inch TV at home. "I'll wait for another year before buying," he said.
Another customer, 33, said: "It's great that we don't have to wear glasses, which is a nuisance."
"But I didn't feel images were flying out of the screen on some programmes," he added.
Toshiba says images on the 12-inch screen are best viewed from the front and some 65 centimetres (26 inches) away.
"Customers currently think of 3D images as just an add-on function... but 3D is expected to become a standard eventually" with 3D films and video titles increasing, said Toshiba sales official Eiichi Matsuzawa.
Rival Sharp earlier this year unveiled a small glasses-free LCD touchscreen that shows 3D images for use in mobile phones, digital cameras and games consoles such as Nintendo's 3DS, to be released in Japan in February 2011.

description.hltext_display: Capes aprova os mestrados em Direito e Engenharia Civil da UFS
description.content:
A Coordenação de Aperfeiçoamento de Pessoal de Nível Superior (Capes/MEC) aprovou mais dois cursos de mestrado acadêmico da UFS. São eles: Direito e Engenharia Civil. O resultado foi divulgado sexta-feira, 17, na 123ª Reunião do Conselho Técnico-Científico da Educação Superior (CTC-ES), que ocorreu de 6 a 10 de dezembro em Brasília.
Leia também:
Os últimos cursos de mestrado que a Capes concedeu parecer favorável foram os seguintes: Ciências Fisiológicas, Matemática, Arqueologia e Geociências e Análise de Bacias. Esses dois últimos estão com inscrições abertas: Arqueologia até 14 de janeiro de 2011 (há 20 vagas) e Geociências e Análise de Bacias até o dia 15 do mesmo mês (há 14 vagas). Não haverá inscrições no período de 23/12/2010 a 02/01/2011. Veja o edital.
Outro curso que a Capes também aprovou em 2010 foi o mestrado profissional em Matemática em rede, do qual a UFS faz parte. O braço do MEC para a pós-graduação ainda falta avaliar as propostas de criação dos mestrados em Administração e Serviço Social.
Em 2011, a UFS ministrará 38 cursos de pós stricto sensu, sendo 8 de doutorado, 28 de mestrado acadêmico e 2 de mestrado profissional. Para efeito de comparação, em 2004 a instituição possuía 9 cursos: 1 de doutorado e 8 de mestrado acadêmico.

description.hltext_display: 亚马逊副总裁杰森・茨莱德跳槽Groupon任CFO
description.content:
来源:速途网 作者:王磊 时间:2010-12-21 21:45 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
速途网12月21日消息 据国外报道，近日团购网站Groupon宣布，已任命前亚马逊财务副总裁杰森·茨莱德(Jason Child)担任该公司首席财务官一职。据了解，茨莱德在亚马逊工作了15年，之前任亚马逊副总裁，负责亚马逊国际财务业务。他在亚马逊德国和日本担任重要财务领导角色，同时还负责投资者关系、技术和全球企业管理。在加入亚马逊之前，他在Arthur Andersen任会计师和咨询经理超过7年。
针对此事，茨莱德表示，Groupon是我见过的最让人兴奋的公司之一。他很荣幸能够加入这个极棒的团队，该团队正在挖掘当代电子商务最大的机遇之一。茨莱德及其家人已经从西雅图迁至Groupon总部所在地芝加哥。
此前，Groupon刚拒绝了来自谷歌60美元的收购。有分析人士指出，该举动意味着Groupon可能会保持独立运营并准备在近期上市。另有媒体报道称，Groupon可能在寻求上市之前进行更多融资，融资规模可达数亿美元，估值高达60亿美元。(王磊)

description.hltext_display: Lionel Marthe
Aprobaron los diputados el Presupuesto de Egresos para 2011: 37 mil 917 mdp
Dig deeper
description.content:
Pennsylvania is getting help from the federal government to clean up its abandoned coal mines.
And as impressive as the amount might sound, it's a pittance compared to what is needed.
The U.S. Department of Interior last week announced that it was distributing more than $395 million to 25 states and three American Indian groups to deal with mine-related problems. Of that amount, $150 million will come from fees based on U.S. coal production and $245 million will come from the U.S. Treasury.
Pennsylvania is eligible for $47.6 million, or 12 percent of the total, with the money being awarded based on past and present coal production. It was the third highest amount, with Wyoming No. 1 and West Virginia No. 2
Receiving one out of every eight dollars sounds impressive, but it represents a drop in the bucket when it comes to how much money the state really needs.
Pennsylvania is polluted with so-called orphan mines, operations that were closed and abandoned years ago. The environmental impact of these mines has been enormous. Hundreds of miles of streams and rivers have been polluted by acid-mine drainage. The waste heaps, often called culms, are another source of pollution (as well as eyesores). Subsidence is always a possible threat, especially since many older mines are unmapped.
The scale of cleanup is equal in scope. The state Department of Environmental Protection reports the National Abandoned Mine Lands Inventory currently contains more than 1,000 documented sites in Pennsylvania with unreclaimed health and safety hazards. The cost to reclaim these sites is estimated to exceed $1 billion. That's almost two-and-a-half times more than the amount they announced last week.
Even worse, AML's list is incomplete. The DEP notes that "throughout Pennsylvania's coal fields there are many AML health and safety hazards that have not yet been documented, most notably mines subsidence."
The only way to address this problem is to dig deeper into somebody's pockets, but that's unlikely to happen. When it comes to cleaning up old mines, we'd rather pollute than pay up.

description.hltext_display: Crude hits two-year highs in Asia
description.content:
Crude rallied in Asian trade Wednesday as cold weather and bullish energy demand from China sent it to two-year highs, analysts said.
Brent North Sea crude for February delivery rose 15 cents to 93.35 dollars per barrel in the afternoon after touching 93.49 dollars in earlier trade -- its highest level since October 2008.
New York's main contract, light sweet crude for delivery in February gained 12 cents to 89.94 dollars.
"Oil prices remain supported on cold weather and strong demand indications, with Chinese oil demand, along with gasoline, diesel and jet fuel demand, surging to record highs in November," Barclays Capital said in a report.
Icy weather across Europe and northeastern US states -- which forecasters said would last until the end of the year -- would lift crude prices as demand for heating oil increased.
Final Chinese oil consumption data for November released Tuesday also showed the world's biggest energy consumers' use "at a record high of 9.33 million barrels a day (mdb)," the Barclays Capital report stated.
The level was "up a phenomenal 1.145 mbd (14 percent) year-on-year, the strongest year on year growth rate since February this year," it added.
"The fourth quarter has seen an acceleration of Chinese oil demand growth once again.
"To state that Chinese oil demand has surprised to the upside this year is a no-brainer, but we have a strong suspicion that upside surprises and the resultant global demand upgrades have not yet run their full course," the report said.

description.hltext_display: [22/12/2010] Curto-circuito assusta comerciantes e deixa estabelecimentos sem energia
description.content:
Notícia >> Curto-circuito assusta comerciantes e deixa estabelecimentos sem energia (22/12/2010)
Cláudia Trento
Um curto-circuito na fiação elétrica de um trecho da Avenida Major José Levy Sobrinho, no Jardim Boa Vista, assustou os comerciantes do local, na tarde de ontem. Alguns estabelecimentos ficaram sem energia por horas, o que prejudicou o atendimento ao público. Ninguém se feriu.
De acordo com comerciantes, o curto-circuito pode ter sido causado em decorrência da queda de um poste, no último sábado. “Um veículo bateu e o derrubou”, contaram.
Selma Maria Barbosa da Silva, proprietária da Silkar, disse que ficou com medo ao ver faíscas no fio elétrico. Em seguida, as luzes do estabelecimento piscaram e apagaram. “Vários computadores e equipamentos de instalação estavam ligados. Espero que nada tenha queimado”, frisa.
No momento em que acabou a energia, vários clientes aguardavam para serem atendidos na loja. O pátio do estabelecimento estava repleto de veículos.
Clientes que foram à loja à procura de peças também ficaram literalmente “na mão”, pois o estabelecimento estava completamente na escuridão. “O trabalho de hoje foi prejudicado”, ressalta Selma.
De acordo com a concessionária Elektro, o fornecimento de energia elétrica de 20 clientes do bairro teve que ser interrompido às 14h15, devido a falha na conexão na rede. Uma equipe foi até o local para averiguar a situação. A previsão era de que às 16h fosse restabelecido o fornecimento. A Gazeta entrou em contato com os estabelecimentos e a energia havia voltado após o horário previsto.

description.hltext_display: 韓国のＮＬＬ射撃訓練、１９７４年から定期実施
Vibgyor Vehicles plans to venture Nepal and African markets by March 2011
description.author: admin
description.content:
Share
So far, we have exported around 3,500 100-cc bike Gallop to Bangladesh and we have got a good response
Two-wheelers maker Vibgyor Vehicles plans to enter Nepal and African markets by March 2011, a top official of the company said here Tuesday.
"We have plans to export our two-wheeler products to African nations such as Senegal and Kenya by March 2011. Already, we have set up a showroom at Senegal," said Vibgyor Vehicles Limited CEO Mrigen Banerjee.
The company has also conducted an experimental run with its 125-cc bikes in Nepal. "We plan to start our export of two-wheeler products in Nepal by January 2011," he said.
Banerjee said the company's operational centre in Africa will be based at Senegal, from where it would begin its foray into the continent which has a vast field for two-wheelers.
The company currently exports to Bangladesh. "So far, we have exported around 3,500 100-cc bike Gallop to Bangladesh and we have got a good response," Banerjee said.
Vibgyor Vehicles is scheduled to set up their second manufacturing plant at Dankuni in West Bengal's Hooghly district by the first quarter of the next financial year.
"It will have a production capacity of 400 units in a single shift," said the company's general manger (sales) Partha Chatterjee.
Currently, the company has a manufacturing unit at Dhulagarh in Howrah district.
Chatterjee said the company was targeting men with an income ranging from Rs.8,000 to Rs.15,000 per month.
"The investment plan for three years since 2009 made by the company is Rs.660 crore," said Banerjee at the eastern region launch of the 125-cc bike Hunter.
