event_or_fact.property: The big question is how much of the merging of these two systems will happen across the Ohio Valley, and thats still highly uncertain at this point
Depending on the forecast models, one is saying that there will only be some snow showers, while another is saying there could be 2 to 4 inches on Christmas

description.hltext_display: 同城网：网络营销商战新焦点
description.content:
尽管身上没有现金，但是张颖欣(化名)并不用在寒冷的冬雨中来到楼下ATM前排上五到十分钟队来为今天的午餐取钱。坐在电脑前，轻点几下鼠标，一份由墨西哥鸡肉卷和葡式蛋挞组成的简朴午膳便会在十分钟后送到办公室门口。和纽约与东京的同龄人一样，上海的年轻白领们如今也不愿在外卖上多费唇舌。
“半年前我也是听同事说，(买)外卖同样可以上网，并且只用从银行转账。”谈起午餐的新变化，张小姐显得司空见惯。现在她每天中午要做的，就是在搜索引擎或者同城网上寻找公司附近特色餐厅的外卖品种。而她不知道的是，这种行为已在同城的餐厅之间引发了一场激烈的网络商战。
网罗：当生存也囊括其中
作为“网龄”超过10年的“骨灰级”网友--曾宇鹏永远也忘不了1999年的“72小时网络生存测试”。那时，这个13亿人口的泱泱大国，才有不到400万“在线居民”。
据曾宇鹏回忆，该活动内容其实十分简单：志愿者在仅有基本沐浴、起居设备的酒店房间里通过互联网获得生存三天所必须的饮食。事实上，曾宇鹏他们恰恰是在“生存”环节“演砸”了：除了登陆某个事先已经大肆炒作对该活动进行赞助的食品厂网站拨打“订餐”电话外，便是志愿者们的亲友团在指定时间将食品、饮料送去工作人员手中。
至于主办方留下的信用卡几乎无人用到，要知道，内存的1500元相当于当年一个普通人的月薪。原因在于，那时仅有极少数网站可以在线收付，而在中国，全国性的银行间网络平台才刚刚建立,SEO。
然而，仅仅十年过去，一切都不同了：大到飞机小到发夹，都可以通过网络购买。事实上，中国在很多方面已经走到了发达国家的前列，最令人印象深刻的，还是令人惊异的规模：据SEO信息传播网保守估计，2010年第三季度中国网购订单量已达3.8亿份。分析师一致认为，在接下来的消费旺季里，这一数字还将冲上4亿大关，也就是说，用不了多久，中国每位网友都将在一个季度里确认一张以上的网络订单。
另一方面，同城服务也方兴未艾：除了张小姐的外卖，网友们还在门户网站、论坛附带的微博上对呼朋唤友参与团购活动，并对各个百货商店、咖啡厅在虚拟的空间上予以点评。此外，“本领交换”、“二手货处理”乃至都已成为同城网站上的热点所在。在生存都被网络包办的今天，越来越多商务活动移植上网自然将成为下一场激烈商战的导火索。
同城：暂缺开发的商务蓝海
和很多从事网络推广的商家一样，李国林也曾经把注意力放在遥远的省际市场，“那时我做葡萄酒推广，主要手段是将网站做好，将葡萄酒的效果写成文章，吸引网友来读，再将读者吸引到我的网站就ok了，没想到我仔细一统计，签单客户中很大一部分还是来自同一座城市的。这就引起了我的思考：也许同城的地理优势同样是吸引网络买家的重要因素。”
实际上，在目前的中国网络营销业界，大部分从业者仍然集中在IM推广和网站建设两大领域，将宣传文本粘贴在qq群里、论坛上仍然是目前的主流营销手段。而将同城资源和地理信息整合，建立营销优势还是很多商家始料未及的。
当然，也有极少数人意识到了这一点，现在已任SEO信息传播网负责人的李国林就是一例，“随着58同城、点评网、百度身边的兴起，以服务业为基础的同城网络商务将进入新的阶段，传统的‘酒香不怕巷子深’恐怕也必须改成‘酒香还怕无人知’了，而上海的餐厅们争相上网并且在搜索引擎上巧妙占据和‘上海’有关的长尾关键词就是这一趋势的体现。因此，同城还是一块亟待开发的网络商务蓝海。”李国林说道。
文章出自SEO信息传播网(http://www.seorv.com/viewnews-1590.html)，转载请注明出处并加上链接。

description.hltext_display: Linda Park | Why my new year's resolutions will work this time
description.content:
I'm writing my last column of 2010 from my first cubicle ever. I'm in Texas for my annual sojourn working for the South by Southwest festival, and we've just moved to a new office. Strange that I made it 40 years without knowing the joys of the cube. I always felt blessed that this was the case, but I have to say I'm digging this.
I feel a bit the way I did when I was a kid and would build impenetrable forts out of couch cushions. I can hear people, but I can't see them, they can't see me. I've set up my lava lamp, and a co-worker gave me a bunny frame and really, all I need are some “Cathy” comic strips and a potted plant and I will be set for this new adventure into semi-corporate stylings.
It's that time of year again, when we find ourselves prone to reflections on the past 365 days while ruminating on how we can make the next 12 months better. I always say I'm not going to make new year's resolutions, but then I always do. And then I always break them. However, after experiencing some rather crushing passings the last two years, and there's another coming at the end of this one, I find myself more willing to adhere to a plan for the future, because though it's trite, it's true, life is short. Life is what you make of it.
I feel that I squandered a lot of my 30s, but I kicked off 40 in style with one of People magazine's sexiest men in attendance at my birthday fete, so really, how can this next decade not be perfectly splendid? I kid, of course, but I truly am all about making these next 10 count, and what better way than by making the same set of resolutions I have for the last several years? Except this year they're going to, you know, stick. I swear it.
I did manage to start my novel this year. Of course, as soon as I got 10,000 words in, I started reading another young-adult series that not only had similar plot points but also three characters who shared the same names as mine. And it wasn't like the names were John and Bob, either. However, even though it's apparent that there's no such thing as original thought anymore, I will soldier on.
(2 of 2)
I lost five pounds. Now to get to the other 35. I have a couple of friends who made startling transformations this year, and they both told me their secrets, which sort of boil down to eat better and be a dude. Ladies, I know you hear me on the whole “why is it so much easier for men to lose weight and gosh, that's so unfair” scenario. However, though they were blessed with unachievable (for me) testosterone levels, I will soldier on.
I started a meditation practice. I'm definitely good with the full 20 minutes; however, I'm not quite adept at doing it twice a day yet. Or even once a day some weeks. However, though I skip many, many days and often spend most of my time sitting there going over my Target shopping list, I will soldier on.
How about you? Do you make New Year's resolutions? Do you stick to them? Would you have adhered to the resolve if you'd done it at a different time of year? Why is it that we always see the advent of every year as a fresh start, a clean slate, when in reality it's just another day?
Then again, maybe it's not. Maybe Jan. 1 really is the herald of a new season. We march forward in a cold that's somehow cleansing, our heads held a little higher as we think maybe this year we can do better, be better, make life a little more. Either way, this faith in the ability to change is a gift, and one I'll be happy to open this year on Christmas Day.
Linda Park is a nice Korean girl who spends way too much time watching TV. Read her blog at www.courier-journal.com/velocity.

description.hltext_display: Hornets toe the line, beat KP
description.author: MARK FARINELLA SUN CHRONICLE STAFF
description.content:
MANSFIELD - A pretty good basketball game became a free-throw practice session Tuesday night at Mansfield High, and the host Hornets learned that they need more practice."Seventeen for 34 is not going to win a lot of games," said Hornet boys' coach Mike Vaughan. But fortunately for his team, there were enough attempts and enough successful conversions down the stretch to fend off a strong challenge from King Philip, 66-62, at the Albertini Gym.
"I think our energy in both games has been great," said Vaughan, whose Hornets have jumped out to a 2-0 start in the Hockomock League's Kelley-Rex Division. "The thing that we've got to get better at is to play more intelligently. Right now, we're not doing a lot of the little things we need to be doing."Among those little things is the only undefended shot in basketball. Shooting 50 percent for the game at the foul line, the Hornets exceeded that a little during the fourth-quarter flurry of fouls, converting 12 of 20 attempts.The visiting Warriors (0-2) kept making runs at the Hornets, but could never regain the lead that they held last just before the end of the first half. KP trailed by five early in the fourth quarter, but sandwiched three-point plays by Jake Layman and Harry Washington around a basket by Mansfield's Chris Johnson to trail by one, 53-52, with 4:38 to go. It was 55-54 when Michael Lofton netted two free throws in four tries and Daniel Dion added another with 51.1 seconds left to go up 58-54.Layman, however, hit a picture-perfect three off Washington's feed with 40.1 seconds left. Dion, who had missed Mansfield's opener against North Attleboro because he had been shaken up in a car accident a few days earlier, netted two free throws with 39.2 seconds left to restore a three-point lead for the Hornets.After another one-of-two trip to the line by Lofton, Layman dished to the sideline to Joey Akrouche for another stunning three, and the one-point margin persisted until, with 5.7 seconds left, KP's Alec May was called for an intentional foul and sent Johnson to the line for two shots.Johnson made the first and missed the second, but the Hornets held possession and Lofton tossed the inbounds pass to a wide-open Leonard Richardson under the KP basket for the final breathing room they needed.There were 18 lead changes in the first half, and Mansfield - which shot 7-13 from three-point range in the first 16 minutes - took the lead for good with 7.1 seconds before intermission on a free throw by Lofton for a 33-32 edge. Mansfield never led by more than five points, however, as the 6-foot-8 Layman and his teammates doggedly ran with the fast-breaking Hornets."I'm proud of the way the boys played," KP coach Sean McInnis said. "We did great in transition and I thought we defended fairly well. We didn't defend the three-ball well, though. Mike had them shooting very well, but after we made some adjustments and got our arms up over our shoulders, we took advantage of our length.""We're getting back to a little more of a perimeter game and trying to get the pace in our favor," Vaughan said of the early long-range marksmanship. "But KP was able to run with us tonight, which a lot of teams aren't able to do. That's kind of a style we're going to play for most of the year."Layman was "everything that they're writing about," Vaughan said admiringly. The big junior poured in 26 points (7-23 FG, 11-13 FT), pulled down a game-high 13 rebounds (12 off the defensive glass) and dished out four assists."He completely dominated the game on both ends tonight," Vaughan said. "And Coach McInnis has this team believing in him and they're doing it around Jake. But that's not to take anything away from some of the other guys who made some hoops tonight."We had them on the ropes tonight and were doing a decent job on Jake, and another kid would come down and hit a big three or a couple of key foul shots." he said.Connor Layman added nine points and five rebounds and Washington six points, nine rebounds and six assists.Mansfield's Brian Hershman popped in five three-pointers, four in the first half, on the way to a team-high 15 points. Lofton added 10 points, 12 rebounds and four assists, Richardson 11 points and five rebounds and Joe Gracia 10 points.KP will play in the three-day Nashoba Valley Classic which begins on Monday, while Mansfield takes on New Bedford in the first round of the Chelsea Classic, also on Monday.

description.hltext_display: [코스피시황] 이틀째 올라 연중 최고치 경신
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
코스피지수가 이틀째 상승하며 연중 최고치를 또 경신했다.
22일 코스피지수는 1.02포인트(0.05%) 오른 2,038.11에 마감했다. 미국 뉴욕증시가 상승 마감했다는 소식에 코스피 역시 장초반 2,045.39까지 올랐지만, 기관 매수세에 밀리며 보합권에서 숨을 고르는 모습이었다. 개인과 외국인이 각각 1,913억원, 3,533억원 어치 순매수 했지만, 3,000억원 가까이 팔아치운 투신권을 포함해 기관이 4,637억원 어치나 순매도 했다. 프로그램 매매는 1,895억원의 매도우위였다.
업종별로는 운송장비(1.83%), 전기가스업(1.72%), 의약품(1.46%), 음식료품(0.91%) 등이 상승했고, 금융업(-0.74%), 증권(-0.68%), 서비스업(-0.31%), 운수창고(-0.20%) 등은 하락했다.
시가총액 상위종목 가운데선 삼성전자가 D램 가격하락으로 나타난 경쟁업체의 감산이 오히려 긍정적이라는 분석에 힘입어 0.32% 상승한 93만9,000원에 마감, 이틀째 사상 최고가 기록을 경신했다. 현대건설 인수에 따른 우려감이 작용했던 현대차(0.20%), 현대모비스(2.59%), 기아차(4.51%) 등 자동차주도 반등했다. LG화학(0.66%), 한국전력(1.82%)은 올랐고, 신한지주(-0.57%), 삼성생명(-1.19%)은 내렸다.
상한가가 8개종목을 포함해 340개종목이 상승했고, 하한가 없이 470개종목이 하락했다. 거래량은 3억2,846만주, 거래대금은 6조230억원을 기록했다.

company.name: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

description.hltext_display: 压制酷热！九州风神V6000显卡散热器评测
description.content:
前言：现在性能提升最快的硬件除了作为电脑平台核心的CPU外，还有的就是作为显示输出的显卡了。随着显卡性能的不断提升，显卡的功耗及发热量也出现了快速的增长，显卡的散热器也相比以往有所改进，以适应高发热量的显卡散热需求。
九州风神（DEEPCOOL）作为国内知名的散热设备设计生产厂商，一直以来致力于为消费者提供最高性能和最人性化的散热解决方案，所以九州风神所推出的众多散热器产品都受到不少DIY玩家所喜爱。今天就为大家介绍九州风神最新推出的旗舰级显卡散热器产品――九州风神神翼V6000显卡散热器的评测，这款产品不仅支持多孔距多平台安装，同时还采用6根直径6mm纯铜高效能热管以及并排双风扇等设计保证显卡在高负载运行中也能有稳定高效的散热效果，下面就让我们一起进入今天的评测吧。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器是九州风神在2010年底所推出的最新一款旗舰级显卡散热器产品，采用双9cm风扇并排安放散热设计，主体则采用全镀镍处理，使用了多达6根直径为6mm的高能效热管组成散热主体，支持多孔距多平台显卡安装，可以为玩家们的显卡提供高效散热效果。
九州风神 神翼V6000
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器外包装沿用了近段时间九州风神旗舰级产品所使用的硬纸盒包装设计，在颜色设计上还是保持了一贯的白色为主，整体设计简约，正面左上角有蓝底白字的DEEP COOL九州风神LOGO，右上角则是产品类型，占据正面中央的是银色的产品型号"神翼V6000"的字眼，并且将散热器的特点以图标的形式印在包装盒上，包括六热管、大风量、静音、铜底、减震等等。打开包装后可以看到散热器采用了上翻盖式设计，内部设有透明窗，两个9cm散热风扇被固定在海绵垫内，保护设计十分到位。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器采用多孔距安装设计，适合多款不同孔距规格的显卡安装。散热器主体采用矩形设计，超长跨度的设计可以容纳更多的散热鳍片，增大了更多的散热面积，同时也可以帮助周边元件的散热。经过特殊设计的各层散热鳍片组成具备立体旋涡式风道效果的鳍片阵列，可以更好地迅速带走热量。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器主体尾部采用了顶板覆盖设计，顶盖部分设计有九州风神（DEEPCOOL）的品牌LOGO。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-整体载重
经过称重，可以得知九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器的散热器主体整体重量为436.5g，只是散热器主体就使用了接近500g的金属材料，可见用料是相当的充足。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-热管
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器采用了六条直径为6mm的高效能热管，能迅速地将热量从散热底座传到主体各层散热鳍片上，配合散热风扇的送风效果将热量排出，从而达到散热的效果。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器规格参数
Hydro Bearing
399 RMB
[第2页][第3页][下一页]
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器赏析
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-底座散热鳍片及热管
如同塔式CPU散热底座上都带有辅助散热鳍片一样，九州风神神翼V6000显卡散热器在散热底座上也加入了梳状散热鳍片，并且由于散热器风扇的向下送风设计，可以使底座鳍片的散热效果增强，达到更好的散热效果。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-散热底座
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器采用纯铜底座设计，并在表面镀上一层银色亚光镍保护层，提升底座的抗腐蚀能力并可以保持散热器的整体配色一致，底面采用铣洗抛光工艺，可使底座表面更好睇与显卡核心贴合。散热底座两侧为可拆卸的固定条，固定条上钻有多个不同孔距的固定安装孔。此外，在散热器附件内还配备了一组孔径为58mm的固定条，可以与散热器上预装的固定条进行替换。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-散热风扇
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器配备了两个规格为9cm的液压轴承散热风扇，采用一体式减震静音设计，外层所包裹的软胶框设计可以起到不错吸收震动的作用，而经过特殊设计的扇叶设计可以降低叶面在滑过空气时所产生的声响。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-风扇供电
散热风扇的供电插线采用了厚实的尼龙纤维外皮包裹保护，支持PWM功能的3pin供电接口，可直接插在显卡供电插座或主板上的3pin风扇供电插座上。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器采用双风扇并排安装设计，两枚9cm的一体式减震风扇覆盖住整个散热器主体之上，由上往下的送风设计，既可以保证散热器各鳍片的散热效果，同时也可以对显卡上的供电模组及显存达到辅助降温的效果。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-风扇固定扣具
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器所使用的风扇固定扣具采用了类似"丁"的结构设计，扣具由钢丝弯曲而成，同时散热器主体上留有固定风扇扣具的凹槽设计，但扣具安装上散热器主体上后，用户需要注意扣具是否已经进入固定凹槽内。这种设计虽然安装方便，并且牢固度也很高，但当需要清洁散热器或更换散热风扇时，扣具的拆卸就显得略显困难及麻烦了，如果九州风神在风扇扣具上设计一种更易于安装拆卸，牢固程度较高的便捷式扣具的话，会更好地增强散热在清洁及更换配件上的优势。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-散热器全装备载重
对九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器安装双9cm散热风扇后进行了再一次的称重，散热器全装备安装后得出的重量约为667g，比散热主体重量增加了230.5g。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-实际安装效果
实际安装后可以看到，散热器能准确地安装到GTX460显卡上，由于散热器体积较庞大，显卡由原来的占据两PCI槽增加到需要占据三PCI槽，如果在一些小板型的主板或小型机箱上使用会占据过多的位置及空间。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-安装细节
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器采用手拧螺丝设计，安装较为简单，由于默认安装在散热器上的固定条上的固定孔较为密集，所以在安装时会出现一定的阻碍，需要用户经常观察散热底座是否正确地固定在显卡核心上。现在的中高端显卡都需要电源辅助供电，有不少的显卡散热器设计过于靠近供电接口，而会对供电接口的正常插拔造成影响，虽然神翼V6000散热器尾部带有内凹设计，但安装在显卡上时，与显卡尾部的辅助供电接口之间还是留有一段距离，保证辅助供电接口的正常插拔。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-附件
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器的附件比较丰富，配备了六枚散热风扇固定扣具，散热器固定手拧螺丝，散热器固定钢片和多达三种规格设计的散热片。
上一页[第1页][第3页]下一页
测试平台及方法说明：
AMD Phenom II X2 550
华硕 Crosshair IV Formula
DDR3-1333 2GB×3
西部数据 WDC WD6400AAKS
NVIDIA GTX460
Windows 7 Ultimate 中文版
NVIDIA ForceWare 260.99 for Windows 7
Furmark
GPU-Z
测试方法：我们使用一块全新未经过拆解的GTX460显卡进行测试，为了测试出准确的温度数据，每次测试完成后都会对显卡进行停机冷却处理。由于该款显卡以散热性能为卖点，为了保证原配散热器散热下可以得出较准确的数据，在测试过程时，我们首先对原配散热器进行测试，测试完成后才对显卡进行拆解，安装九州风神 神翼V6000散热器再进行测试。
测试时室内温度约为23℃，测试方式采用默频和超频两种。显卡的超频相比CPU超频要简单的多，使用实时动态超频软件可以非常方便地对显卡的核心频率进行调节。此外，由于显卡核心对电压的控制相比CPU要精细得多，所以为了保证测试的顺利进行，测试采用默电超频的方式进行。
两款散热器设计对比（左：九州风神 神翼V6000；右：显卡原配）
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-实际运行
测试结果截图及对比(默认频率)：
原配散热器待机温度
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器待机温度
原配散热器满载温度
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器满载温度
运行温度对比
小结：在显卡默认频率状态下，通过GPU-Z的监控功能我们可以看到显卡在两款散热器散热下的待机温度均为25℃，两者在待机上并没有形成温度的差距。但显卡达到满载工作情况时，六热管散热和四热管散热之间的差距就进一步表现出来。神翼V6000以双风扇六热管的优势在显卡满载状态下的温度为54℃，而原配的双风扇四热管散热器散热下的显卡核心温度则已经达到了66℃，这还是未进行显卡拆解时所测试的数据，当显卡经过拆解后，显卡的温度控制或多或少会受到拆解所带来的影响，核心的温度会进一步的上升。
测试结果截图及对比(超频)：
原配散热器-860MHz待机温度
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-860MHz待机温度
原配散热器-860MHz满载温度
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器-860MHz满载温度
超频运行温度对比
小结：在超频测试中，我们将GTX460显卡核心频率提升至860MHz可以稳定运行。在显卡低负载待机状态下，频率仍会降低至50.6MHz，所以软件检测出在两款散热器的散热下，显卡核心的温度同为26℃。当显卡通过显卡拷机软件Furmark对其进行满载测试时，散热能力的差距也随之拉大，如同在默认频率测试上的情况，神翼V6000凭借六热管的优势，温度只比默认频率时的满载温度上升了2℃，达到56℃；而显卡原配散热器的温度则提升更大，相比默认频率下提高了4℃，为70℃，两者之间的温度差距到达了14℃。
评测室总结
作为九州风神最新一款显卡旗舰级散热器产品，在众多方面都表现出其高端定位的特性，单是散热主体就已经使用了接近500g的金属材质制造而成，用料十足，而且采用了6根直径6mm高效能热管以及纯铜底座设计都为产品提供了高效的导热性能。
散热方面，九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器所使用的散热风扇均为采用了九州风神独家专利减震设计的静音风扇，同时风扇的每个扇叶都拥有特殊的纹路设计，支持PWM功能，根据实际情况对风扇转速进行智能调节。
九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器 优缺点点评
1、多孔距多平台安装设计，支持最新显卡安装；
2、六热管及铜底散热底座具备高性能散热效果；
3、双散热风扇可提供持续大风量送风效果，保证整体散热效果；
4、附件丰富，并提供多种规格小型散热贴片。
1、全设备组装后体积过于庞大，需要占据三个PCI槽位，对小型主板插槽使用及小型机箱空间利用有所阻碍；
2、散热风扇供电线略显过长，整理略显麻烦，并为提供转接线材，只能使用显卡自带供电接口或主板供电接口。
目前该款九州风神 神翼V6000显卡散热器售价为399元，喜欢这款散热器的朋友不妨继续关注这款散热器的最新资讯。

description.hltext_display: Hudson City Bancorp drops national bank conversion and Schiff Nutrition International, First South Bancorp: Biggest Price Decliners
description.content:
Hudson City Bancorp Inc., the holding company of Hudson City Savings Bank, said Friday that it withdrew its application to convert to a national bank.As a result, Hudson City will continue to operate as a federally chartered savings bank, and the corporation will continue as a saving and loan holding company.The company's decision to convert to a national bank was made when there was uncertainty about how the federal government planned to regulate savings and loan institutions.Under laws passed this year, the Office of Thrift Supervision, which regulates the bank now, will be merged into the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency as early as July 2011. Hudson City will become subject to the regulation and supervision of the OCC and the corporation will become subject to the regulation and supervision of the Federal Reserve Board. [Read the full article]
Bank Mutual Corporation (Nasdaq:BKMU - News) today announced that its board of directors has approved a balance sheet restructuring as part of an overall strategy to strengthen the Wisconsin-based company going forward."Our Board of Directors approved the early repayment of $756.0 million in FHLB advances and Bank Mutual is recognizing a one-time charge of $53.6 million, net of the related income tax effect. These advances carried a very high, above-market interest rate, so this action will significantly reduce our annual interest expense in future periods," said Michael T. Crowley, Jr., Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of Bank Mutual Corporation ("Bank Mutual"). The Federal Home Loan Bank ("FHLB") advances that were repaid had a remaining average maturity of approximately six years and a weighted-average cost of 4.17%, or $31.5 million on an annual basis. [Read the full article]
FedFirst Financial Corporation (NASDAQ Capital:FFCO - News), the parent company of First Federal Savings Bank, today announced that it has restructured a portion of its investment portfolio by selling collateralized mortgage obligations with a book value of $7,195,000 at a pre-tax loss of $635,000. The securities that were sold were private label REMICs backed by Alt-A fixed-rate mortgage loans. The Company replaced these securities with debt securities of U.S. Government-sponsored enterprises.Although we had previously recorded impairment charges on these securities, said Patrick G. O(TM)Brien, President and Chief Executive Officer, this quarter we have become increasingly concerned about the ability of the underlying borrowers to service their mortgage loans and, as a result, about future additional impairment on these securities. [Read the full article]

description.hltext_display: 速報：韓国軍、延坪島海上射撃訓練開始
电子商务助中小企业降低成本
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)随着CPI持续走高，国内中小企业的各项生产成本不断上升。如何应对通胀压力，已成为眼下大批中小外贸企业最为关注的话题。12月7日下午，在广州白云国际会议中心举行的"全球十大网商巡回论坛"上，包括近百家中山企业在内的上千家广东中小企业，就"如何利用电子商务平台抵御通胀压力"进行了研讨。 -通胀令订单成烫手山芋 包括上游原材料价格、员工工资等各方面因素，今年企业的成本同比上涨约在10%左右。中山市奥力医疗设备有限公司外贸部经理徐晶对记者坦言，由于原材料及劳动力等价格因素影响，今年公司感受的成本上涨压力比往年要大不少。
事实上，中山很多的中小企业都感受到了通胀带来的成本压力。省外经贸厅的最新统计数据显示，今年以来，企业用工成本普遍提高20%左右，企业原材料购进成本普遍增长10%，钢材、铜材、塑料、棉花等主要原材料价格同比上涨20%以上。这些都大大增加了外贸企业的成本，本来就已经很小的利润空间被挤得所剩无几。
在如此恶劣环境下，如何进一步压缩成本、提高利润，抵御通胀压力，从某种角度上说已关乎中小企业的生死存亡。现在很多外贸小企业不是缺订单，而是有单不敢接。中山市科达袜业有限公司相关人士杨灵通如是说。
-借电子商务降低企业成本
面对通胀压力，包括中山在内的广东中小企业纷纷借助电子商务来化解通胀带来的成本压力。阿里巴巴广东大区总经理扬子江在接受记者采访时说，通胀压力正在促使我国外贸企业加速转型，越来越多的外贸企业开始在电子商务上加大投入，开拓网络贸易渠道。一方面，电子商务平台能够让小企业直接跳过中间商，扩大利润空间，同时降低参展、招待等外贸成本，并使企业远离资金积压带来的风险，另一方面，海量的买家群体将给小企业会员带来大量的询盘，他们可以从中选择适合自己的订单。这些都可以帮助外贸小企业抵御通胀压力。 运用电子商务可以帮助企业降低至少50%的经营成本。一位中山企业家给记者算了一笔账：在展会费用方面，原来每年需要上百万元的参展费，有了电子商务之后，每年的参展费用会大幅减少；在差旅费用方面，以前每个业务员能够维护10个左右的客户，经常要出差去维护客户关系，而现在一个业务员可以维护上百个客户。而且不用出差维护，直接通过电子商务来维护，这样差旅成本就降低了50%。现在很多客户不需要来工厂，这样业务招待费用就少了很多，一年大概可以节省100万元左右的招待费。该企业家如是说。（来源于：中山日报）

description.hltext_display: 卓越不差钱让利一亿,图书价格大战是否继续升级
description.content:
来源:站长网唐世军 时间:2010-12-22 07:42 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
B2C领域网站卓越亚马逊昨天宣布将斥资1亿元推出史无前例的大规模让利，并将最低价延展至包括图书在内的28个商品类别。卓越亚马逊在此次价格战的发起商品——图书方面，也再次推出新的优惠，全场任何消费满100返20元无限制图书券，此外还推出了全场近10万种少儿图书5折封顶特促活动。我在卓越购买的《SEO实战密码:60天网站流量提高20倍》 花了61元，而现在是47元，后悔买早了。
卓越此次让利一亿活动，虽然在当当网、京东商城分别开出4000万，及8000万促销后，但因为让利一亿，比当当、京东更狠，更吸引网民的眼球。卓越亚马逊总裁王汉华表示：“‘天天低价，正品行货’是卓越亚马逊一直以来对消费者的承诺。我们希望通过本次史无前例的促销让利，用最诚恳的行动为消费者带去更低的价格、更高的实惠和更火爆的节日气氛。”卓越不差钱，愿意陪当当、京东玩到低。这次在10月14日挑起事端网购图书的京东傻眼了。
京东你让利4000万，当当就让利8000万，卓越更是不差钱，我让利一亿，陪你玩，三家B2C，不得不佩服他们的胆量，小家家还真没玩这种游戏的资本。价格都降了，对彼此有好处吗?是赔钱赚吆喝吗?
价格战对谁都没好处，价格太低失去理性，会摧残整个B2C市场，会严重影响国内电子商务，而且也会伤及自身。再说降低价格低于成本价恶意竞争，本来就违法国家规定。损人还不利己，这种事都干，是不是太不理智了。这一点，京东的老板刘强东非常明白，他曾公开表示，“都降价了，谁也不会得到好处。”事实正是如此。
马上圣诞节到了，圣诞节过了还有元旦，京东、当当、卓越价格战还会继续升级吗?京东、当当、卓越会不会给每人送个笔记本，为中国互联网工作做出重大贡献?大家期待吧。呵呵，纯属个人乱侃，各位不要当真。(唐世军原创)

description.hltext_display: 专家� �解大学生创业四大“瓶颈” 12-22
description.content:
12月9日，本报“新闻视点”刊登了《听大学生创业者说 “瓶颈”》。针对文中提到的四大瓶颈——入门关、经济关、管理关、精神关，记者专访了市人保局开业指导服务中心副主任杨永华。今年，恰逢市开业指导专家志愿服务团成立十周年。听十年经验，� �四大瓶颈。 入门关？放宽眼界： � 统行业中一� �暗藏商机 新闻视点：一般大学生创业有哪些特点？10年中有怎� �的变化？ 杨永华：从创业类型来看，大学生创业以机会型创业为主，大部分和自己的专业、爱好结合，与“4050”人员以解决生计为主的生存型创业不同；从创业行业来看，以创意技术类的行业为主；从创业团队来看，大多数与同学、朋友组成团队，共同创业，比较注意团队的专业构成，个人单独创业的很少；从创业准备来看，大部分创业大学生是在� �期间就积极参与社会活动，积累社会经验，参� 创业教育和培训，储备创业技能。 10年来，大学生的创业能力总体上有提升，随着网络社会的兴起，依托网络创业的比例越来越高。随着政府扶持创业的力度越来越大，大学生创业往往都能更多地得到相对完善的政策扶持和服务。
新闻视点：不少大学生认为，互联网时代的创业多集中在新兴IT领域，� 统行业创业机会少。对此� 怎么看？ 杨永华：这也是一个主流观点，与目前的时代和大学生的特点相关。一是目前互联网确实孕育着大量的创业机会，网店等作为一种可以低门槛进入的创业形态，更容易受到大学生创业者的欢迎；二是现代大学生更善于在IT等新兴行业创业，对� 统行业的兴趣则不大。其实，� 统行业的创业机会也不少，许多创业者的第一桶金，就是从社区服务等一些� 统行业中来的。 【案例】叶扬生(上海天泰茶业科技有限公司董事长)：我是学计算机的，最初创业选择了IT领域，发展顺利。2005年，在老家福建武夷山的一次招商中，我投资了茶山和茶厂，却发现“好茶卖不出去”。为什么“7万个中国茶厂，抵不过一家英国立顿”？各种咖啡消费也抢� 了中国高端消费市场。显然，� 统茶消费模式已� 法实现茶叶从生产到消费过程的� �准化。于是，我萌发了� �发自动泡茶机的想法。之后，我� 乎遍访了中国茶产业和家电业前辈，� �究国外咖啡发展历程，在美国历经数月调� �后，着手开始将科技带入� 统茶产业的创业，全球首创“乐泡”智能茶道系统。上海世博会期间，它已亮相世博会新闻中心。今年7月开始正式销售，计划明年销售额三四千万元。我认为，不管� 统领域还是新兴领域，都要“有创意，能创新，才创业”。
经济关？善用政策： “四� ”学生变身创业达人 新闻视点：近年来不断听到大学生创业的一些成功案例，但总体的感觉是，我们身边投身创业的大学生并不算多。对此� 怎么看？� 觉得阻碍大学生创业的原� 是什么？ 杨永华：从我们的调查情况看，虽然本市的整体创业活动率从 2005年的 4.9%上升到2009年的7.5%，其中24—35周岁青年的整体创业活动率达到10.3%。但总体上看，大学生创业的意识仍然不足，全国大学生创业比例不足1%，本市大学生投身创业的比例也很低。 常说大学生的创业是“四� ”创业：� 资金、� 场地、� 能力、� 人脉，这些都是阻碍大学生创业的重要� � 。其中，资金短缺是一个最大的瓶颈，融资难也是创业者普遍面临的最大困难。在解决大学生创业资金不足方面，政府采取了很多扶持政策措施，比如人保部门提供的小额担保贷款政策，市教委科委的大学生科技创业基金政策，团市委的YBC(中国青年创业国际计划的英文简称)贷款政策等。
新闻视点：除了政策扶持外，大学生创业其实还希望得到社会各方更多的帮助甚至指点。
杨永华：的确如此。正是为了给大学生创业以更多更具体的扶持，上海市开业指导专家志愿服务团于2000年5月正式成立，主要由企业家、职业经理人和专业技术人员组成。10年来，从133名专家到目前近600名专家，总指导人次突� �19万。 【案例】李维民(上海瀚明信息技术有限公司总经理)：2007年，我从朋友处借来了微薄的启动资金，准备开一家公司，经营电子商务网站。然而，正逢全球金融危机，高额的运行资金、昂贵的办公楼租金、税收的压力让我一筹莫展。此时，我打听到虹口北外滩开业园区有个网上创业基地，专门吸纳青年知识群体入驻创业，就抱着试试看的心情去了，结果不仅环境好，政府给予政策扶持也大：引进行业协会规范管理，管理公司给予代理记账、咨询配套服务，使创业者入驻后有强有力的保障。租赁满一年后，公司内缴纳社保的所有员工，都可有2000元/人的房租补贴，这种最直接的补贴方法更增强了创业者积极性。我当即申请入驻，3年来，依托园区的资源优势和各方面配合支持，我的公司已从当初一间不足11平方米的办公室，仅有2名员工，发展到40多名员工，两间办公室，总面积达500多平方米，每月盈利50多万元。 管理关？虚心学� ： 多听前辈“现身说法” 新闻视点：创业是条艰辛路。� 觉得大学生创业应保持一种怎� �的心态？ 杨永华：有创业者说“选择创业就是选择折腾自己”，但创业成功之后的喜悦和收获，也非常大，创业的人生也必然是丰富多彩的。大学生创业首先要有一种责任感和使命感，一个人的创业可以改变自己的未来，一群人的创业可以改变大家的未来，大学生不都做就业岗位的竞争者，还可做就业岗位的创� 者，怀着社会责任感去投身创业；年轻学子也要有坚韧不拔的意志，这是创业者必须具备的� 质。 新闻视点：与经历丰富的人相比，很多大学生创业者在企业发展到一定阶段，普遍面临管理问题的瓶颈。对此，� 有什么好建议？ 杨永华：这确实是一个比较大的问题，也是广大创业者面临的普遍问题。大学生创业，坚持非常重要，80%的创业失败者是在创业第一年退出的，所以首先要努力坚持挺过创业初期最困难的时候，要有应对困难、解决问题的决心和方法，有人说现在是“剩者为王”的时代，谁坚持下来，谁就是最后的胜利者。同时，要注意团队凝聚力，现在不少大学生创业者失败了，就� 为初期的创业团队� 利益分配等各种原� 分崩离析，最终导致失败。 此外，还要注意不断提升自己的经营管理能力，在创业过程中� 强学� ，针对自己能力的短板，不断通过学� 来提升。 【案例】赵瑞乐(开业指导专家志愿服务团专家)：1993年，我创办上海乐德塑料制品厂，目前是中国最大的牙线牙签制� 商。2000年，我首批� 入了开业指导专家志愿服务团。作为一名企业经营者，能把自己商海的酸甜苦辣与众多初创业者分享共勉，是荣幸和快乐。在去年“一帮一”创业者与开业专家结对活动中，我与大学生创业者徐保华签约结对，经过一段时间指导，徐保华成立了乐帮墨驰文教用品服务社。针对他的企业转型问题，我以自己的企业为例，帮助他在管理上提建议，服务社逐渐形成了组装、销售、服务等一条龙服务，申请了“墨驰”商� �，并稳步打响这一自主品牌，2009年底成功转制为上海鸿墨机电科技发展有限公司，走上正规化、企业化发展道路。指导了那么多大学生创业者，我感觉如今大学生创业者的物质条件，比我们当年好了很多，但持之以恒的精神还不够，创业中每天都会有想不到的问题，需要不断克服困难，虚心学� 。 精神关？不惧失败：
创业失败中兴许收获更多 新闻视点：� 一定接触过不少大学生创业失败的案例，他们的失败中，有没有一些共性的东西值得借鉴？ 杨永华：主要表现在� 方面：一是创业计划太过空泛，激情有余，理性不足，没有经过充分的市场调� �，一旦操作起来，发现计划离现实太远；二是团队的组织管理方面是一个比较突出的问题，大学生创业大多掌握了较好的专业技术，但在管理人的能力和经验上，往往比较� 缺；三是容易放弃，碰到挫折就轻易放弃了，没有坚持下来的勇气和决心。 新闻视点：� 觉得未来大学生的创业前景如何？ 杨永华：近期出台的“十二五”规划中，再次明确提出进一步扩大创业人才队伍，� 大对中小型民营企业的扶持。未来大学生创业的前景非常乐观，全社会的创业环境会越来越好，扶持政策措施会更有针对性，相信肯定会有越来越多的大学生投身创业活动。
【案例】翁华(上海鼎济建筑装饰设计工程有限公司总经理)：大学毕业后，我对室内装饰产生浓厚兴趣，2001年与人合作开办一家室内设计工作室，第一年没盈利，第二年总算摸着点门道，却遇到突如其来的“非典”，第一次创业黯然落幕。我陷入人生低谷，思索着失败的原� ：问自己，是我的水平不够，是市场不够大，还是“非典”惹的祸？想了很久，脑海里突然浮现一位企业导师说过的话：学� 改变命运。我� �子里缺的还是知识和经验。于是我收拾行囊来到上海，成为装潢技术学� �高级设计师班学员。之后开始做施工管理，为了学到更多，24小时吃住在工地上，虽然异常辛苦，却开拓了眼界，并结识了一批业内朋友。2006年二次创业，开办了现在的公司。当接到第一笔订单时，我没日没夜� 班，在自己租来的9平方米卧室完成了白手创业第一步。5年来，公司业务范围已扩展到全国，最远抵达非洲，还承接了奥运、世博等国家重点工程项目。回首来时路，失败其实不可怕，它会让� 真正思考。(记者 周� ）

description.hltext_display: 声威机箱新品：6021机箱全国到货
description.content:
如今的机箱市场可选性相当高，种类繁多，而且价格的差异不一，一千多块或更高总会存在，而低至不足百元的山寨产品更是随处可见。但对于普通的广大消费者来说，机箱作为电脑配件的一个载体，好与坏主要是体现在工艺、质量以及散热这几方面，什么炫彩外观多功能则可有可无。声威电子作为全国最大的机箱生产商，一直以来正是以这种传统实用的风格而著称业界，在消费者群体中有着良好的口碑。日前，通过声威经销商处了解到，其6021机箱日前已经全国到货。
声威6021外观以稳重的黑色作为主导，重启按键与USB接口、音频接口设计在面板的中部，方便常常需要进行数据交互的用户拔插USB外接设备。上方则是5.25的光驱位，挡板为可活动式设计，这个挡板既可以给光驱防尘，又和整个面板融为一体。
面板中间是声威机箱品牌的LOGO，简单而又具特色。面板中部与底部采用精美流畅流水线设计，完美的弧度结合钢琴烤漆突显了机箱独有的个性，非常的气派。
丝印LOGO的档板采用了活动门设计，刚好处于安装软驱的位置，开始可能是出于软驱的防尘考虑，但在软驱已经完全退出历史舞台的今天，只能充当更好地辅助散热功能了，当然也可以盛放一些经常使用的小东西，像U盘之类的。
声威6021机箱符合英特尔38°机箱设计标准，机箱左边侧板上设计了CPU和PCI插槽的散热孔，可以辅助机箱内部的散热。产品前后预留一个8cm风扇拓展安装位，双程互动散热，效果更佳。
声威6021机箱采用SGCC优质镀锌钢板，钢板厚度为0.5mm，耐腐蚀效果突出。产品提供2个5.25英寸安装位和5个3.25扩展位，提供7个PCI插槽，可容纳标准ATX架构主板，方便用户扩展各种设备。
主板托盘面积宽大，而且采用深抽工艺，不易变形，很好确保了主板安全。全部经过全卷边工艺设计，这种设计使得内部各个点都是光滑的，不会伤手，无疑是DIY们的上上首选。从经销商处获悉，目前声威6021的价格为268元。

description.hltext_display: Un piano per potenziare le infrastrutture nel Golfo
description.author: info@iltempo.it (info@iltempo.it
description.content: Sergio Monforte FORMIA Il Ministero delle Infrastrutture ha ufficialmente approvato il master plan e cioè il programma di sviluppo infrastrutturale integrato della «Città del Golfo di Gaeta e delle isole pontine», proposto dal Comune di Formia che entra, in tal modo, nel «sistema delle città territorio» promosso dallo stesso Ministero, con concrete possibilità di finanziamento progettuale.

description.hltext_display: 여성부, 미성년자 가정에 성범죄자 정보 발송
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
정부 부처 2011년 업무 보고
시간제 돌봄 서비스 4만가구로 확대
내년부터 19세 미만의 자녀를 둔 가정은 거주 지역의 아동ㆍ청소년 성범죄자 정보를 우편으로 고지 받게 된다. 또한 가정 양육 지원과 여성 일자리 지원 사업도 확대하기로 했다.
백희영 여성가족부 장관은 22일 무교동 청사에서 이 같은 내용의 '2011년 업무계획'을 이명박 대통령에게 보고했다.
여성가족부는 지난 4월 개정된 '아동ㆍ청소년 성보호에 관한 법률'에 따라 내년 1월1일부터 아동ㆍ청소년 대상 성범죄자 정보를 해당 지역 주민에게 우편으로 제공하는 '우편고지제도'를 신설했다. 19세 미만의 아동ㆍ청소년을 자녀로 둔 가정에 거주지 읍ㆍ면ㆍ동에 살고 있는 성범죄자의 이름, 사진, 나이, 지번을 포함한 상세주소 등 신상정보를 우편으로 안내해 어린이나 청소년 부모들이 일부러 인터넷 정보를 찾아봐야 하는 불편함을 덜어준다는 취지다. 또 내년부터 시ㆍ군ㆍ구 지방자치단체장을 책임자로 하는 '여성ㆍ아동보호 지역연대'를 활성화하고 아동에게 안전한 길을 안내하는 '아동안전지도' 제작을 전국으로 확대하기로 했다.
맞벌이 가정을 중심으로 아이 돌보미를 파견하는 '시간제 돌봄서비스' 지원 가구도 2만가구에서 4만가구로 확대한다. 출산 여성의 직장 복귀시 영아를 돌봐주는 '종일 돌봄 서비스' 지원 대상은 소득 하위 50% 이하 가구에서 70% 이하 가구로 확대하기로 했다. 또한 출산ㆍ육아 등으로 경력이 단절된 여성들에게 취업지원서비스를 제공하는 여성새로일하기센터를 77개소에서 90개소로 확대할 방침이다. 여성가족부는 다문화가족에 대한 지원에도 신경 써 결혼 이민자 및 자녀를 위한 다문화가족 서비스 수혜율을 올해 17%에서 내년 25%까지 끌어올린다. 사회문제로 떠오른 국제결혼 건전화를 위해서는 국제결혼 중개업 등록요건을 일정규모 이상 자본금을 갖춘 경우로 제한하는 방안을 입법화할 계획이다.

company.name: LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA
LVMH Moet Hennessy Louis Vuitton SA

description.hltext_display: Japan forecasts GDP growth to slow in 2011
description.content:
TOKYO (AFP) - The pace of Japan's economic growth will halve in fiscal 2011 from this year as a stimulus-driven shopping rush eases and exports fall on a strong yen and softer demand, the government said Wednesday.
In its outlook report, the Cabinet Office also said consumer prices will stop falling but will not rise, dealing a blow to Prime Minister Naoto Kan's stated goal of ending deflation in the year.
Recent year-on-year falls in the consumer price index will halt in the middle of next year, the Cabinet Office said, but suggested this would not represent the defeat of chronic deflation in the economy.
Growth is forecast to slow to a real 1.5 percent from 3.1 percent in this year, the government said in its outlook report.
Government stimulus measures helped boost domestic production and consumption in the current year, including subsidy programmes for purchases of environmentally friendly vehicles and appliances.
Japan's economy grew 4.5 percent in the July-September quarter, amplified by a rush by car buyers to use expiring subsidies and smokers who stocked up on cigarettes ahead of a tax hike during the period.
The hottest summer on record also drove sales of items such as air conditioners, helping spur growth in the quarter. Private consumption accounts for around 60 percent of gross domestic product.
However, analysts warn of a contraction in the fourth calendar quarter as the removal of such one-off factors highlights Japan's exposure to a weakening export picture and slow domestic demand.
Recent data has shown a slump in industrial output, especially among carmakers, as well as weakening consumer confidence as such incentive programmes come to an end.
The economy remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading of a 9.1 percent increase fell short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
"The pick-up in the year-on-year growth rate of exports in November may look encouraging but exports are heading for a big quarterly fall," noted research consultancy Capital Economics.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
The central bank in October forecast that the country's economy would expand 2.1 percent in the fiscal year ending in April, and 1.8 percent in 2011.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, at nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
Consumer spending growth is expected to slow next year to 0.6 percent from 1.5 percent this year.
However, the government forecast unemployment to continue to slowly improve, with the jobless rate expected to fall in the fiscal year starting April to 4.7 percent from 5.0 percent currently.

description.hltext_display: Gates focusing on Recruiting
description.author: Bob Lichtenfels
description.content: After helping Trinity Catholic win the Florida 2B State Championship, Jeremiaha Gates is now turning his attention towards recruiting. Gates put on a show and it will likely cause him to see an influx of offers.

description.hltext_display: 大学生晒求职成本 服装路费� 大头简历花钱最少 12-22
description.content:
每个人的求职成本各有侧重，有的交通费比较高，有的面试服装花费多一些，有的则比较侧重“技术包装”。惟一的共同消费项目，就是简历，这也是求职成本中最小的花费。找一份工作到底要花多少钱？且看� 位应聘大学生的“求职花费账单”。 为了一次面试咬牙“双飞” 【求职人：李� 】 ★花费成本：德州、成都往返机票及其他交通费用2000元+报名费50元=2050元 2008年，李� 毕业后就职于成都某单位，工作单位及待遇都不错，但是李� 的家人想让她回德州工作，离家人近一些。今年8月份，李� 看到德州某单位的招聘启事，招聘的职位正适合自己，李� 就想着回来试试。为了节省时间，她决定乘坐飞机回来应聘。 由于时间紧� ，难买打折机票，仅来回机票就花掉了1600元钱，� 之德州没有机场，她只得从济南转车，辗转的交通费又是一笔开支。好在最终她如愿应聘，这咬牙花掉的费用，没有白花。
千元买套面试服装
【求职人：王芳】
★花费成本：一身职业套装1388元+一双皮鞋368元=1756元
今年10月份，大学毕业的王芳终于接到了应聘单位的面试通知。拿到通知后，她却犯难了，之前一直在学� �，衣服要么走“可爱风”，要么很“学生气”，� �本不适合面试的场合。思来想去，王芳决定花血本买身职业装。一逛街她才知道，好一点儿的衣服动辄上千，为了增� 成功的� �� �，她最终买了一身套装和一双皮鞋，两项就花了1756元。幸运的是，她凭借出色的表现和一份自信，获得了那份工作。
“技术包装”成本居高不下
【求职人：李丽】
★花费成本：两个证书花费1400元+培训班花费560元=1960元
李丽大学的时候就是一名很听话的学生，她的笔记从来都是最认真的，成绩也是响当当，每次优秀生奖学金总少不了李丽的名字。
今年上半年，李丽就要毕业工作了，由于所学专业的原� ，有的企业要求应聘毕业生具备某些资� �证书，她也觉得这些在求职过程中是必不可少的。于是，毕业之前的一个月，她天天奔走于辅导班和证书资� �考试之间。这些证书其实是相关机构针对李丽所学的单位颁发的，只有缴纳一定的费用才能拿到。就这� �，在半个多月的时间里，李丽参� 了一个专业培训班、拿到了两个相关证书，这些当然也是有代价的，1900多块钱的投入，� 乎花光了她大学时候的所有积蓄。 扎实的专业知识，� 上这些“技术包装”，李丽在面试过程中很快脱颖而出，顺利地找到了一份比较满意的工作。对于自己的求职成本，李丽这� �评价：“我觉得有真才实学的话并不一定要多好的衣服，只要穿着得体就好，一个人的能力和� 质才是最重要的。虽然我在证书上花费不少，但是这些投资我觉得物有所值，一次投入如果能换回一份工作的话，这笔交易还是很划算的。”
◎相关链接：哪个行业求职成本最高
新浪教育联合国内一家调查公司对大学毕业生做了一项调查。抽� �44.4万人，共覆盖3080所高� �或分部分院，调查了1196个专业，覆盖了全国31个省、直辖市和自治区。
求职成本最高的是公共行政群众团体和金融、保险、房地产业，最低的行业是采矿业、农业、林业、渔业；综合求职成本和求职份数来看，文化、体育、教育、娱乐和旅游、旅馆餐饮、票务行业的求职难度较大，采矿业和农业、林业、渔业求职难度较小。

description.hltext_display: INDIAN UNION GOVERNMENT POLICE FORCES MOVING INTO ANDHRA PRADESH STATE IN SOUTH
description.author: noreply@allvoices.com
description.content:
In view of the submission of Sri Krishna Committee Report on "Telengana" state formation issue, before 31,December of this year, the Indian government at New Delhi and state government of Andhra Pradesh are anticipating possible violence in the politically disturbed state of Andhra Pradesh. As the (TRS) Party, which is violently agitating for creation of an additional state of Telengana in the Indian Union, has already warned the Central Government in New Delhi and the Government at state on, unleashing violence, if Sri Krishna Committee Report comes against formation of Telengana State by dividing the existing state of Andhra Pradesh into two parts.
In view of the warnings and threats posed by the TRS party and other Telengana saparatists, the state Director General of Police already sought the Central Government for 50 batallions of Central forces and Para-military forces for controlling the possible violence after 31, December 2010. Already some batallions have reached the state, and other forces are likely to reach the Hyderabad city after X mas. Alredy special police units have been created by giving specilized training to tackle the possible violence after 31, December.

description.hltext_display: 已知最高频 铭鑫GTS250U中国玩家版699热卖
description.content:
今年在A/N两大家的强势推动下，整个显卡市场的格局几乎可以用颠覆二字来形容，曾经价位高高在上的中高端显卡早已落入寻常百姓家，比如我们要给大家介绍的这款699元的铭鑫GTS250U-1GBD3TC中国玩家版显卡。
如今在500-700这个隶属中端显卡必争之地上，N卡方面GTS450刚刚全面铺货，价位一时半会还难顾及这个区域，所以和对手竞争的主力型号还是老当益壮的GTS250。铭鑫GTS250U-1GBD3TC中国玩家版采用了55纳米G92显示核心，显卡的核心代号为G92-428-B1，它拥有128个流处理器和16个光栅处理器的全规格搭配，支持DirectX 10和Shader Model 4.0。
显存部分铭鑫为这款显卡搭配了现代0.8ns GDDR3显存颗粒，组成了512MB/256bit显存规格，显卡默认出厂频率为750/2400MHz，是目前已知GTS250中最高频的显卡，性能方面自然可以给用户不少期待。此外这款显卡可通过共享本地内存最大可将显存容量提升至1024MB，达到3D性能的提升。
在散热部分，因为使用了两个白色超频三风扇加4铜热管的散热方式，再加上PCB板上加装的加固条，铭鑫这款GTS250U-1GBD3TC中国玩家版显卡显得非常“强壮”，当然除了强壮之外，这样的搭配在散热以及显卡整体的稳固性上都能得到充足的保证。
供电部分铭鑫GTS250U-1GBD3TC中国玩家版采用了核心/显存5+1供电的方案，提供了很高的品质。元器件上选用了全固态电容与封闭的电感，加上双6pin供电接口，为显卡长期使用提供了保证。
最后来看看接口方面，铭鑫GTS250U-1GBD3TC中国玩家版提供了VGA+DVI+HDMI输出接口，支持各种类型的双头输出模式，可以实现高达2560x1600的高分辨率输出。

description.hltext_display: 差し替え：韓国軍、延坪島海上射撃訓練午後２時３０分に開始
优酷IPO刺激视频行业膨胀：百度搜狐加速布局
description.content:
腾讯科技讯(胡祥宝)“酷6惨淡、乐视扯淡、土豆的有人在捣蛋，只有优酷在数金蛋，第一视频吃的是赌饭，天线视频的高管搞不好要吃牢饭。”2010年12月初，一业内人士在微博中的寥寥数语，描绘出当前国内视频行业的现状。
12月8日，优酷抢先土豆在美纽交所成功上市，其市值一度超过搜狐，逼近新浪，成为互联网行业中的一场盛宴。
优酷的上市也刺激了国内视频网站的膨胀，56网、悠视网相继高调表示未来将寻求上市，而三大互联网巨头，新浪、搜狐和百度开始在这一领域加速，国内视频行业的新一轮混战再次展开。
新浪搜狐加速视频产业布局
2010年12月，“新浪注资杭州一家视频社区网站9158聚乐网”的传闻被媒体证实，投资额度为3000万元。9158聚乐网是一家主打视频社区的公司，通过一款集合了聊天交友、视频互动、在线K歌等功能的客户端软件来运营。其商业模式是通过为用户提供虚拟物品等来实现视频的增值服务。
按照媒体披露的数据，目前9158聚乐网注册用户已达千万，主要为二三线城市，去年全年营业额超过2亿元。
一直走媒体路线且自身有视频频道的新浪投资视频社区网站，从表面看似乎多少有点不可思议。在今年新浪第三季度财报会上，摩根士丹利发表报告指出，新浪在线视频广告销售同比增70%，在未来3年可能实现翻番。
当时新浪方面表示，在线视频广告销售已经占其总广告营收的19%，是旗帜广告和付费搜索发展速度的2倍。新浪CEO曹国伟声称，第四季度在视频业务仍会重点布局。有人猜测，未来新浪或将通过“自身视频频道+9158视频社区”的并行策略，来进一步掘金视频领域。
在业内知情人士看来，如今新浪的核心竞争力正从原来的新闻内容向资本运作过度。此前，新浪已经对房产类的乐居、游戏领域的麒麟网和社交网络领域的开心网进行过注资。
上述人士说：“新浪正用10多年建立的品牌和积累的资本，与众多垂直领域结盟，最终形成子频道的资源整合，实现单个资产价值的最大化。”
除了新浪，传统门户的的搜狐的视频策略也开始凸显。今年，搜狐CEO张朝阳曾高调宣称，视频是搜狐的三大核心战略之一。
据搜狐内部人士透露，搜狐视频将和搜狐畅游一样独立分拆上市运作，“只是时间的早晚问题。” 而据媒体报道宣称，如今搜狐高清视频频道已经去掉了全站导航条，具体分拆时间将在明年六月。
目前，搜狐视频的收入还是纳入搜狐整体的广告收入之内，外界暂难以精确计算。但张朝阳在今年第三季电话会议中透露，2010年第三季度来自搜狐的视频业务的网络广告收入是2009年同期的3倍。
12月初，搜狐宣布将于2011年投入上亿资金，主打"媒体"、"资源"、"出品"三大视频战略，并实现iPad、iPhone以及Gpad、Gphone等多终端布局。
有消息人士透露，以娱乐为主打特色的搜狐正在视频版权和自制剧方面加大投入，未来或将通过自上而下的策略打通视频产业链。
实际上，传统的门户网站都一直暗中觊觎视频行业的前景，只不过因为整个行业都在亏损，拐点还不是特别明朗，所以都暗自“潜伏”，以求在最佳时机切入。
“此次新浪和搜狐的视频策略加速推出，或许是受到了优酷成功上市的刺激。另外，随着版权保护力度加强及视频广告价值提升，拥有资金实力的门户加速推进自然顺理成章。”有人甚至猜测，很快，四大门户中两家也将加速在视频领域的布局。
4模式下的5大资本集团博弈
面对门户的加速布局，上市后的优酷自然不会闲着。据古永锵 (微博)透露，未来优酷将沿着互联网电视的发展策略，采取“Hulu正版广告+点播收费”的盈利模式。上市后，优酷将采取两种方式进一步扩大市场份额：其一，通过在技术与内容方面进行投资;其二，锁定移动视频用户。
眼下，伴随着优酷上市和传统门户的加速抢食，视频行业逐渐形成了四大模式。
概括而言，当前国内视频行业，除了上游制作方之外，主要有视频网站、视频客户端、门户网站、版权分销商4大模式。
在这四种模式的博弈中，其中视频网站领域的优酷、酷6在获得资本做后盾后，成为专业视频网站的主要阵营。
而百度也在今年4月斥资5000万美金拆分出独立的视频网站奇艺。截止到今年10月份，奇艺官方宣称用户达到8600万，龚宇表示，公司收入比2007年优酷的数据更好。优酷2007年净营收1778万元，照此推算，奇艺半年来的营收超900万元。
按照百度当初的想法，奇艺通过砸钱买正版视频，百度导流量，然后卖广告，高举高打市场营销，循序渐进可分得视频领域的一杯羹。但奇艺的Hulu正版模式在国内走得并没有那样的迅速。因为搜狐、酷6等各家都推出免费正版，奇艺用户粘性很难实现陡增。
有视频行业人士表示，美国的Hulu背后有FOX等娱乐公司做平台支持，其版权选择面大。而百度则缺乏持续多年的媒体资源平台支撑，加上正版面临的巨大带宽烧钱压力，奇艺的单纯靠购买版权维持正版之路很难持久。
据了解，近期，奇艺开始大力推广IPAD客户端，而龚宇也透露，未来还将推出基于PC的客户端，实行“网站播放+客户端”的融合策略。
据艾瑞报告预测，未来三年，国内网络视频行业广告收入年增速将超过65%，到2013年，这一数字预计将达到110亿元。
曾做过VC的六间房CEO刘岩(微博)说：“眼下，国内视频网站行业已经不是拼产品的好坏，也不是拼技术，甚至不是拼内容，而是拼资本。”
未来，国内视频网站将形成优酷、酷6背后的盛大、搜狐、新浪和百度五大资本系的新角逐。而众多缺乏资金的二线视频公司生存空间将进一步被挤压，在无法被收购的情况下，寻求转型或成他们唯一的出路。

description.hltext_display: Brotherhood is a slick update for Assassin Creed
description.content:
UbisoftIn this video game image provided by Ubisoft, a scene from "Assassin's Creed Brotherhood," is shown.
Ubisoft
In this video game image provided by Ubisoft, a scene from ...
UbisoftIn this video game image provided by Ubisoft, a scene from "Assassin's Creed Brotherhood," is shown.
At first glance, the release of Assassin’s Creed: Brotherhood might seem like a money grab.
It was, after all, only one year ago that Ubisoft released the critically acclaimed Assassin’s Creed 2. And whereas that game was a big step forward for the young franchise, Brotherhood plays more like a refinement rather than another innovative leap.
But Brotherhood is clearly Ubisoft’s opportunity to tinker with the finer elements of gameplay in an already stellar title, and give fans of the franchise more of what they’ve loved.
Brotherhood, rated M for Mature and is available for PC, Playstation 3 and Xbox 360, is not for well-suited for newcomers.
The single-player plot picks up right where Assassin’s Creed 2 ended and will confuse gamers who haven’t been keeping track of the convoluted story line since the original game came out in 2007.
Like Assassin’s Creed 2, Brotherhood once again follows the adventures of Ezio Auditore da Firenze set in Renaissance Italy. Whereas previous games in the series took place in multiple locations, Brotherhood sticks to Rome as its primary setting.
And it’s a beautiful setting for the game.
Ubisoft’s Montreal studio faithfully re-creates Rome’s most famous landmarks of the time, including Castel Sant’Angelo, the Roman Forum and the Colosseum. Climbing a tower and looking out over the city in “Brotherhood” is a visual that will stay with gamers long after they’ve completed the game.
Ezio also remains a compelling protagonist, but Ubisoft would be wise to move on from the character after this game.
In Brotherhood, Ezio has become a master assassin since the events of AC: 2. Without spoiling the plot, Ezio is given a new, less compelling reason to seek revenge. “Brotherhood” often feels like Ubisoft didn’t want to let go of Assassin’s Creed 2, and the story is an unfortunate reflection of that.
Past Assassin’s Creed games have been criticized for the repetitive, clunky combat, but many of the kinks have been worked out in Brotherhood. New weapons such as the crossbow have been added, and Ezio can perform combo executions to quickly finish off adversaries.
The biggest new addition to the series is the ability to recruit and train other assassins, who appear to help gamers at the touch of a button. Recruits gain experience and new abilities by being sent off on missions around Europe, although because gamers can’t play out these missions themselves it feels like Ubisoft missed an opportunity.
Still, watching Ezio raise a hand as a swarm of assassins jump out is extremely satisfying. But it also highlights how utterly easy the business of assassination has become.
In adding new ways to kill, Ubisoft has taken away the challenge of stalking a target and picking the best way to finish them off. For example, holding a button in Brotherhood brings about a flurry of arrows that kill every enemy on the screen. It’s a great visual effect, but removes any reward for creativity.
It’s a shame, because the more subtle game play in Brotherhood feels like a perfection of the formula.
Courtesans, thieves and mercenaries are no longer just available around the map — you have to earn them. Similarly, gamers can’t just scale towers to reveal new parts of the map. First they have to eliminate an enemy target near most towers before starting their ascent.
Also returning from AC 2 are the optional dungeons, which are often the best parts of Brotherhood. Whether it is exploring an ancient crypt or chasing a corrupt cardinal through the rafters of the St. Peter’s Basilica, the dungeons are immersive fun and well worth seeking out.
Ubisoft has included a multiplayer feature in Brotherhood, a first for the series. The concept is intriguing — gamers pick a character then hunt each other in a crowded environment without trying to give themselves away.
It’s a good change of pace but becomes repetitive after a few rounds. Too often, killing the target gives you away to the gamer assigned with assassinating you.
Ubisoft’s network could also use a patch. Provided gamers have patience to wait out the time it takes for a round to start, they may experience several dropped games.
There’s little reason to play the multiplayer mode when the solo campaign is so well done. Gamers who have stuck with the franchise from the beginning will appreciate the plot developments, which include a shocking cliffhanger that will leave fans begging for the next Assassin’s Creed game.
But that’s also the biggest dilemma with playing Brotherhood — it feels like required reading. If gamers haven’t played the previous games, there’s no good reason to pick up Brotherhood. Similarly, the game furthers the series’ canon too much to be ignored by even casual fans.
Who did Ubisoft make this game for? It’s a fair question to ask of an enjoyable game that still needs a pair of prerequisites to play and features an unnecessary multiplayer mode.
Brotherhood is a great game. It’s just too bad Ubisoft has made a game Assassin’s Creed fans will have to play just to keep up, rather than one that stands on its own.

description.hltext_display: 桂林市中小企业融资又添新平台
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)桂林市中小企业融资又添新渠道。12月20日下午，桂林中小企业服务中心、广西联合产权交易所和广西广飞投资有限公司三方战略合作签约仪式在桂林中小企业服务中心举行。该平台将建成面向桂林广大中小企业提供投融资服务，提供促进各类产权流转顺畅和资源优化配置的公共信息的全方位服务平台。
据介绍，广西联合产权交易所作为区国资委指定的广西首家从事企业公有与非公有产权交易的专业机构，依法组织各类所有制非上市公司及企事业单位产权交易，是非上市公司股权转让、企业改革改制、重组并购的市场化“阳光”平台；是中小企业对接资本市场的投融资平台。广西广飞投资有限公司是广西联合产权交易所唯一指定合作机构。
桂林中小企业服务中心主要为桂林市中小企业提供多主体、多层次、全方位、公益性、低成本的社会化服务的综合机构。这三者联手将为桂林市企业提供股权托管、产权交易、上市等新的现代企业管理理念和服务，能更有效率地解决企业的困难，帮助企业按规范、高效的模式发展，促进桂林市企业规范管理、做强做大。(桂林日报/陈静）

description.hltext_display: 张呈栋替补进球信心大增 豪言不比葡国球员差
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content: 记者傅亚雨报道12月19日，葡超进入冬歇期前的最后一轮比赛,张呈栋效力的雷利亚队客场3比0完胜纳瓦尔，张呈栋下半场替补上场，为球队攻入第二粒入球，锁定胜局。此役获胜之后，雷利亚跻身葡超三甲，排名仅仅落后于里斯本竞技和本菲卡两大豪门。在圣诞假期来临之前进球，帮助俱乐部杀进前三，张呈栋的圣诞假期将带着愉悦的心

description.hltext_display: 新闻背景：英国小学生“玩”出来的大论文 12-22
Ankiel likes Nats' direction, ready to get started
description.content:
NEW YORK -- Outfielder Rick Ankiel said he signed with the Nationals because he likes the direction the team is going and is looking forward to being reunited with manager Jim Riggleman and hitting coach Rick Eckstein. The trio worked together when they were in the Cardinals' organization.
"I'm excited. I feel like they are making the right moves," Ankiel said via telephone Tuesday. "They are really trying to get better from their Draft picks and the people they are trying to get now. I've had some personal involvement with Riggleman and Eckstein when I was with the Cardinals."
Considered an excellent defensive outfielder with speed, Ankiel is a player the Nats have been thinking about acquiring since 2009. He will compete against Roger Bernadina for the job in left field. According to a baseball source, Washington has not ruled out Ankiel competing against Nyjer Morgan in center field.
If he wins either job, the left-handed-hitting Ankiel will be in a platoon situation. In his career, Ankiel is 77-for-332 (.232) with 11 home runs and 32 RBIs against left-handed pitching. Ankiel believes he can improve his hitting under Eckstein. The two will start working after the holidays.
"I'm going to get with Eckstein and try to see what ideas he might have and just try to find a foundation," Ankiel said. "I have a good relationship with Rick. I'm looking forward to being with him, without question. I'll be with him all year."
This past season, Ankiel hit a combined .210 with two home runs and 10 RBIs with the Royals and Braves. He missed most of the year because of a hamstring injury. However, Ankiel hit the game-winning home run in Game 2 of the National League Division Series to help the Braves beat the Giants.
"Injuries -- they take you out of it," Ankiel said. "It seems when I came back, I couldn't get that groove that I wanted to have. I had a disappointing year. That's the way it goes sometimes. I'm looking forward to 2011."
Bill Ladson is a reporter for MLB.com and writes an MLBlog, All Nats All the time. He also could be found on Twitter @WashingNats. This story was not subject to the approval of Major League Baseball or its clubs.

description.hltext_display: 全公務員非常勤務態勢維持、李大統領が指示
Russia opens probe into Bank of Moscow: report
description.content:
Russian law enforcement officials have opened a criminal investigation into a top Russian bank owned by the Moscow city government, the Kommersant business daily reported Wednesday.
The probe into the Bank of Moscow, which has been majority-owned by the city since 1995, is linked to a 12.76-billion-ruble (415-million-dollar) loan the bank issued to a little known firm in 2009, Kommersant said.
That company then went on to purchase a plot of land at what investigators believe was an inflated price from Yelena Baturina, the wife of the now-deposed mayor of Moscow, Yury Luzhkov.
Baturina has risen to become Russia's richest woman according to Forbes magazine on the back of Moscow real estate contracts awarded to her Inteko construction firm.
But the company has been riddled with debt since the 2009 financial crisis.
The Financial Times reported that the transaction took place on the same day as the Moscow city parliament approved a 15-billion-ruble transfer to the Bank of Moscow.
Russia's interior ministry is now checking to see whether the funds were transferred to help Baturina settle her debts, the Financial Times said.
A spokesman for Baturina's company told the Interfax news agency Wednesday that the land deal was "completely legal" but provided no further details.
Luzhkov became mayor of Moscow in 1992 and eventually established himself as one of Russia's most powerful regional bosses.
But he lost a political tug of war with the Kremlin and was fired by President Dmitry Medvedev in September.
The bank is also being probed by the country's audit chamber -- with both investigations launched since Luzhkov's ouster.
"The Bank of Moscow financed all of Moscow's major economic projects, which is why is why we are checking all the funds that flowed from the bank to the city," audit chamber chief Sergei Stepashin was quoted as saying by Interfax.
He said the initial results of the audit chamber's investigation would be made public this month.
The Russian media reported this month that Baturina has been negotiating to sell her company. Inteko officials have refused to publicly comment on the reports.
The investigation surfaced amid attempts by Russia's VTB bank to acquire the Moscow lender.
The Bank of Moscow has accused VTB of making a series of false allegation about the bank that are meant to help reduce its eventual acquisition price.
VTB executives this month said they had questions about the Bank of Moscow's ownership structure and whether some of its city assets were in fact privately held.
The Bank of Moscow reports on its website that it is Russia's fifth-largest bank in terms of assets and capital.
It also says that the Moscow city government owns 46.48 percent of the bank directly and 17.32 percent indirectly through another city-controlled firm.

description.hltext_display: 복지부, 국민연금 수급자 긴급자금 대여 추진
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
정부 부처 2011년 업무 보고
비정규직 근로자도 장애연금 수혜 가능
보건복지부는 22일 '서민이 행복한 나라, 따뜻한 대한민국'을 목표로 보고한 내년 주요 업무계획에서 ▦건강보험 재정 안정화를 위한 보건의료체계 개편 ▦맞춤형 서민 복지 확대 ▦탈빈곤 지원 및 나눔문화 등을 핵심과제로 제시했다.
복지부는 기초생활수급자 위주의 소극적인 보호에서 일을 통해 적극적으로 탈빈곤을 지원하는 시스템으로 전환하고 양적확대와 기반구축보다는 내실화와 지속가능성에 초점을 맞추기로 했다.
복지부는 우선 직장가입자의 피부양자로 무임승차하고 있는 고액 재산가에게 보험료를 걷기로 했다. 일단 금융재산이나 부동산 등 재산보유액을 기준으로 부과대상을 잡은 뒤 이를 늘려갈 계획이다. 지난 5월 현재 평균 보험료의 24배 수준으로 직장가입자는 월 175만원, 지역가입자는 월 172만원인 보험료 상한선도 30배 수준인 월 223만원과 209만원으로 최대 48만원가량 늘어날 것으로 전망된다.
수입 안정화를 위해 내년 말로 종료되는 국고지원(일반회계 14%, 건강증진기금 6% 등 보험료 수입의 20%)을 연장하는 등 대비책도 마련한다. 지출구조의 효율성 제고를 위해 ▦입원 부문 포괄수가제 적용 확대 ▦본인부담 제도 개편 ▦선택의원제 도입도 추진할 방침이다.
복지부는 또 장관 직속으로 보건의료미래개혁위원회를 구성해 의료 및 건강보험 제도 개선방안과 지속가능성 확보 및 미래발전을 위한 단ㆍ장기 개혁플랜도 8월까지 마련하기로 했다.
보건복지산업 육성을 위해 오는 2015년까지 해외환자 30만명을 유치하고 병원을 비롯해 정보기술(IT), 의료인, 의료장비ㆍ의약품 등을 패키지로 묶은 병원플랜트의 동반 수출도 추진한다.
진수희 장관의 역점 분야인 자활과 나눔에도 복지부의 역량이 집중된다.
복지부는 현재 28만명의 수급자 가운데 4만2,000명만이 참여하고 있는 자활사업 대상자에 대해 2012년까지 15만명을 탈빈곤 집중지원 대상으로 관리해 19만명까지 늘리기로 했다. 지방자치단체가 이를 적극적으로 관리하고 실적에 따라 국고보조금 차등 지급 등 인센티브도 부여할 계획이다.
급여액이 소액이고 고령자인 국민연금 수급자가 의료비, 배우자 장제비 등 노후에 긴급한 필수자금을 필요로 하는 경우 연금기금에서 대여하는 방안도 추진한다. 복지부는 내년 중으로 계획안을 수립해 국민연금기금운용위원회 의결을 거쳐 2012년 중 대여사업을 추진할 예정이다.
일정기간 국민연금 납부이력이 있는 비정규직 근로자나 전업주부 등도 장애연금이나 유족연금 혜택을 받을 수 있게 된다.
나눔 문화 확산을 위해서는 나눔의 날(10월4일)을 제정하고 초ㆍ중ㆍ고 정규교과과정에 나눔교육을 강화하는 등 나눔의 생활화에 나선다. 또한 나눔 실천자를 적극 발굴하고 지속화ㆍ생활화될 수 있는 인센티브를 부여하며 사회지도층이 나눔을 솔선수범할 수 있는 여건도 조성한다.
복지부는 이 같은 정책적 노력과 함께 보건의료 분야의 신산업을 육성하고 새로운 사회서비스를 창출해 2년간 36만개의 일자리도 창출할 수 있을 것으로 예상했다.
ㆍ"F-22 랩터 뜨고 미사일로 北 정밀타격"
ㆍ내년 그랜저 HG에 장착할 '신기술'
ㆍ제네시스·쏘나타 이어 싼타페·K5도 '와우!'
ㆍ속살 노출한 이세은 "속옷은 걸칠 줄 알았는데…"
ㆍ北 잠수함·경비정 동해로 침투한다면…
ㆍ트위터에 맥 못추던 국내 업체들 '대반격!'
ㆍ오세훈 "서울시 1급 공무원 전원 사표"… 왜?
ㆍMBC 퇴출자 29명, 출연금지 이유 알고보니…
ㆍ삐걱대던 한국 고속철 '초대박' 터트릴까
ㆍ가격 확 낮춘 애플TV 돌풍 '심상찮네!'

description.hltext_display: Tons of coins found in Shaanxi
description.content:
Workers dug out about 4 tons of ancient coins Monday in Huaxian, Shaanxi province.
Some authorities said that the coins may be from the Song Dynasty (960-1279), and accordingto the characters on the coins they may have been made sometime in 1102 to 1106.

description.hltext_display: 去哪儿回应虚假400信息：谷歌犯错 但我们埋单
description.content:
来源:站长网原创 时间:2010-12-22 09:03 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
即便在知名网站上搜到的信息也不一定是真的，而这迫切需要相关网站做好侦辨工作。
近日，去哪儿网首度回应关于北京市工商局披露去哪儿网搜索结果含有虚假“400”票务信息，称事件“由谷歌投放广告引起”，并承诺“对用户负责到底”。
事件回放 400电话诈骗
北京市工商局本月17日发布文章称：近日，市工商局首都机场分局接到多起消费者通过网络购买航空电子机票后无法正常拿到机票或无法正常出行的投诉。
经调查了解，这些消费者均是通过去哪儿网站搜索到的以“400”开头的购票电话，在低折扣的诱惑下，未经确认，轻易把机票款汇给指定账号后发生的问题。经初步分析，这些“400”机票销售电话均涉嫌欺诈。
官方回复 谷歌也有责任
去哪儿方面表示，北京市工商局提及的该类投诉，发生在今年的10月中旬，是由谷歌在去哪儿网站上投放广告(俗称Google AdSense)而引起的。由于谷歌对其广告主审查不严，造成了400电话诈骗的事情发生。
据称，去哪儿网在事发的第一时间就主动联系了消费者，并已协助消费者进行了报案。整个事情的投诉、处理、善后等，均备有书面记录及录音材料，可随时供警方调阅。同时，去哪儿网也在事发的第一时间就屏蔽了谷歌在去哪儿网上的所有机票类的广告投放，阻止了400电话诈骗的再次发生，并向谷歌发出了严正交涉的书面文件。
“整个事件，在10月中旬事发后的3天内，去哪儿网就妥善地处理完毕了，并得到了消费者的理解和表扬。”去哪儿网相关负责人表示。
防骗承诺 “全额赔付”计划
据悉，目前去哪儿网上搜索到的558家机票代理商，全部都拥有中国航空运输协会(CATA)颁发给航空运输销售代理人的认证资格证书(俗称“代理人铜牌”)，去哪儿网每年会对其资质的有效性进行审查。
此外，从今年12月起，针对去哪儿用户订票风险，去哪儿网已经开展了一项消费者“赔”计划：如果用户在去哪儿网预订国内机票，支付后供应商不出票，去哪儿网全额赔付机票款;如果用户支付后，供应商加价出票，去哪儿网全额赔付加收的机票款;如果用户支付后，供应商提供假机票导致不能出行，去哪儿网也将全额赔付机票款。
上述负责人表示，去哪儿网一贯本着对消费者负责、对社会负责的态度。去哪儿网也非常感谢北京市工商局的监察与督促，并真诚接受广大消费者及各界人士的批评与指导。商报记者 罗添 张绪旺/文

description.hltext_display: 巴西小妖人震憾杜震宇 曾被拜仁本菲卡狂追
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content: 特约记者徐岗报道“真正体会了巴西球员对足球的理解与天赋，我们的新外援五分钟就可以理解球队整体的战术要求和个人要求，真的让我惊叹不已，想一想国内的一些球员一年都不一定真正的理解，我想这就是中国足球和巴西足球的差距吧。”20日，亚泰队长杜震宇在微博上发出如上惊叹。让他赞不绝口的是一名来自巴西的试训前锋多

description.hltext_display: Nexus S GPU性能大超兄弟机Nexus One
description.content:
智能手机的基准得分真的有那么重要吗？或许有些人会表示无视，但是每当一款新的手机或者处理器进入市场的时候，能有一个得分进行硬件排名还是会有很多人关注的，比如Google和三星联合推出的Nexus S。
GLBenchmark 2.0
GLBenchmark 2.0在上周刚刚开放下载，这个测试套件包含了30多个项目用来测试OpenGL ES 2.0，本次测试主要进行的是无FSAA下的Egypt和PRO两个场景测试。
Nexus S和Galaxy S马甲机Epic 4G的得分相差无几，因为他们都是基于三星的蜂鸟处理器，使用的是PowerVR SGX540 GPU。相比Nexus One，Nexus S的性能得分已经超出续多倍，第一代高通Snapdragon处理器已经显现出颓势，其内置的Adreno 200 GPU已经开始不能跟上最新的3D游戏的要求。
An3DBench
An3DBench软件测试包含有从填充率到复杂场景的7个场景，在这项软件中，Nexus S依然保持领先。
3D Mark Mobile
这项测试使用了最新的3D Mark Mobile内部版本，但是得分情况有些怪异。G2的800 MHz第二代高通Snapdragon处理器搭配Adreno 205 GPU在Taiji测试中跑到了前面，在其他测试软件中，G2的得分通常低于Galaxy S系列手机。
在跑分之外的3D游戏中，Nexus S与其他的Galaxy S手机很难感觉到有什么差别。PowerVR SGX540目前仍然是最快的智能手机GPU，并将保持领先地位直到明年的多核心处理器智能手机上市。

description.hltext_display: Two men arrested after breaking into 50 Cent?s residence
description.content:
FARMINGTON, CONNECTICUT (BNO NEWS) -- Two men were arrested on Tuesday after breaking into rapper 50 Cent's Connecticut home, TMZ.com reported. One of them was found drinking inside a closet.
A security guard called cops at around 6 a.m. local time on Tuesday when he observed a suspicious car on the driveway of the Farmington, Connecticut residence, which belongs to rapper 50 Cent.
When police officers arrived at the 52-room Farmington mansion, no signs of a forced entry were found. However, police later determined that the two burglars had accessed the grounds by climbing over a fence and entering through an unlocked door.
Curtis Jackson, better known as 50 Cent, was not in the residence at the time of the break-in. The criminals did not notice that officers had arrived at the scene and one of them, Alexander Hernandez, was found hiding in a closet, drinking a bottle of wine which he stole at the mansion.
The second suspect, identified as Santos Padilla, was found to be hiding in another part of the house, which was once owned by famous heavyweight boxer Mike Tyson. Both burglars were in possession of marijuana at the time of their arrest.
Hernandez was later released on a $50,000 bond and was turned over to New Britain police officers where he is wanted on outstanding warrants. Meanwhile, Padilla was held on a $50,000 bond.
The Queens hip hop mogul has not made any comment so far about the break-in of the 50,000-square-foot house, which he bought for $4.1 million in 2003. The 19-bedroom, 37-bathroom house is valued at $9,9 million and has a gym, billiards rooms, racquetball courts and a disco with stripper poles.
(

description.hltext_display: 信用担保成为中小企业发展的“助力器”
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)信用担保行业是朝阳行业，也是创新金融服务理念的新生事物，是解决中小企业融资瓶颈问题的重要渠道，是由政府搭台企业唱戏的多功能融资服务平台。市中小企业局局长茹述创介绍，从目前我市信用担保行业的发展情况来看，中小企业担保机构已成为企业发展的催化剂和助力器，成为银行与企业间的重要桥梁，中小企业也开始
享有了政府给予的真正意义上的融资权，享受到了担保融资带来的实惠和发展的喜悦。
观念落后制约发展
据了解，我市从1999年成立第一家中小企业信用担保公司以来，社会资本不断进入担保行业，到2009年底止，已经有中小企业信用担保机构176家，注册资本金64.38亿元。但在这些担保机构中，由于种种原因，有90%的公司都不做业务，而真正为中小企业做贷款担保业务的也不足20家。据统计，截至目前，我市信用担保机构累计贷款额达154.5亿元，与重庆市中小企业信用担保机构累计担保总额670.76亿元相差很多。专家介绍，目前我市担保业发展严重滞后，既有观念落后的问题，更有政府政策引导、扶持力度不够的问题。就现在而言，一是担保机构规模小，注册资本金少，抵御风险能力不强；担保机构运作不规范，有些担保机构打着为中小企业融资的幌子，抽逃资本金或非法集资等现象时有发生，与银行合作不对等，利益共享受，风险却不能共担；为担保机构开展业务的绿色通道不畅，相关登记部门不配合，这些问题严重制约了我市担保业的发展。
政府引导优化环境
茹述创在谈到我市信用担保体系建设的情况时说，从成都、杭州等地的经验看，担保业的发展，担保能力的增强，经济效益的体现，主要是靠股份制和民营商业性担保公司。如去年我市成立了以政府出资和民生银行太原分行及部分企业共同参股的太原民生投资担保公司，创新了担保业新模式，改变了我市担保机构过度依赖政策性投入的格局。我们只有通过政府的积极引导和典型带动，才能促进社会资本的投入，为我市中小企业构建多种体制、多种形式的融资服务平台，以满足不同中小企业的融资需求，彻底优化我市的融资环境。
重庆市的经验做法非常值得我们学习，他们把各职能部门的闲散资金集中起来，成立行业、系统类担保机构。如：重庆有农业担保公司、教育担保公司、科技担保公司、文化产业担保公司、园区工业担保公司等。用他们的话说，就是政府的资金不撒胡椒面。把政府有限的资金注入到担保公司，然后通过担保放大8至10倍，充分发挥其四两拨千斤的杠杆作用。 创新模式加快发展
去年以来，我市通过大力推进中小企业信用建设，努力扶持中小企业担保机构，积极搭建银、企、保、信、投对接合作平台，创新融资模式，拓宽融资渠道，在市中小企业信用担保有限公司、山西商融担保股份有限公司及富帮担保等6家担保机构和驻并各大银行的通力合作下，共为我市中小企业提供了500多笔担保贷款业务，贷款担保总额达近30亿元。但这也只是杯水车薪，距中小企业每年实际需求的资金额度相差甚远。与我市中小企业快速发展的实际需要相比，我市中小企业信用担保体系还存在担保机构数量少、规模小、实力弱，担保行业人才溃乏、行规行约建设滞后，运作不规范、抗风险能力不强等诸多问题。因此，加强我市中小企业信用担保体系建设是当前一项迫切的工作任务。
重庆市翰华担保股份有限公司张经理前不久在太原为我市各信用担保机构讲课时说，太原与发达城市的差距主要是融资能力的差距。凡是发达地区，银行多是贷款大于存款；凡是欠发达地区，银行多是存款大于贷款。资金是现代经济运行的血液，担保是搞活金融的助推器。担保事业发展了，血脉畅通了，经济就活了，自然发展就快了。（来源：太原新闻网）

description.hltext_display: 速報：韓国軍、延坪島海上射撃訓練を終了
澳洲573类学生签证评估等级降至3级 12-22
description.content:
面对国内外教育界频频施� 的压力，近日澳大利亚签证政策� 出利好。据澳大利亚驻华使领馆教育处向媒体发布的新闻通报称，上周四，澳大利亚移民与公民事务部(以下简称移民部)部长ChrisBowen和高等教育部长ChrisEvans参议员对外宣布了对学生签证的策略复审结果和四项新举措，以减轻国际教育部门的压力。
其中最值得关注的变化是从2011年4月起，针对来自中国的573类(高等教育)学生签证的签证评估等级(AL) 将从4级降低为3级。这项调整意味着澳大利亚政府降低了对申请573类学生签证的中国学生所需提交证明材料的要求，这也意味着中国学生申请澳大利亚573 类学生签证经济担保金减少了三分之一。
调整包括四大方面
据澳大利亚驻华使领馆教育处发来的通报和对相关签证政策的解读，此次学生签证政策调整表现在以下� 个方面： ○572学生签证申请人可就读4门证书级别课程
从2010年12月16日起，对证书级别的职业教育与培训课程采取灵活的评审。申请人能够配套就读最多四门证书级别的课程(包括一至四级证书课程)，所有证书课程的总学期至少为一年，并且课程中包含一门四级证书课程。而此前仅就读四级证书一门课程，就必须至少一年时间。 ○预付正式寄宿学� �的住宿费 从2010年12月16日起，学生已预付的寄宿学� �的住宿费可以从签证申请所要求的生活费用中扣除，学生在申请签证时所需提供的经济担保金也由此有所降低。但学生预付的寄宿家庭的费用和公寓租金不能从申请签证时所要求的总生活费里扣除。
○每季度公布新的统计数据
从2011年1月起，将在移民部的网站上公布有深度的学生签证统计数据，以便教育部门了解更详细的学生签证统计数据。
○签证评估等级(AL)的调整
从2011年4月起，一些签证评估等级将被降低。38个国家的签证评估等级将在一个或多个学生签证类别中降低。对于中国学生而言，从2011年4月起，573类(高等教育)学生签证的签证评估等级(AL)将从4级降低为3级。
值得注意的是，2011年4月的具体生效日期待确定后将及时公布。在具体生效日期后递交的573类学生签证将按评估等级3进行审理，在具体生效日期前递交的573类学生签证将仍按评估等级4进行审理。
573签证调整带来的三大影响
对于此次公布的新政，最受关注的莫过于573类学生签证评估等级的调整。这项调整意味着澳大利亚政府降低了对申请573类学生签证的中国学生所需提交证明材料的要求，主要涉及经济担保的以下三方面：
○降低对经济担保年限的要求。
签证评估等级为4级时，签证申请人需提交能够支付其和家属(� 论是否随行)在澳大利亚居住期间前36个月的学费、生活费、学龄儿童学费以及往返澳大利亚旅费的经济担保证明。签证评估等级降低为3级后，签证申请人只需提交能够支付其和家属在澳大利亚居住期间前24个月的学费、生活费、学龄儿童学费以及往返澳大利亚旅费的经济担保证明。这即意味着，从2011年4月起，申请573类学生签证需提交的经济担保金减少了三分之一。
○降低对存款存期的要求。
签证评估等级为4级时，签证申请人需提交于签证申请日期前在金融机构已存满6个月的存款证明。签证评估等级降低为3级后，签证申请人只需提交于签证申请日期前在金融机构已存满3个月的存款证明。若学生在澳大利亚已完成了75%的主课，想续签签证来完成学业，届时所需提供的担保金将不再被要求须在金融机构存满3个月。
○放宽对经济担保金来源的要求。
签证评估等级为4级时，经济担保人可以是申请者本人或其配偶、父母、祖父母、兄弟姐妹、姑姨叔(伯)舅(姑姨叔伯舅须常住澳大利亚而且是澳大利亚公民/永久居民或者是符合条件的新西兰公民)。签证评估等级降低为3级后，经济担保人可以是申请者本人或其他任何人。
结合当前公布的新政，启德教育留学专家认为此次澳大利亚放松学生签证，为中国学子大开方便之门，对于有意赴澳的中国学子来说是一个重大利好消息。同时，澳大利亚政府也希望通过此举，吸引更多的中国学子赴澳留学深� 。 背景今年来澳留学的中国学生有所减少
移民部部长与高等教育部长联合对外宣布留学签证政策等系列调整，这在澳大利亚历史上并不多见。对此，Evans参议员解释说：“澳币升值，全球金融危机在一些国家的持续影响，以及逐步� 剧的来自美国、新西兰和� 拿大等国为吸引国际学生而形成的竞争，给澳大利亚国际教育行业带来的压力在不断增� 。” 记者了解到，澳大利亚驻华使领馆教育处公布的统计数据显示，2010年，在澳大利亚的中国学生注册总数与去年相比增长了7%，但从今年起来澳留学的中国学生已有所减少。而澳大利亚《星岛日报》则报道称，澳洲50亿元的中国留学生市场前景暗淡，报读主要英语课程的人数明年将下降50%，至少两年之内不会有好转。事实上，国际学生生源的减少已经引发教育业界人士的强烈反弹和批判。(记者：于冬雪)

description.hltext_display: 国安与帕切科传真签约 高潮：已备好应急方案
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content: 记者胡博轩北京报道12月21日，北京国安选帅一事终于有了实质性的突破。远在葡萄牙家中照顾妻子的帕切科与国安再次进行沟通后，表达了将会回到北京的决定。他在合同上签字，并用传真发给了国安。虽然传真的合同还不具有绝对的法律效力，但总算给国安吃了一颗定心丸。如释重负的国安总经理高潮对记者表示，“目前仅欠缺最后

description.hltext_display: Lauren Titus | Christmas cheer isn't always easy to come by
description.content:
Christmas comes only once a year — for about a month. So, statistically speaking, most people spend 8 percent of their lives preparing for the holiday. Or, if they are like me, spend 8 percent of their lives not preparing to celebrate the birth of Jesus and feeling slightly guilty. The only decorations I ever put up are Christmas cards from my more functional friends that I prop up on my mantel. Unfortunately, they serve as visual reminders of my failure to acquire and maintain the proper yuletide spirit.
It's not that I have anything against Christmas. I love Christmas. After 30 years, I've finally forgiven it for upstaging my birthday. (Apparently, people are more concerned over the birth of Christ than the birth of a neurotic shiksa.) However, I don't like feeling under constant obligation to buy stuff and be merry all December long.
I usually don't mind shopping, but I despise it around the holidays. First, most of the stores get a bit crowded for my taste. If I wanted to be surrounded by pushy women who knock into me with enormous bags and block me into corners, I'd join a foxy boxing league.
Second, it's difficult to come up with brilliant gift ideas for a dozen different people during a short span of time. I'm usually really good at getting personalized gifts for people, but every December I get overwhelmed and go blank. Luckily, most of my friends and I have developed no-gift policies. I haven't been able to convince my parents of the merits of this system yet, but I'm working on it.
Third, the Christmas music that stores play is simply unbearable. Every shop I've gone to this year has been pumping out adult contemporary or R&B Christmas albums by D-list vocalists.
I thought I was going to stab out my eardrums in the middle of T.J. Maxx the other day. Musicians must turn to the proverbial Christmas album to make a quick buck when they don't have any new material. So many reputable artists have done it: Elvis Presley, Alvin & The Chipmunks, Phil Spector, The New Kids on the Block …

description.hltext_display: 诺基亚全新Ovi Suite 3.0正式发布
description.content:
Nokia这位曾经的王者，已经渐渐退却了其光芒，一副老态龙钟的样子，是时候要振作起来，再不发力就有可能退步成二流甚至三流。
Nokia旗下的Ovi Suite软件采用2.0版本构架已经一年有余，日前推出了全新升级版本3.0.0.284，主架构提升至3.0后确实比之前的2.0好用一些，也漂亮一些。
Ovi Suite 3.0.0.284更新包括：
1、全新设计的主界面视觉排版，主页面依功能分为三个区块，左边是更新提醒，每次开启套件时，它就会提醒你有哪些待办的更新或同步动作，中间是计算机上的多媒体数据，这部份等于是前一个版本的主页面浓缩，会显示建在计算机上的通讯簿、相片、讯息和音乐，右边则是建议可安装的应用程序，会根据你的手机型号来推荐可用的app，来源都是从Ovi商店里抓取。
2、音乐娱乐重点改进，以前的套件比较像是资料转移中心，现在多了播放程序可以在套件上播放音乐 ，音乐来源从计算机抓取，更加方便快捷
Ovi Suite 3.0.0.284支持手机型号包括：
Nokia 2323 classic、Nokia 2330 classic、Nokia 2600 classic、Nokia 2630、Nokia 2660、Nokia 2680 slide、Nokia 2690、Nokia 2700 classic、Nokia 2710 Navigation Edition、Nokia 2720 fold、Nokia 2730 classic、Nokia 2760、Nokia 2690
Nokia 3109 classic、Nokia 3110 classic、Nokia 3110 Evolve、Nokia 3120 classic、Nokia 3208c、Nokia 3250、Nokia 3500 classic、Nokia 3555、Nokia 3600 slide、Nokia 3610 fold、Nokia 3710 fold、Nokia 3720 classic
Nokia 5000、Nokia 5130 XpressMusic、Nokia 5200、Nokia 5220 XpressMusic、Nokia 5228、Nokia 5230、Nokia 5230 Nuron、Nokia 5232、Nokia 5233、Nokia 5235 Comes with Music、Nokia 5250、Nokia 5310 XpressMusic、Nokia 5320 XpressMusic、Nokia 5330 Mobile TV、Nokia 5500 Sport、Nokia 5530 XpressMusic、Nokia 5610 XpressMusic、Nokia 5630 XpressMusic、Nokia 5700 XpressMusic、Nokia 5730 XpressMusic、Nokia 5800、Nokia 5800 XpressMusic、Nokia 5800i XpressMusic、Nokia 5802 XpressMusic
Nokia 6086、Nokia 6110 Navigator、Nokia 6120 classic、Nokia 6121 classic、Nokia 6122c、Nokia 6124 classic、Nokia 6208c、Nokia 6210 Navigator、Nokia 6210 slide、Nokia 6212 classic、Nokia 6216 classic、Nokia 6220 classic、Nokia 6260 slide、Nokia 6263、Nokia 6267、Nokia 6290、Nokia 6300、Nokia 6300i、Nokia 6301、Nokia 6303 classic、Nokia 6303i classic、Nokia 6500 classic、Nokia 6500 slide、Nokia 6555、Nokia 6600 fold、Nokia 6600 slide、Nokia 6600i slide、Nokia 6650 fold、Nokia 6700 classic、Nokia 6700 slide、Nokia 6710 Navigator、Nokia 6720 classic、Nokia 6730 classic、Nokia 6750、Nokia 6760 slide、Nokia 6788、Nokia 6788i、Nokia 6790 slide、Nokia 6790 Surge
Nokia 7020、Nokia 7100 Supernova、Nokia 7210 Supernova、Nokia 7230、Nokia 7310 Supernova、Nokia 7500 Prism、Nokia 7510 Supernova、Nokia 7610、Nokia 7610 Supernova、Nokia 7900 Crystal Prism、Nokia 7900 Prism
Nokia 8800 Arte、Nokia 8800 Carbon Arte、Nokia 8800 Gold Arte、Nokia 8800 Sapphire Arte、Nokia 8800a
Nokia C1-01、Nokia C1-02、Nokia C3-00、Nokia C3-01、Nokia C5-00、Nokia C5-01、Nokia C6-00、Nokia C6-01、Nokia C7-00
Nokia E5-00、Nokia E50、Nokia E51、Nokia E52、Nokia E55
Nokia E60、Nokia E61、Nokia E61i、Nokia E62、Nokia E63、Nokia E65、Nokia E66

description.hltext_display: Saudi King Abdullah leaves NY hospital
description.content: Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah has left a New York hospital and is now recuperating at his home in the city, Press TV reported. The 86-year-old king left the New York Presbyterian Hospital / Weill Cornell Medical Center in good health on Tuesday night to spend a period of convalescence and complete his physiotherapy at his residence in New York, the state-run Saudi Press Agency reported on Wednesday. Saudi officials have already acknowledged that the elderly king might not return to his country for months. The Saudi king headed to the United States to undergo medical treatment on a herniated disc in his back in November. Abdullah first underwent a successful operation on November 24. He had a follow-up back surgery on December 3 to stabilize several vertebrae in his spinal column.

event_or_fact.property: NY hospital Saudi Arabia's King Abdullah

description.hltext_display: Rex Goudie regroups with a new CD
description.content:
Rex Goudie knows how cold-hearted the music industry can be.
In five short years the recording artist from Burlington, N.L., has gone from placing second on Canadian Idol, releasing a platinum-selling album (100,000 sales) and receiving a Juno Award nomination to being dropped from his label, self-managing his career and waiting four years between albums.
“The first time I toured Canada it was on a bus and then I went back across the country three weeks ago and was driving myself. When you’re planning the tour and doing the driving, it’s amazing what you see that you miss from the window of a bus. It’s a beautiful country,” said Goudie, who has just released his third CD, One Hundred Pages Later, independently.
“It’s my first hurrah into independent music. The big thing for me over the past four years was trying to get Factor funding. When you’re an independent, any money that can help out is huge. I switched booking agents and I’m starting to go off in a different direction. I’m not tied to a label and it can sound the way I intend it to sound.”
Goudie said his album has an East Coast sound lyrically.
“My song, Save My Life, was written from the perspective of my brother and uncle heading to Fort McMurray. It’s one of the things you have to do, but there’s no better feeling than coming back home.”
There’s also a song, Burn It Down, which was inspired in part by the break-up with girlfriend Melissa O’Neil, whom he met when the two were competing against one another on Canadian Idol.
“I wrote half of the song in Nashville and then I was staying with a friend of mine who had also produced Melissa and I saw her gold record. It was a fresh wound. I got a guitar riff going through my head and I quickly finished the song.”
While some of the lyrical content is heavy the lead single is Coming Back for Good, something one would expect to hear from a perky Maritimer.
“It’s a good fun song ... more of an upbeat thing. It’s kinda about long-distance relationships.”
The album’s closer is a remake of Six Months in a Leaky Boat.
His previous manager had suggested an album of covers and one that was recorded, but never released, was the Split Enz hit from 1982 which found its way onto this album.
“I worked with my father driving a dump truck and every day we all went to lunch together. There was only one radio station that we could pick up and it was classic rock. Every day at the site we were guaranteed they’d play Six Months in a Leaky Boat right at noon. All of the men started humming it. It has sentimental value, not to mention it’s a hell of a lot of fun to play live.”
This past year he and several other musicians travelled to Afghanistan where they played for troops from Belgium, Canada and the U.S. The Canadians knew who he was. He described it as a life-changing experience.
“It was an acoustic-based set. To play for the men and women who are serving their country in order to help other people who can’t help themselves was truly a surreal experience. They were glad we came, not just for music but to see some new people. I’ve made friends for life.”
As for his future, he said he’ll continue performing live, something he hasn’t stopped doing since 2005.
And yes, ladies, he’s single and 25.

description.hltext_display: 美CIA, ‘위키리크스’ 태스크포스 발족
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
미국 중앙정보국(CIA)이 폭로 사이트인 위키리크스의 외교문서 공개가 어떤 영향을 미쳤는지를 분석 평가할 특별팀(Task Force)을 발족했다고 워싱턴포스트(WP) 인터넷판이 22일 보도했다.
CIA의 ‘위키리크스 특별팀’은 이번 폭로로 기밀을 지켜야 할 미 정부에 대한 신뢰가 하락해 자체 정보수집 능력이 어느 정도 영향을 받았는가를 분석한다.
조지 리틀 CIA 대변인은 “우리 기관의 외교관계 및 작전에 미치는 영향을 평가할 것을 국장이 지시했다”고 말했다. 특별팀은 방첩센터의 주도로 활동하지만 각 부서 출신 24명 이상으로 구성됐다.
WP는 또한 CIA가 전 세계에서의 정보 활동으로 광범위한 기밀정보를 보유하고 있지만 위키리크스의 폭로 문서에는 관련 작전 및 직원에 대한 내용이 소량 포함돼 비교적 명예 손상을 덜 입은 정부기관으로 꼽았다.
CIA는 타 정부기관과의 기밀 공유를 꺼린다는 점에서 2001년 9.11 테러를 막지 못했다고 비판받기도 했지만 ‘위키리크스 사태’는 역으로 그 효과를 인정해주는 셈이 됐다.
CIA 요원들은 해외에서 주고받은 문서를 모두 비밀로 분류하고 항상 자체 시스템 사용만을 고집해 왔다. 2년 전에는 더 많은 정보보고를 국방부 전산망(SIPRNET)에서 접근할 수 있도록 하라는 외부의 요구도 거부했다.
이 전산망은 위키리크스에 외교문서 제공 혐의를 받고 있는 브래들리 매닝 육군 일병이 접속했던 것으로 알려져 있다.
그러나 1990년대 존 도이치 전 국장이 가정용 컴퓨터로 특급비밀을 보관했다는 비난이 이는 등 CIA도 보안에 허점을 드러낸 적이 있었다.
해외 지부로 정보를 보내는 휴대용 컴퓨터의 흐름을 파악하거나 민감한 정보를 공유하는데도 어려움이 뒤따르기는 마찬가지다.
WP는 이런 가운데 CIA가 위키리크스 사태와 비슷한 상황이 일어나지 않도록 정보유출을 최소화할 수 있는 대책을 시행 중이라고 소개했다.
대량의 자료가 한꺼번에 내려받기 될 때는 관리자에게 경고 메시지를 보내고, CIA의 컴퓨터에는 이동 드라이브의 사용이 대부분 불가능하도록 했다고 신문은 덧붙였다.
ㆍ"F-22 랩터 뜨고 미사일로 北 정밀타격"
ㆍ내년 그랜저 HG에 장착할 '신기술'
ㆍ제네시스·쏘나타 이어 싼타페·K5도 '와우!'
ㆍ속살 노출한 이세은 "속옷은 걸칠 줄 알았는데…"
ㆍ北 잠수함·경비정 동해로 침투한다면…
ㆍ트위터에 맥 못추던 국내 업체들 '대반격!'
ㆍ오세훈 "서울시 1급 공무원 전원 사표"… 왜?
ㆍMBC 퇴출자 29명, 출연금지 이유 알고보니…
ㆍ삐걱대던 한국 고속철 '초대박' 터트릴까
ㆍ가격 확 낮춘 애플TV 돌풍 '심상찮네!'

description.hltext_display: Mahindra unveils Thar, SUV for lifestyle seekers
description.author: admin
description.content:
Share
The cabin can seat seven people, while two rear benches can be folded to create a massive luggage area. It is available in BS-VI (Bharat Stage) variant with power steering as a standard fitment
Automobile major Mahindra and Mahindra Tuesday launched a compact sports utility vehicle (SUV) Thar CRDe priced at Rs.5.99 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi).
"Having realised the potential of this emerging segment of off-road enthusiasts and lifestyle seekers, we have launched the Thar," chief executive of the company's automotive division Rajesh Jejurikar said.
According to him, Thar is an evolved version of the company's earlier brands like Commander Jeep, CJ 340, MM 540, the Classic and the Legend, and is targeted at off-road enthusiasts, style-seekers and even war-veterans.
"The Thar is a manual 4x4 machine coupled with a powerful CRDe engine 77 kw (105 BHP) and drive by wire technology which is capable of providing variable speeds and acceleration," a company executive said.
The compact SUV is powered by a 2.5 litre CRDi diesel engine with modern suspension layout with abuse resistant rear leaf springs, light and responsive integral power steering for manoeuverability, and better ground clearance for off-roading on various terrains.
"The cabin can seat seven people, while two rear benches can be folded to create a massive luggage area. It is available in BS-VI (Bharat Stage) variant with power steering as a standard fitment," the company said in a regulatory filing.
The company added that the compact-SUV will be launched in Delhi, Chandigarh, Bangalore, Mangalore and Jaipur by December-end and the rest of India by January.

description.hltext_display: Tons of coins found in Shaanxi
description.content:
Workers dug out about 4 tons of ancient coins Monday in Huaxian, Shaanxi province.
Some authorities said that the coins may be from the Song Dynasty (960-1279), and accordingto the characters on the coins they may have been made sometime in 1102 to 1106.

description.hltext_display: 延坪島射撃訓練終了、午後２時３０分から１時間実施
微软2010十大新闻：Windows7、KIN手机喜忧参半
description.content:
【赛迪网讯】12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，IT业巨头微软公司(Microsoft)在2010年表现不俗，几乎美国每个家庭至少购买了一件微软产品。从智能手机，游戏机，娱乐软件，云计算服务基础设施，一直到搜索引擎服务的扩张，微软产品逐渐渗透进了每个人的生活。以下是微软公司2010年度十大新闻
发布Windows Phone 7
微软今年发布了Windows Phone 7智能手机操作系统，计划与苹果iPhone和谷歌Android手机一拼高下。然而，微软到现在还没有公布该类手机的销售业绩。英国零售商MobilesPlease表示，WP7手机在本地的销售份额仅为3%，Android手机的销售量约为WP7的15倍。
Windows销售数据掺假
据报道，微软将Xbox和Kinetic等产品的销售额转移到了Windows和Office的销售业绩中。微软发言人虽然否认这一行为，却没有拿出相关的数据予以澄清。InformationWeek分析师根据研究表示，微软公司通过账目的挪用增加了微软集团销售额达2.59亿美元。
雷?奥兹离职
几乎与比尔?盖茨(Bill Gates)一样成为微软公司的代名词的微软前首席软件架构师(CSA) 雷?奥兹(Ray Ozzie)于今年10月18日离开了微软。奥兹在2005年加入微软发布“互联网服务时代来临”(The Internet Services Disruption)备忘录令他一举成名。他在加入微软之前创建了下一代协同作业软件Groove Networks，该公司在2005年被微软并购。奥兹在IT业名声很大，2010年入选了美国科学院院士。
Kinect体感配件热销全球
微软Kinect体感配件在全球掀起了销售狂潮，10日的销售量达100万台，目前销量已达400万台。伴随着Kinect的发售微软的XBOX360主机销售数字也势头大涨。微软视频游戏部门主管唐?迈特里克(Don Mattrick)表示，Kinect在今年年底销量有望突破500万台。
Windows Azure走入正轨
微软在2008年发布了云计算平台Windows Azure。该服务在2010年稳扎稳打，逐渐走向成熟。六月，eBay成为Windows Azure的第一个客户。eBay表示，将把该平台与其他两个数据中心整合。同时，微软和惠普结盟共同开发云计算服务，将在硬件、软件、服务和采购解决方案等多方面合作。
微软KIN手机遭遇”滑铁卢”
微软今年6月开始开始销售Kin智能手机，其美国移动运营商合作伙伴为Verizon无线。相关数据显示，截至今年6月底，该手机销量仅为500部。微软7月初宣布将不再推广其Kin品牌智能手机。KIN系列手机的悲惨命运缘于未能搭上智能手机发展的趋势，而它最终还是以惨淡的市场表现而退市。
发布Mac Office 2011和Office 2010
微软今年推出了两个新版的Office软件- Mac Office 2011和Office 2010。10月，微软为Mac用户推出了Mac Office 2011版，该版本可以与2008和2004版的Mac Office兼容。微软表示，新版本可以使用户方便地在任何地方存取文档。新版软件还增加了远程访问Office功能，增强了照片编辑工具和数据可视化功能，并加强了Outlook管理工具。
史蒂夫?鲍尔默抛售股份
微软首席执行官史蒂夫?鲍尔默(Steve Ballmer)表示为了使自己的投资多样化，年底前将抛售7500万股微软股票。鲍尔默表示这只是其个人投资行为，他将一如既往地致力于打造微软公司的成功。根据美国证券交易委员会的报告，鲍尔默以每股26至28美金的价格出售了4930万股微软股票，收入达13亿美元。
新游戏Halo 3亮相
游戏玩家一定不会错过微软的新游戏Halo 3。微软表示，该游戏的销售量已达1450万，在微软Xbox LIVE游戏平台的登陆时间达6.5亿小时。为了更好地巩固微软在游戏领域的成功，微软在10月宣布将发布一个在线游戏平台的计划，以便于游戏玩家更快捷地下载微软游戏。
与雅虎搜索合作融洽
微软在尝试收购雅虎失败后，与雅虎达成搜索合作关系。2009年，微软与雅虎达成合作协议，微软Bing负责处理网络搜索，雅虎负责广告销售，雅虎开始依靠Bing的技术削减成本和扩大市场份额。2010年，广告商，搜索用户和网站出版商都有目共睹两大搜索引擎的融洽合作。

description.hltext_display: 欧盟发布门户网站帮助中小企业抗击盗版
description.content:
(中国电子商务研究中心讯)北京时间12月21日上午消息，欧盟委员会联合美国监管机构，发布了一个名为“跨大西洋知识产权门户”(TransAtlantic IPR Portal)的网站，以帮助中小企业保护知识产权，防止剽窃。
据报道，该网站向中小企业提供有关知识产权保护方面的建议、帮助和支持。
欧盟委员会的数据显示，每年盗版商品的交易额高达2500亿美元。该机构副主席兼产业与企业委员安东尼奥・塔加尼(Antonio Tajani)说：“加强对知识产权的保护，有利于促进就业，拉动经济增长。”盗版和仿冒产品给各类企业造成了巨大损失。
欧盟委员会称，该网站将向那些希望在其他国家开展业务的企业“提供指导”，并“加强欧盟与美国之间的合作。”“欧盟和美国将致力于帮助企业在大西洋两岸展开公平竞争。”塔加尼说。(新浪科技/彦飞)

description.hltext_display: 自主招生培训班频现 提醒切莫上当受骗 12-22
description.content:
随着� 个“招考联盟”的形成和各高� �自主招生细则的出台，一些社会机构悄然推出培训班，声称权威教师授课，能帮助考生短时间内提高成绩。记者日前采访了上海交通大学、复旦大学和同济大学招生负责人，他们一致表示，学� �从来没有举办过所谓的“培训班”，这些都属于某些社会机构的敛财之举，考生和家长切莫上当受骗。
据报道，上海市杨浦区某培训机构推出自主招生培训，分为周末强化班和寒假强化班两种。如“交大清华自主招生笔试辅导班”，8天授课32个课时，收费高达2800元。工作人员称：“讲师团由复旦和上海交大的博士生、硕士生组成，还提供历年真题，对症下药，能够在短时间内提高成绩。”
虽然上海交大、复旦、同济分别属于三个不同的“招考联盟”，但三� �对打着高� �旗号的社会机构自主招生培训班都深恶痛绝，坚决反对。 上海交大2011年自主招生实行“七� �联考”，这也是该� �第二次参与多� �联考，招办主任陶正苏表示：“不管是单� �组织考试还是实行联考，交大都从来没有举办过针对自主招生的培训班。近两年的联考是委托第三方命题，本� �老师不参与，那些打着交大幌子举办的培训班肯定是假的。”
同济大学教务处处长廖宗廷表示，同济所参与的“九� �联考”同� �由第三方命题。他说：“自主招生培训班的兴起，体现了部分人群的功利性。少数考生求胜心切，落入了‘培训班’的陷阱。高� �的自主招生考试是培训不了的，千万不要上‘培训班’敛财的当。”
复旦大学自主招生在苏浙沪进行自主命题的“复旦水平测试”，在三地之外实行“十三� �联考”，由联盟学� �共同命题。对于个别培训机构声称的“复旦命题教师参与授课”，该� �招办主任丁光宏坚决予以否认。他告诉记者，命题教师都与学� �签署了保密协议，绝对不会参与所谓的“培训班”或“辅导班”。丁光宏同时提醒考生和家长，欢迎向学� �举报那些以复旦大学名义开办的培训班，一经发现，学� �将协同有关部门坚决予以取缔。 “考生和家长不能在应试的圈子里打转，更应该关注联考背后各高� �的选才� �准，那才是自主招生的本质。”陶正苏说。据他介绍，“七� �联考”之前一至二周，相关高� �将公布测试� �题，方便考生熟悉题型，� �除自主招生考试的神秘感。(记者 董少� �）

description.hltext_display: 差し替え：延坪島射撃訓練終了、万一に備え警戒態勢は維持
Slovenian Minister Gjerkes resigns after drunk driving arrest
description.content:
BNO News Crime twitter
Tweet Share
LJUBLJANA, SLOVENIA (BNO NEWS) -- Slovenian Minister Henrik Gjerkes submitted his resignation on Tuesday after he was arrested for driving under the influence of alcohol on Monday night.
Local government and regional development minister Gjerkes, 45, had been arrested on Monday when driving back from a Christmas party. He came to the attention of police officers as he was driving too slow and had sustained a flat tire.
Officers pulled over Gjerkes and determined he had a blood alcohol level of 0.64mg/l, while the maximum allowed level is only 0.24 mg/l. He was taken into custody and spent the night in jail at a southern Ljubljana police station.
On Tuesday, Gjerkes publicly expressed his regret for his actions and submitted his resignation to Prime Minister Borut Pahor. The Slovenian government later held meetings in order to look for a suitable replacement, and indications are that Trobec Bučanovo will be chosen as Gjerkes' successor.
Gjerkes said he choose to resign because his actions had endangered his party, the local government and regional development ministry and the federal government. However, he noted that his dismissal had nothing to do with the quality of his work as minister.
Gjerkes, who was appointed as minister in October 2009 and is a member of the Democratic Party of Pensioners of Slovenia (DeSUS), later said he plans to return to the academia. PM Pahor has accepted his resignation.
Pahor said that Gjerkes' conduct was not in accordance with the ethics code of the government officials. However, he noted that Gjerkes voluntarily decided to step aside in a high moral gesture which should also be a high standard of conduct of officials in the future.
Pahor further remarked that Gjerkes' ministerial job were highly effective, especially in the management of European funds. The DeSUS party is expected to announce the new Minister for Local Government and Regional Development in the coming days.
(

description.hltext_display: 해군 76㎜ 함포 '짝퉁'부품 납품 2명 영장
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
창원지검은 해군 함정의 주력 함포인 76㎜ 포의 주퇴ㆍ복좌장치를 수입 정품 대신 짝퉁으로 납품한 혐의(사기)로 부산의 군납업체 S사 장모 대표와 경남 김해시의 부품 제조업체 J사 여모 대표에 대해 22일 구속영장을 청구했다.
검찰에 따르면 두 업체는 지난 2004년 국방부 조달본부와 미국산 주퇴·복좌장치 정비용 부품을 납품하기로 계약해놓고 이듬해 국내에서 만든 짝퉁을 미국으로 보낸 뒤 역수입, 미국산 정품인 것처럼 속여 해군에 납품한 혐의를 받고 있다.
납품액은 33만달러(한화 약 5억4,000만원) 규모다. 주퇴장치는 포탄 발사 후 포신이 일정한 범위내로 밀려났다가 정지(제동)되도록 하며, 복좌장치는 후퇴했던 포신을 원래 위치로 돌려보내는 역할을 한다.
검찰은 두 업체가 미국측 거래선에서 발행한 정품 인증서까지 첨부한 것으로 확인돼 인증서가 진짜인지, 입찰ㆍ검수 과정에서 군 관계자 등이 연루됐는지, 짝퉁 부품의 성능에 문제가 있는지 여부를 조사하고 있다. 검찰은 지난 14일 두 업체를 압수수색했다.
앞서 해군은 국방부 조달본부가 S사로부터 주퇴ㆍ복좌장치를 사들여 이듬해 해군에 인도, 정상적인 부품으로 알았고 함포 운용 과정에 별다른 문제가 발생하지 않았다고 해명했다.
한국아이닷컴 인기기사
ㆍ"F-22 랩터 뜨고 미사일로 北 정밀타격"
ㆍ내년 그랜저 HG에 장착할 '신기술'
ㆍ제네시스·쏘나타 이어 싼타페·K5도 '와우!'
ㆍ속살 노출한 이세은 "속옷은 걸칠 줄 알았는데…"
ㆍ北 잠수함·경비정 동해로 침투한다면…
ㆍ트위터에 맥 못추던 국내 업체들 '대반격!'
ㆍ오세훈 "서울시 1급 공무원 전원 사표"… 왜?
ㆍMBC 퇴출자 29명, 출연금지 이유 알고보니…
ㆍ삐걱대던 한국 고속철 '초대박' 터트릴까
ㆍ가격 확 낮춘 애플TV 돌풍 '심상찮네!'
[ⓒ 인터넷한국일보(www.hankooki.com), 무단 전재 및 재배포 금지]
