description.hltext_display: 80后创业先锋罗成：获得中国十大教育风云人物 12-22
description.content:
日前，由中国教育网、中国教育在线主办，新华社、光明日报、中国教育报、中国教育新闻网、中青在线等权威媒体协办的首届“教育公益盛典”揭幕，本次活动以“公益让教育更美好”为主题。此次教育盛典上，设立了“中国教育年度十大教育公益项目”奖项。此次活动评选方式分为网友投票、媒体投票、专家投票三个部分，综合评判参与机构的网络口碑、媒体公信力和硬件实力，将为公众呈现出一份最具权威和公信力的年度教育榜单。并启动了国内第一个教育公益联盟，与教育类企业、基金会、志愿者组织签订教育公益计划书，将推动更多的教育公益支持带给有需求的人。本次盛典评选范围涉及了教育集团发展、留学服务、外语培训、儿童教育、课外辅导等十� 个领域。 纵观整个“2010年教育行业优秀机构和个人评选活动”获奖榜单之中，罗成是最年轻的获奖者，唯一的“80后”。他是“B2C自助留学”理念的提出者和首推者，领导马来西亚教育联盟、新� 坡教育联盟、新西兰教育网和澳大利亚教育联盟开拓了自助留学的新风尚，也为日后“B2C”留学市场打下了基础。如何省掉中介服务费，教会中国人如何以最省时不上当受骗前往国外留学，直接填补了国内自助留学的空白，让中国成千上万的中国留学生受益，在2009年当选中国十大留学领军人物。在“2010年度十大教育风云人物”评比中，自2010年12月拉开帷幕以来，受到了社会的广泛关注。在为期一个月的票选时间里，大量网友参与投票。评选方式主要本着公平、公开、公正的基本原则，� �据各参选教育机构的整体实力，以网友投票为基础，最终产生各奖项获奖名单。 罗成简介：
罗成，江西高安市人，现任上海互应信息科技有限公司董事长。2006年在马来西亚创办了马来西亚东方学子留学有限公司(Eastudy Services Sdn.Bhd.) 成为马来西亚最大的留学服务机构；并与各大院� �展开紧密合作，先后获得泰莱教育集团、英迪教育集团、亚太科技大学、双威教育集团、思特雅大学和林国荣创意科技大学的大力支持，创办了马来西亚国际教育管理有限公司(International Education Management Sdn.Bhd.)，打� 了马来西亚留学第一品牌-马来西亚教育联盟，每年从中国、非洲、印尼、越南和印度等国输送上千名国际学生到马来西亚留学。 2008年在上海成立上海成迪投资管理有限公司，先后投资新� 坡留学项目以及狮城论坛，创办全球最大的新� 坡留学服务机构，并将先进的自助留学理念引进到了东南亚等国家。以至于马来西亚高等教育部部长莫哈莫卡立毫不吝啬地称赞罗成是中国出口到马来西亚最好的“产品”。2008年底，罗成旗下团队成功打� 了新西兰留学第一品牌-（新西兰教育网），为广大新西兰留学生提供了自助留学平台。2009年赴澳大利亚投资，成功� � 入Australia Education Alliance Pty., Ltd，担任亚太地区首行执行官。2010年4月，携手河南华源教育咨询服务有限公司进军中原市场。罗成从事留学事业以来，始终坚持朴� “以质为先，以量为本”的� �心价值观，“凡事全力以赴”的精神，为广大留学生提供全方位的自助留学和优质贴心的服务。上海互应信息科技有限公司旗下拥有专业的留学网站群，马来西亚教育联盟www.schoolmy.com、新� 坡教育联盟www.studysg.com、澳大利亚教育联盟www.eduau.com、狮城论坛http://bbs.0065.com、新西兰教育网www.edu.org.nz、爱尔兰留学平台www.liuxueie.com、荷兰留学平台www.liuxuenl.com、教育导航www.study.ac.cn 等多个平台构成，整体站群月独立访问人数超过500万，给那些想自助留学的学生、家长们提供了学交流的平台。 “2010年度十大教育风云人物”获奖榜单
巨人教育集团-尹雄
正保远程教育-朱正东
北京精诚教育集团-王国欣
上海互应信息科技有限公司董事长-罗成
北京市燕伦信息咨询有限公司董事长-季铁军 跨考教育集团-� 爱志 安博教育集团-黄劲
新东方教育集团-俞敏洪
江博激情英语-江博
学大教育创始人兼CEO -金鑫

description.hltext_display: 扎克伯格今日造访新浪 中国之行引发猜测不断
description.content:
来源:速途网 作者:小麦 时间:2010-12-22 11:07 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
速途网12月22日消息 今日，Facebook创始人马克·扎克伯格到访新浪，有新浪员工在微博发布了扎克伯格的照片。
新浪产品总监巫云峰在微博中称：“刚刚在理想国际门口看见了扎克伯格，一脸的孩子气，他那个著名的华裔女友也随行，瘦了很多，变成美女了!”
扎克伯格造访新浪(速途网配图)
12月20日，扎克伯格到访位于北京上地的百度大厦，并在李彦宏的陪同下前往百度员工餐厅。扎克伯格访问百度的消息传出后，有网友推测百度可能收购Facebook，对此新浪方面表示，这些谣言“过于夸大”。
12月21日下午，扎克伯格和中移动董事长王建宙进行了见面会谈。更有人猜测，此次扎克伯格会面王建宙或意在中国的移动互联网。
但据接近扎克伯格此次来华随行Facebook员工的人士透露，扎克伯格此次携女友来华仅为私人性质。中国媒体近日纷纷猜测的所谓“与百度合作，或与其他国内互联网公司进行商务接触”，并不会发生。“他就是在度假期间来中国旅游，顺便陪华裔女友看亲戚”。
12月20日，26岁亿万富豪的扎克伯格现身北京。他的中国行程已被曝光三项内容：观光雍和宫、百度大厦拜会李彦宏、陪华裔女友看望家人。(小麦)

description.hltext_display: Gold Fields pays dividend to Gov't
description.content:
Gold Fields Ghana Ltd has presented a cheque of $5 million to the Government of Ghana.Â This brings to $10 million the total dividend paid to the Ghanaian government in 2010.
Gold Fields is a major contributor to government revenue in other respects.Â
In the 11 months to November 2010, Gold Fields Ghana Ltd and Abosso Goldfields Ltd paid taxes â royalties, corporate tax, National Reconstruction Levy, and PAYE of over $ 110 million.
The Executive Vice President for Gold Fields West Africa Region, Mr Peter Turner , made this known when he presented the cheque of $ 5 million to the Minister of Mines and Natural Resources, Alhaji Collins Dauda, at a short ceremony in Accra.
Speaking at the ceremony, Mr Turner remarked that Gold Fields is proud of its contribution to Government's revenue and the development of Ghana.
He intimated that Gold Fields will continue to work with all stakeholders in the industry and will continue to contribute significantly to the government's national agenda.'
Receiving the cheque on behalf of the Government of Ghana, the Minister of Mines and Natural Resources said, 'As a sector minister, I'm impressed by the performance and operations of Gold Fields Ghana.
Your contribution and huge financial support to the senior national team, the Black Stars is really commendable'.
'I must say that, concerning the stability agreement, Gold Fields Ghana has not been treated fairly by the Government', Alhaji Dauda added.
He assured Mr. Peter Tuner and his team to count on his outfit and the Ministry of Finance to fast track the process of the coverage of the Stability Agreement.
Present at the ceremony include Mrs Pamela Djamson-Tettey, Director of Corporate Affairs and Sustainable Development, Mr. Martin Ahorney, Finance Director of Gold Fields Ghana, Mr. Cobbrah from the Ministry of Finance and Directors of the Mines and Natural Resources ministry.

description.hltext_display: 美캘리포니아 폭우로 비상사태 선포
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
미국 캘리포니아주가 21일(현지시각) 폭우에 따른 산사태 등 재해 위험이 높아짐에 따라 일부 지역에 대해 비상사태를 선포하고 긴급 대피를 실시했다.
아널드 슈워제네거 주지사는 이날 컨, 오렌지, 리버사이드, 샌 버나디노, 샌 루이스 오비스포, 툴라리 등 주 남부의 카운티들에 대해 악천후에 따른 비상사태를 선포했다.
캘리포니아주 남부는 최근 폭우가 내려 로스앤젤레스 시내의 경우 연간 강수량의 약 3분의 1이 지난 한 주 사이에 왔는데, 기상당국은 다음날까지 5㎝ 가량이 더 내릴 것으로 전망했다.
특히 LA 외곽 구릉지대인 라캐나다 플린트리지와 라크레센타에서는 다음 날 시간당 5㎝의 폭우가 예상됨에 따라 산사태 위험이 커지면서 경찰이 이 일대 232가구에 대해 대피 명령을 내렸다.
샌디에이고에서도 폭우로 소렌토 밸리 지역의 기차역 하나가 폐쇄되고 라졸라 지역의 한 거리가 산사태로 폐쇄되면서 경찰이 수십 개의 가구 및 사업체를 대피시켰다.
캘리포니아주 남부는 특히 최근 잇단 산불로 토사를 지탱해주는 초목이 사라짐에 따라 산사태의 위험성이 한층 더해지고 있다.
이날 하루 홍수에서 9명을 구조한 오렌지 카운티 보안관실의 한 관계자는 “비가 더 내리면 확실히 산사태 가능성이 진짜 있다”며 “지금까지는 운이 좋았지만 이 운이 얼마나 더 갈지는 모르겠다”고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: Espadas garantiza que Tussam será pública y con mejor servicio
description.content:
Pide el «voto útil» para el PSOE y cuestiona que Zoido pueda gobernar
Uno de los elementos clave del debate sobre la movilidad en la ciudad es la situación del transporte público y del servicio de Tussam. El candidato socialista, Juan Espadas, ya ha admitido públicamente que la gestión no ha sido la correcta durante los últimos años y ha anunciado que prepara una propuesta integral para la empresa de transportes. Ayer, detalló parte de esta iniciativa en su segundo chat abierto con los ciudadanos: "Buscamos un modelo que dé viabilidad económica a la empresa, que garantice su carácter público y que no ponga en riesgo los puestos de trabajo. Hay que mejorar el servicio de algunas barriadas que necesitan más frecuencia de los servicios".
Espadas reclamó al PP que aclare su propuesta para la empresa de transporte: "El PP lo que hace cuando gobierna es privatizar servicios públicos. Zoido debe explicar si mantendrá Tussam como servicio público o lo va a privatizar".
No fue la única referencia del candidato socialista al PP en un chat en el que participaron una treintena de personas. Espadas reclamó un debate televisado con Juan Ignacio Zoido, como el que se ha producido en otras campañas electorales, y cuestionó la capacidad de los populares de llegar a formar gobierno incluso si ganan las elecciones. "Los socialistas tenemos votos de sobra en Sevilla para no necesitar otra fuerza política. Si hemos tenido que pactar es porque los que obtuvieron más votos fueron incapaces de ponerse de acuerdo con nadie. El voto más útil es el del PSOE porque el PP no logrará la mayoría absoluta y no son capaces de gobernar".
Al ser requerido durante el chat -en el que defendió que su principal "fuerte es la gestión"- por la posibilidad de un acuerdo con IU, Espadas eludió cualquier reflexión sobre ese escenario postelectoral, como ya ha hecho desde su designación como candidato y como hacen todos los cabezas de lista ante unos comicios: "Quiero gobernar con mayoría absoluta para aplicar el programa al 100%. También puedo gobernar con mayoría simple".
En su debate con los ciudadanos, como ya ha hecho durante los últimos días, Espadas volvió a defender el plan de acceso al Centro. Incidió en el correcto funcionamiento de las cámaras, en que el modelo beneficia al "interés general" y en que habrá una adaptación de los ciudadanos al nuevo sistema. Pero volvió a admitir la autocrítica. Al ser requerido sobre falta de información por parte del Consistorio en algunas fases del proyecto, admitió que hay cuestiones que pueden ser "mejorables": "Cualquier propuesta que cambia los hábitos en relación con la movilidad es complicada, y hay que explicarlo bien. Su aplicación nos puede servir para mejorarlo".

description.hltext_display: Step Back and Relax-You Have not Wasted Time
description.content: We dwell in a time of self-discovery. Many would even pronounce that there is a worldwide awaking when it comes to thinking more of the well being of others, and all of mankind. We're told we need to focus on our lives more, meditate, pray, and envision a better future. In western societies we are reminded how wasteful we are when it comes to creating whatever means is necessary to preserve our current lifestyles. All of us know how frustrating it is to procrastinate and waste time in the day-to-day scheme of things. I certainly hear about this sort of thing more than most people, because as a professional coach, I help people on a daily basis to get control in their lives again and get the most out of their time.But in my opinion, a true waste of time does not involve failing to stick to a routine or schedule. It involves failing to adequately learn from the lessons provided to us on a daily basis in the classroom of life. And if we do not learn from these lessons, you tend to find them re appearing wearing different clothes, again and again.Muhammad Ali once said, "The man who views the world at fifty the same as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life."Read the quote again if you have to, because it will get you thinking.Basically what Ali was talking about here was about experience. Generally, the longer we are on this earth, the more we are going to experience and ultimately learn.Remember, self-discovery is a process of learning that draws upon both good and bad experiences. The longer we're on earth, the more experiences we're going to have.Of course, this is a general rule. After all, there are people who at age twenty have gone through more than somebody aged fifty with a very sheltered life.So as we grow older and experience more, our perspective on the world and our perspectives on the people around us will change. We will view things differently, thanks to the experiences we have had that have affected our lives and ultimately, our perspective. The way we process things.

event_or_fact.property: The man who views the world at fifty the same as he did at twenty has wasted thirty years of his life.

description.hltext_display: Detroit's Broderick Tower to get $50 million redevelopment
description.content:
Financing has been secured and construction is expected to commence immediately on a $50 million-plus retail, office and residential redevelopment of the 34-story Broderick Tower at the southeast corner of Detroit's Grand Circus Park.
The project will be finished by September 2012, according to a statement issued today by the project managers.
Financing, including cash and historic tax credits, is coming primarily from Bank of America, Invest Detroit, Chase Bank N.A., and the Michigan Historic Preservation Network.
The legal entity developing the project is Motown Construction Partners L.P. led by Fred Beal. His JC Beal Construction Inc. will act as construction manager for the renovation for project architect Kraemer Design Group of Detroit.
The building is owned by several individuals and entities, including the Higgins Family Trust.
The first four floors will include a restaurant and lounge and Invest Detroit's business incubator. Floors 5 through 34 will be 127 apartments.
Apartments will range from 422-square-foot studio units to 1,027-square-foot two-bedroom units while 10 floors will have 34 "Sky Top Penthouses" with their own elevator, upgraded amenities and views.
Interior renovations will preserve the existing historic lobby and modernize the building. The façade will be cleaned and restored and exterior lighting added to highlight details.
The neoclassical architecture building, a combination of Chicago school and Beaux-Arts design by architect Louis Kamper, opened in 1928 as the Eaton Tower.
The largely vacant building is perhaps best known for the whale mural on its façade facing Comerica Park since 1997.
The Sports Town Grill operates at the building's street level.

entity.property: manager for the renovation for project architect Kraemer Design Group

description.hltext_display: Dress for a job interview
description.content: Getting ready for an appointment could be difficult to manage because many times you don't know the way to get that perfect appearance. This is fairly important simply because numerous times you're unable to become successful in your employment interview regardless of your fantastic initiative and overall performance due to the fact of a poor perception of your dress code. The up coming list will grant you a good concept of the way to dress for a employment interview:1. Suit - You are able to dress yourself in a conventional two piece dark grey or dark blue business suit might be an perfect wear on the day of your job interview.2. Shirt - A white, lengthy sleeved dress shirt which is neatly pressed and if it has a great fit it would be the very best.3. Tie - Try to go for a plain colored, non distracting, conservative dark blue or dark red neck tie made of 100% pure silk.4. Tie accessories - A classic silver tie bar will make certain that your tie is held at its place throughout the interview method so that you are not forced to adjust it a number of times that could also make you nervous throughout the interview procedure.5. Shoes and boots - Wear clean and polished conservative dress shoes, black lace ups if feasible might be a excellent choice.6. Socks - Dark socks, black would be ideally suited for the interview.7. Belt - The belt ought to match the color of your shoes so try to go with a black 1 if achievable.8. Hair - Ensure that have a well groomed hair prior to the meeting and also be conscious that short hair usually fares greatest in interviews.9. Beard - The beard needs to be shaved off.10. Mustaches - Mustaches could lead to a negative impact but though you have one try to keep it clean and trimmed.11. Fingernails- Keep your fingernails clean and trimmed due to the fact you are judged from top to bottom by the interviewer.12. Rings- No other rings except wedding and college rings are acceptable.13. Earrings and piercing- Should you have earrings and other visible body piercing, you ought to take it off on the day of interview.14. Body odor and fresh breath- Often make sure that you don't smell badly and chew some gum prior to the interview but never during the interview.15. Perfumes and colognes - Maintain your perfume and cologne to a minimum.16. Briefcase - Take along a brief case with notepad and pen for any type of notes you might have to take during or after the interview. To avoid any sort of inconvenience attempt to make all arrangements one day in advance of the interview.

description.hltext_display: Moshi Hostel | Hostel In Moshi, Tanzania
description.content: Moshi Hostel Hostel Hoff is a Moshi Hostel in Tanzania run by an Australia women and her Tanzanian husband. We focus on Independent volunteering within and on the outskirts of Moshi town. Hostel Hoff started very small, back in 2006 with the hope of helping volunteer’s side step international profit orientated "organizations". It is our belief that you should not have to pay to volunteer, therefore prices cover your accommodation and the volunteering experience is free. In truth, we never hoped to achieve as much as we have. Our view seems to be shared with many of you out there and this has allowed us to give real, substantial and continuous help to a number of projects that we are privileged to support. When volunteering and staying at Hostel Hoff you are asked to bring a true desire to help those in need as well as a fun & friendly attitude. Although there are hostels in Moshi, there are no other hostels in Moshi like the Hoff, which has the space and atmosphere for people to relax, have fun, chat, work and watch DVDs etc. People come from all around the world and stay from a few weeks to a few months. It is located just 5 mins walk from town and a 3000Tshs (approx USD$2) taxi ride from any of the restaurants in town. We have a large garden where you can relaxing out the back or in one of the hammocks. Accommodation at the moshi hostel is in dorm rooms, accommodating up to 21 people when full. There are between 2-6 beds per room depending on the size of the room and the time of year you come (off-season there will commonly be 1-2 per room, high season, well, its an opportunity to make more close friends!). The emphasis at the hostel is placed on a relaxed friendly atmosphere. Most people who stay are traveling alone and so it gives an opportunity for people to live with and make friends with other travelers and volunteers. There are many common sitting areas and rooms, so there is space to carry out different activities. There are also many supplies left in the hostel by previous travelers/ volunteers that are for common use, such as paper, paints, medical supplies etc. During the late afternoon (when people have returned from there volunteering) or on the weekends you can commonly see a volleyball match happening in the front yard, people playing cards, relaxing in the hammock or reading. Breakfast and dinner are provided for everyone and laundry is included. There is 7 full time staff who are friendly, trustworthy and most of them have been with us since the very start. Everything is provided at the hostel, from mosquito nets, to books and DVDs. If you are coming from abroad I have decided that there are 3 rules: Firstly, you must bring a poster, picture or something that either represents where you are coming from or is just plain funky. Secondly, I would like you to bring your favourite book or DVD add it to the collection. Thirdly, and very important, you must bring chocolate. Except if you are American, because, lets face it, American chocolate sucks. But you can buy it in Amsterdam on your way through! You can only stay at the Hostel Hoff in Moshi, Tanzania if you truly love the Hoff. If you don’t know who the Hoff is, please return to the 90’s and watch some Baywatch reruns.

description.hltext_display: “梅川酷子哥”一夜走红 西装搭裤衩求职(图) 12-22
Fokozott határforgalom az ünnepek alatt
description.content: Nagylaknál az elmúlt 24 órában mintegy 11 ezren lépték át a határt. A forgalom az ünnepek előtt 40 százalékkal nőtt. Elsősorban a külföldön dolgozó vendégmunkások jönnek haza. A forgalom zavartalanná tétele érdekében a határrendészet növelte a személyzetet az ünnepek alatt.

description.hltext_display: Numerology Site
description.content: Psychic readings are an ancient art that have been employed to divine peoples' fortunes for thousands of years. Numerous forms of psychic reading have existed in most of the cultures of the Western world, from the ancient priests of Egypt to the Roma gypsies that have been traveling across Europe since the Middle Ages. You will find almost as numerous styles of psychic readings as you can find cultures that practice them, with most focusing on reading tea leaves, cards, palms, or even the stars themselves to aid divine the future or seek guidance.Now that the traveling caravans of gypsies and also the village mystic are nearly forgotten memories people are more and more regularly turning to the internet to obtain their psychic readings. On the internet psychics are increasingly replacing the traditional storefront mystics because of the wide range of services offered along with the convenience of receiving a personalized reading from the comfort of property. While some people could understandably be turned off by using an on the internet psychic service to learn their future, other men and women are grateful for the distance these services supply. Individuals with sensitive or deeply private questions might come across the anonymity of an on-line psychic reading to be comforting, and it is important that the recipient feel calm and at ease for the psychic reading to be the most effective.It's worth noting to the skeptic that people have been receiving accurate psychic advice over the phone for decades, along with the jump to on the internet services is hardly any various than dialing a clairvoyant from an advertisement on television. Most on the web psychic readings are conducted either via telephone or chat rooms, permitting you to select how distant or intimate you would like to get with your psychic. In fact, 1 useful advantage of choosing an online psychic is having the chance to research your medium or read their profile before selecting them to conduct your reading. Numerous internet sites provide multiple clairvoyants to pick from, every with their own profile description and sometimes even a picture so that you'll be able to know a lot more about who you might be trusting to perform your psychic reading.A much safer and far more inexpensive way to go about seeking psychic guidance is to instead stick to free services on the internet and in magazines that offer astrology, numerology and horoscope data. Such info is installed much more for fun and is usually not even written by anyone with any knowledge of what is going on within the world of parapsychology. Information that may be found next to the crossword in Sunday's paper really should be taken with a grain of salt and used for amusement purposes and nothing too significantly much more. On-line psychics also have surprisingly few limitations on which techniques of divination they can use to read your future with numerology sites. Most on-line psychics will admit that it's challenging or impossible to view an individual's aura or read their palm on the internet, even with the magic of modern technology. Fortunately it's still feasible to receive accurate psychic guidance on-line via casting runes, reading tarot cards, utilizing numerology sites or 1 of the numerous other typical forms of divination. So try them out for yourself, and see what your future may possibly hold. Check also for more info

description.hltext_display: Stress Around The Festive Season
description.content: Leadership Motivation - Energized and Thriving During the Festive Season Some of you may think "Wow, how and I going to fit that in? I'm busy enough." Well, this is about taking a bit of a stock-take, taking a step back for a moment, and thinking, "Wow, that feels good!" It's about taking a few moments, hitting the pause button, and reflecting on what this is all about. What is the purpose of this? I think when we stop for a moment, and we consider that this is a time for joy, this is a time for sharing, this is a time to … enjoy. There are a number of things I do to help me stay on the path to a very happy Christmas. One of them is that I just sit. I sit particularly in nature. I live in a beautiful environment. Perhaps you do; perhaps you don't. But, you need to find a space that you really enjoy, and just sit there for that moment, and breath. Breath deeply, perhaps in through your nose and out through your mouth. And just close your eyes and focus on a very happy day with all of these people coming together. Visualize how you would like it to unfold. You could sit there during that time and just take notice of your body. Do a scan through your body and just feel where there is any tightness. You can tense up that area for a moment, and then release it. Tense it up again, and then release it. Just feel as you are doing it. Breath out that tension, out through your body, down into the ground, or out through your finger tips. Another great way to remain energized is to connect with water. Having a bath, or putting my feet in a tub of water, or perhaps using a foot spa, or having a shower. Just imaging cleansing your body and your mind, and any tension or stress, just washing down over your body and out through the drain. Exercise, another wonderful way, when I'm feeling a little bit, "tense" or "caught up", and I just need to get out there and release a little bit of excess energy. Whether it's going for a walk, or maybe it's doing some aerobics or going for a bike ride. It may only be 5 or 10 minutes, but that may be just all that you need to release that tension and energize your body. At the end of the day, there's an end. And I know there are a lot of people that perhaps, when they are coming to that Christmas end, they're staying up a little bit later, they are catching up with people, there's lots of parties and festivities. It would be good to schedule some earlier nights, and again, give yourself an opportunity to rebalance and re-energize the body with a really good nights sleep. So, whatever it is for you, again, it's a time to set back and look at things simply. I don't have to go out and actually buy anything or do anything. I may need to just sit for a moment and reflect what this day is about. Visualise how I'd like this day to be. Then you can make certain that you get some necessary rest so that when this great day arrives, you are energized and ready for it.

description.hltext_display: 网易有道荣膺“10年度中国最具传播力品牌营销效果”奖
description.content:
日前，由中国商务广告协会、《21世纪广告》双周刊联合主办，以“资本、合作、共赢”为主题的第四届“21世纪广告国际峰会”在北京落下帷幕。数百名来自政府、广告协会、知名院校、广告公司、知名企业的领导和代表出席了本次峰会。网易有道获得峰会颁发的“2010年度中国最具传播力品牌营销效果”大奖，同时获得该奖项的还有李宁、沃尔沃、北京联通、中国邮政等知名品牌企业。
据悉，峰会设立“2010年度中国最具传播力品牌营销效果”大奖是为了奖励在2010年传播效果显著的品牌，以及助力品牌传播且效果显著的营销平台。网易有道通过整合网易门户、网易邮箱、有道搜索、有道词典等多项优势资源，打造了多位一体的网络营销平台——有道搜索推广，为中小企业提供了丰富的线上推广资源。更重要的是，有道搜索推广充分发挥技术平台的优势，通过技术分析进行精准投放，让中小企业能够花更少的钱，获得更多的有效用户，提高客户的ROI。不仅如此，有道搜索推广独特的资源优势使得广告主的品牌覆盖了更多目标用户，得到了多角度的展示。
“网易有道是此次峰会唯一获奖的新媒体平台，也说明其营销平台的价值受到了越来越多企业的认可。”一位营销专家在现场表示。“值得一提的是，互联网上的搜索用户是根据自己的需要和兴趣来寻找信息的，所以对于中小企业来说，企业无论大小，在有道搜索推广平台获得的机会是近乎平等的。这相对于传统媒体广告有限的资源及覆盖范围，以及高额的广告费用来说，是一次革命性的改变。”
据了解，网易有道获得本次大奖最根本的原因在于他们倡导的“顾问式”营销咨询服务。他们通过“精耕计划”等一系列经销商扶持举措，帮助经销商的销售和客户团队迅速成长为网络营销专家。这些营销专家和网易有道直销团队共同深入到中小企业当中，从关键词购买到企业网站建设等各个方面为中小企业提供专业化服务，从而帮助中小企业顺利实现营销创新。数据显示，2010年第三季度，网易有道户均消费同比上涨了120%。
“有道搜索推广是低门槛，标准化的产品，有利于中小企业尝试新型营销模式;有道搜索推广有自身的独特资源优势，我们不仅有有道搜索，而且有网易门户，网易邮箱，有道词典等独家资源优势;有道会在匹配度以及精准营销方面做更多的努力。”网易高级副总裁周枫表示。

description.hltext_display: GOP senator rekindles Christmas name debate
description.content:
Oklahoma Republican Sen. Jim Inhofe singlehandedly breathed life into the flagging "war on Christmas" debate when he announced this month that he wouldn't ride his horse in the Tulsa Holiday Parade of Lights this year — something he has done for decades.
Offended by a change of name (that actually took place last year) from "Christmas" to "holiday," Inhofe accused parade organizers of taking Christ out of Christmas.
Last week, other Tulsans angered by the name switch demanded that City Council deny a permit to the parade, which is a privately organized and funded event. Fortunately, the city attorney was there to remind the council that it would be unconstitutional to stop a parade because it wasn't called "Christmas." In a 5-3 vote, a reluctant council granted the permit.
Until Inhofe's parade protest, things were relatively quiet this December on the "war on Christmas" front.
Maybe most Americans have figured out that the so-called "defense of Christmas" has been wrongheaded from the start. After all, by attacking retail stores for saying "happy holidays," which "Christmas" are the defenders defending? Scantily clad young women in elf costumes? Parade floats with Santa and Mrs. Claus tossing candy to the crowd? As Jon Stewart quipped, the bearded guy they're defending is the wrong bearded guy.
Truth be told, Christ was taken out of our highly commercial Christmas a long time ago. Try finding religious Christmas cards at your local card store. Good luck. What has happened over time is exactly what the Puritans feared would happen (which is why they banned Christmas): Cultural Christmas is now a mostly secular festival with trees and mistletoe from the pagan past overwhelming a Christian overlay to create an economic engine of mammoth proportions.
So why would faithful Christians insist on labeling the annual national blowout "Christmas"? Calling it "holiday" (though it's clearly no "holy day") doesn't take Christ out of Christmas — it could help give Christ back to Christians.

event_or_fact.property: the bearded guy they're defending is the wrong bearded guy

description.hltext_display: Pronto soccorso - I quiz di Moebius
description.content:
A Moebius i quiz per tenere in forma il cervello
Perché le coperte che vediamo usate nelle azioni di pronto soccorso sono argento e oro?
1) le coperte metalliche sono un po' come quei fogli plastica che si usano per conservare i cibi: le comprimi sul corpo e vi aderiscono strettamente e conservano la temperatura. Il colore, quindi, non c'entra niente;
2) lo starto d'oro e quello d'argento hanno una funzione termica;
3) l'oro e l'argento sono colori molto visibili nella zona di un incidente; in questo modo si sa che lì c'è un ferito.
La risposta
Quesito 138: quiz di Moebius dell'11 Dicembre 2010
Quanto dura un giorno sulla Luna, ovvero il ciclo luce/buio?
1) La luna è molto più piccola della Terra e quindi il suo giorno e la sua
notte si compiono in circa 10 ore;
2) La luna è più piccola ma l'attrazione gravitazionele della Terra, che si esercita sulla Luna, ne rallenta il moto e il nostro pianeta ha un ciclo praticamente identico: 23 ore e 35 minuti;
3) L'attrazione della Terra ha creato una sincronizzazione fra la rotazione su sè stessa della Luna e quella della Luna intorno alla Terra, che dura, come sappiamo, quasi un mese.
La risposta
Quesito 137: quiz di Moebius del 4 Dicembre 2010
Quale dei seguenti animali ha una accelerazione maggiore? Non velocità, attenzione: se vogliamo misurare l’accelerazione massima vuol dire che prendiamo una certa distanza X e misuriamo chi si presenta, partendo da fermo, con una velocità massima dopo aver percorso X metri.
Bene, gli animali sono:
1) lo scoiattolo
2) lo struzzo
3) l’elefante
La risposta
Quesito 136: quiz di Moebius del 27 Novembre 2010
Quale delle seguenti invenzioni è realmente allo studio e cioè potrebbe diventare realtà nei prossimi anni:
1) Una specie di mutandone per mucche in grado di catturare, ci siamo capiti, il metano da loro emesso, fenomeno che è una parte abbastanza significativa della CO2 presente in atmosfera;
2) una stazione spaziale gonfiabile;
3) una moquette che, funzionerebbe soprattutto negli open space di uffici, mentre ci camminate sopra cattura l'energia elettrica statica e vi ricarica il cellulare.
La risposta
Quesito 135: quiz di Moebius del 20 Novembre 2010
Quale dei seguenti animali è ermafrodita, ovvero fa tutto da solo per riprodursi?
- la tenia
- la talpa canadese
- il baco da seta
La risposta
Quesito 134: quiz di Moebius del 13 Novembre 2010
Gli esseri umani non producono la vitamina C naturalmente; dobbiamo procurarcela mangiando, tipicamente, frutta e verdura. Abbiamo bisogno di almeno 10 milligrammi giornalieri. Se non lo facciamo comincimo ad avere disturbi gravi nell’arco di poche settimane – è lo scorbuto, la malattia da assenza di vitamina C – e poi sopraggiunge il peggio. Gli Inuit, una delle due etnie in cui si divide il popolo degli eschimesi, non prende lo scorbuto, sebbene vivano in zone prive di vegetali. Come mai?
1) perché mangiano il Muktuk, un mix di pelle di balena e grasso, congelati
2) perché gli Inuit si sono evoluti, geneticamente, senza il bisogno di vitamina
3) la vitamina C è fondamentale nella regolazione delle escursioni termiche del corpo, e dove vivono gli Inuit fa solo tanto freddo.
La risposta
Quesito 133: quiz di Moebius del 2 Ottobre 2010
Si vede un lampo ma il temporale è ancora lontano. Poi passa qualche secondo e arriva il suono della grande scarica elettrica. Quanto tempo ha impiegato a raggiuncerci? Se sono passati 3 secondi dalla luce del fulmine e il suono vuol dire che il temporale è a 1 km. Perché? Perché in aria il suono viaggia a 330 metri al secondo, in media; qualcosa cambia con la temperatura.
Ma a quanto viaggia il suono nel vetro?
1) 200 metri al secondo
2) 50 metri al secondo
3) 4000 metri al secondo.
La risposta
Quesito 132: quiz di Moebius del 25 Settembre 2010
Se pensiamo di avvicinarci a un buco nero, con il nostro corpo, svolazzando per l’Universo, cosa ci accadrebbe?
1) non riusciremmo a parlare perché il buco nero risucchia tutta l’aria e il suono ne ha bisogno perché è su di essa che viaggia;
2) se scendessimo in verticale, con i piedi verso il buco nero, questi sarebbero attirati verso il buco nero molto di più che la testa;
3) l’unico modo per evitare di finire fagocitati dal vortice sarebbe quello, è stato calcolato, di aprire un paracadute grande quanto la mezza sfera del nostro pianeta.
La risposta
Quesito 131: quiz di Moebius del 18 Settembre 2010
Quiz “sonoro” questa volta. Ascoltate questo suono... di che si tratta? 1) E' il verso del gibbone crestato; 2) E' un volatile: l’Ospide reale, una specie di tacchino sudamericano; 3) E' il segnale d’allarme utilizzato da una centrifuga per usi biomedicali quando si supera il numero di giri massimo consentito. La risposta Quesito 130: quiz di Moebius del 24 Luglio 2010 Qual è la strategia migliore per difendersi da un coccodrillo che ci stia attaccando? 1) Dategli una bastonata sul naso, che sta nella parte finale del muso ed è delicatissimo; 2) Se si ha un sasso nelle vicinanze o anche qualcosa di un po’ rigido, gettateglielo in bocca. Il coccodrillo detesta avere fra i denti qualcosa che non sia soffice e gustoso, tipo la vostra gamba; 3) Mettetegli delle dita negli occhi. La risposta Quesito 129: quiz di Moebius del 17 Luglio 2010 Che odore ha la Luna? 1) polvere da sparo 2) tufo 3) argilla La risposta Quesito 128: quiz di Moebius del 10 Luglio 2010 Come funziona l’air bag, ovvero qual è il meccanismo che ne regola l’attivazione? 1) L’accelerometro 2) Un cavo collegato al frontale della macchina, un cavo in tensione, che si spezza in caso di tamponamento e questo attiva il meccanismo 3) Un sensore elettronico che segnala una pressione oltre soglia di sicurezza nella zona frontale dell’auto. La risposta Quesito 127: quiz di Moebius del 3 Luglio 2010 Luglio del 1945. Deserto di Alamogordo, New Mexico (Usa). Durante il Trinity Test, il test della prima bomba atomica, Enrico Fermi lascia cadere a terra dei pezzettini di carta. Questo gli serviva per: 1) verificare l’effetto della bomba sulla gravità 2) calcolare la velocità dell’onda d’urto 3) stimare rapidamente l’energia dell’esplosione. La risposta Quesito 126: quiz di Moebius del 26 Giugno 2010 Si sente spesso porre la seguente domanda: è vero che un’auto di Formula 1 potrebbe, raggiunta una certa velocità, correre rovesciata restando cioè attaccata a una specie di pista/soffitto? E’ una leggenda metropolitana? 1) Sì, è assolutamente possibile 2) No, non raggiungerebbe mai la velocità necessaria 3) Sì, ma come provarlo? La risposta Quesito 125: quiz di Moebius del 19 Giugno 2010 Che cos’è il Tacchino induttivista? 1) Una varietà, rara, di tacchini che cresce in alcune regioni del nord dell’India 2) Un esempio utilizzato in filosofia della scienza 3) E’ il personaggio di una favola scritta dal filosofo Bertrand Russel La risposta Quesito 124: quiz di Moebius del 12 Giugno 2010 Del fisico teorico austriaco Wolfgang Pauli si dice che, quando passava nelle vicinanze di un laboratorio, avveniva il famoso effetto Pauli. In cosa consisteva? 1) Gli strumenti emettevano strani ronzii 2) Gli apparati sperimentali prendevano fuoco da soli 3) La strumentazione faceva cilecca La risposta Quesito 123: quiz di Moebius del 5 Giugno 2010 La teoria sull’origine dell’universo fu battezzata con l’espressione Big Bang. Chi le ha dato questo nome? 1) Albert Einstein, che aveva un gran senso dello humor 2) Richard Feynman, che amava le metafore militari 3) l’astrofisico Fred Hoyle, che la riteneva assurda La risposta Quesito 122: quiz di Moebius del 29 Maggio 2010 Una famiglia di api è composta da una regina, da 500 a 2000 fuchi, e quante operaie? - circa 6.000 - circa 60.000 - circa 600.000 La risposta Quesito 121: quiz di Moebius del 22 Maggio 2010 Se ci tagliamo il polpastrello di una mano, quando la ferita si rimargina l'impronta digitale di quel dito, una volta guariti, è cambiata? 1) No 2) Sì 3) Dipende dalla direzione che ha il taglio, verticale od orizzontale rispetto all'impronta. La risposta Quesito 120: quiz di Moebius del 15 Maggio 2010 Quando i pipistrelli, che dormono a testa in giù, si addormentano, com'è che non cadono? Perché quando uno si addormenta la sua muscoltaura non è più contratta... 1) Hanno delle unghie molto lunghe che funzionano come gancio; 2) In realtà i pipistrelli dormono, come altri animali, con un sonno leggerissimo e quindi per loro non è un problema manteneere attiva la musocolatura; 3) Le articolazioni della gamba possiedono un meccanismo che blocca la gamba stessa, un meccanismo a scatto, come certi cavalletti metallici. La risposta Quesito 119: quiz di Moebius del 8 Maggio 2010 La somma dell'età di 6 ragazzi è di 64 anni. Quale sarà la loro somma fra 6 anni? 1) 100 2) non c’è risposta perché non sappiamo l’età dei singoli 3) 96 La risposta Quesito 118: quiz di Moebius del 1° Maggio 2010 La Terra, il nostro pianeta, non è proprio sferica; all’Equatore è un po’ più grassa, cioè il raggio è più grande di quanto non sia all’altezza della Groenlandia. Ma questo rigonfimento vale anche per le acque degli oceani? 1) Sì 2) No 3) Dipende dalla posizione della Terra nella sua rivoluzione intorno al Sole. Durante l’anno, quando è più vicina al sole, l’acqua è più alta. La risposta Quesito 117: quiz di Moebius del 24 Aprile 2010 Siamo ancora abbastanza lontani dalla velocità massima che un umano può raggiungere in corsa? Parliamo ovviamente dei 100 metri, e prendiamo in considerazione quelli maschili... 1) No, siamo molto vicini 2) Sì, siamo abbastanza lontani 3) In realtà non si riesce a stabilire La risposta Quesito 116: quiz di Moebius del 17 Aprile 2010 In questi mesi si sta sviluppando una grande attenzione al consumo d’acqua, non solo in Italia ma in tutto il mondo. Sappiamo che è un bene fondamentale e prezioso che nei prossimi decenni potrebbe drammaticamente mancare. Allora diamo un piccolo contributo, oggi, alla consapevolezza intorno a questo prolema. Quale delle tre seguenti attività umane consuma più acqua? 1) L’irrigazione dei campi 2) L’industria 3) L’uso domestico La risposta Quesito 115: quiz di Moebius del 10 Aprile 2010 Qual è il pianeta del sistema solare che gira più lentamente intorno al Sole? 1) E’ Mercurio, il più vicino al Sole 2) Tutti i pianeti girano alla stessa velocità intorno al Sole 3) E’ Nettuno, il più lontano La risposta Quesito 114: quiz di Moebius del 3 Aprile 2010 C’è qualcosa di più liquido dell’acqua? 1) No, non esiste nulla 2) Sì, molti liquidi sono più liquidi dell’acqua 3) Solo l’acqua ossigenata. La risposta Quesito 113: quiz di Moebius del 27 Marzo 2010 La Littorina saxatilis, è una specie di lumachina che vive in gruppi di centinaia di individui vicino all’acqua. Le femmine di Littorina hanno un singolare comportamento. Quale? 1) Si accoppiano con circa 20 maschi per una sola fecondazione; 2) Hanno tre cornina, ma ne tirano fuori solo due; solo per una settimana all’anno, all’inizio dell’inverno spunta la terza; 3) Quando sono fecondate il loro guscio diventa trasparente. La risposta Quesito 112: quiz di Moebius del 20 Marzo 2010 Nelle analisi che la polizia scientifica deve svolgere per identificare dei colpevoli sta per essere introdotta una nuova tecnica per il rilievo delle impronte digitali che promette di essere più efficace di quella esistente, questo perché capita che le impronte siano incomplete. Quale di queste tre è la nuova tecnica? 1) E’ un sistema che recupera un'immagine molto ingrandita ma tridimensionale dei polpastrelli; 2) Sulle nostre dita ci sono colonie di batteri che sono molto personali, assolutamente tipiche per ogni individuo; 3) E’ un software che ricostruisce le parti mancanti tenendo presente che la struttura di un’impronta non può essere di qualunque tipo ma segue delle regole. La risposta Quesito 111: quiz di Moebius del 13 Marzo 2010 Quella prima dentista 1) Fu a Creta intorno al 1800 a.C.; 2) Fu nel medioevo e per l'esattezza nella cittadina tedesca di Tubinga nella prima metà del 1200; 3) A metà del '500 in Inghilterra. La risposta Quesito 110: quiz di Moebius del 6 Marzo 2010 Cos'è un 'puma di terra'? 1) E’ una definizione dialettale della patata; 2) E’ una particolare variante del puma, il leone americano, che ha la curiosa abitudine di non salire mai sugli alberi, come fanno tutti gli altri puma; 3) E’ un gergale di navigazione usato ai tempi della grande loro flotta dai genovsi, intorno al 1440. Significava "accostare verso la riva". La risposta Quesito 109: quiz di Moebius del 27 Febbraio 2010 Cosa accade alla mano di un violinista professionista. La mano che si muove sulle corde e non quella che tiene l'archetto? 1) Su questa mano tendono a formarsi, con il tempo, dei piccoli puntini, come delle lentiggini; 2) Le falangi di questa mano crescono di più; 3) Il o la violinista è in grado di sovrapporre perfettamente il dito mignolo all'indice. La risposta Quesito 108: quiz di Moebius del 20 Febbraio 2010 Che cosa si ottiene dal girasole? 1) Metilbutiletere 2) Biodiesel 3) Etanolo La risposta Quesito 107: quiz di Moebius del 13 Febbraio 2010 Qual è l'alimento che gli astronauti non possono proprio consumare in orbita? 1) il pane 2) il ketchup 3) l'insalata La risposta Quesito 106: quiz di Moebius del 6 Febbraio 2010 Come si muovono i nostri occhi nell’atto di osservare una faccia, una casa o un quadro? 1) Abbiamo tutti lo stesso modo di perlustrare la stessa scena 2) Ci sono forti differenze fra soggetti diversi 3) C’è una curiosa differenza fra uomini e donne La risposta Quesito 105: quiz di Moebius del 30 Gennaio 2010 I delfini hanno una loro tipica voce, con la quale si dicono un sacco di cose che noi non capiamo, almeno per il momento. A che cosa assomiglia questa voce? 1) al rumore dell’ago di una macchina da cucire elettrica 2) al fischio debole di un bollitore da the 3) a del pane secco grattugiato La risposta Quesito 104: quiz di Moebius del 23 Gennaio 2010 In una stanza di normali dimensioni, diciamo 5 x 4 metri, quanto pesa l’aria che in essa è contenuta? Per essere più precisi diciamo anche che la temperatura è di 0°C e la pressione è quella a livello del mare, ma la sostanza del risultato non cambia molto, a meno che la vostra stanza non sia a 10.000 metri. 1) 7 kg circa 2) 9 etti 3) 96 kg circa La risposta Quesito 103: quiz di Moebius del 16 Gennaio 2010 Una mazza e una palla da baseball costano, insieme, 11 euro. La mazza costa 10 euro più della palla. Quanto costa la palla? La risposta Quesito 102: quiz di Moebius del 9 Gennaio 2010 Quale di queste notizie è vera? 1) Allo zoo di Heidelberg, siamo in Germania, c’è un orangutan che sta imparando a fischiare; 2) Allo zoo di San Diego, negli stati Uniti, un pony, che porta in giro i bambini trainando un carretto, ha incominciato a nutrirsi di un certo tipo di formaggini (offerti dai bambini), adesso non mangia più erba ed è sottoposto a una attività di rieducazione per tornare erbivoro; 3) Allo zoo di Stoccolma una leonessa, seppure tenuta in locali chiusi nel periodo invernale, è risultata particolarmente sensibile al freddo e le hanno dovuto fareuna tuta su misura, come quella che si mette ai cani. La risposta Quesito 101: quiz di Moebius del 26 Dicembre 2009 L'armadillo è l'unico mammifero che può dar vita a gemelli identici, cioè omozigoti? 1) No, è l'unico mammifero che non può partorire gemelli; 2) Può generare gemelli solo dopo un parto normale; 3) Sì, è l'unico che può dar vita a quattro gemelli omozigoti. La risposta Quesito 100: quiz di Moebius del 19 Dicembre 2009 I lamantini, che sono mammiferi marini, manifestano comportamenti omosessuali? 1) Sì 2) No mai 3) Sì, ma solo le femmine La risposta Consulta l'ARCHIVIOdei quiz

description.hltext_display: 澳大利亚悉尼大学计划减少本科生 增� 硕士生 12-22
description.content:
《悉尼先锋晨报》曾在一篇关于悉尼大学改革方案的报道中称悉尼大学副� �长Michael Spence计划在增添硕士生名额的同时缩减6000个本科生名额。然而，Spence博士在接受采访时却否认将会缩减6000个本科生名额一事，并称《悉尼先锋晨报》的报道不实。
在写给《悉尼先锋晨报》的信函中，Spence博士讽刺说撰写该文的记者想象力很“丰富”，� 为悉尼大学2011-2015发展策略计划白皮书中没有一处提到要缩减6000个本科生名额的事情。
Spence博士表示说，在未来5年里，悉尼大学的总录取人数将会与现在基本持平。虽然大学时有计划将会轻微减少本科生名额并增� 硕士生名额，但这个幅度仅在每年260人以内。
Spence博士还表示说，这种调整是为了平衡大学中各类学生的构成。
悉尼大学所发布的这份2011-2015发展策略计划白皮书指出，悉尼大学将会在未来五年里以学生为本进行改革，努力满足学生们的需求。大学将重点投资跨领域学科，鼓励科� �合作，探索热点社会和医学问题的解决方法。
白皮书称，大学将投入3.9亿澳元用于建设一所新的医学科� �中心，并将投入1.1亿澳元用于纳米科学� �究。此外，大学还将进一步拓展与中国的科� �学术互动，特别是与中国西部的合作。 在一项针对大学学院的重要改革中，白皮书指出大学将会在维持原有学院结构的基础上将学院按类归入七个不同的部门中去，从而增强相关联学科学院间的互动与合作，增� 收益，减少浪费。

description.hltext_display: "동지팥죽 맛있어요"
description.content:
[전송시간 기준 7일간 업데이트]
도움말 닫기
글씨 확대글씨 축소
22일 동지를 맞아 서울 남산한옥마을에서 동지팥죽을 무료로 나눠주는 행사가 열렸다. 아이들이 줄을 서서 팥죽을 받고 있다.
한국아이닷컴 인기기사
ㆍ"F-22 랩터 뜨고 미사일로 北 정밀타격"

ㆍ속살 노출한 이세은 "속옷은 걸칠 줄 알았는데…"

ㆍ삐걱대던 한국 고속철 '초대박' 터트릴까
ㆍ가격 확 낮춘 애플TV 돌풍 '심상찮네!'

description.hltext_display: The Buzz | Louisville's own cover stars
description.content:
Still looking for a last-minute Christmas gift? Just in time for the holidays, a new “Amazing Race” video game for Nintendo Wii recently hit store shelves.
The game cover features pics of several of the show's fan favorites, including Louisville's very own Kent and Vyxsin. Yep, that's Kent with an “e” and not a “y” these days. Our hometown reality star tells The Buzz that after his father passed away in the spring, he has opted to drop the “y” from his first name.
LaKisha and Jennifer Hoffman also grace the cover. LaKisha was a former University of Louisville basketball player. Her sister Jennifer was an All-America volleyball player at Uof L and is now a volleyball coach at the university.
We hear you can find the game, which was created and distributed by Unisoft, at Target, Walmart and other video game retailers.
You can catch Kent and Vyxsin on the small screen again when “Amazing Race All-Stars” makes its debut Feb. 20 on CBS.
Happy birthday, Diane!
The Buzz is giving a birthday shout-out to one of our “Hometown Heroes.” Former Louisvillian and Seneca High School grad Diane Sawyer turns 65 today.
Nicole's latest celeb fan
Louisville's Nicole Scherzinger just completed her run Monday night as a judge on the Nick Lachey-hosted reality show “Sing-Off.” Now Sharon Osbourne is speaking out that the former Pussycat Doll should land a spot at the judges' table when the U.S. version of “X-Factor,” created by Simon Cowell, premieres next year.
Ozzy's wife tells Now, a British weekly entertainment magazine: “She's great TV, has a huge following in the States and people absolutely love her. Plus she's beautiful and talented.”
Ryan's broken heart
He's People magazine's “Sexiest Man Alive,” but that evidently didn't stop Scarlett Johansson from stomping all over Ryan Reynolds' heart.
After announcing their short-lived marriage was kaput last week, the actor is “beyond sad and depressed,” US Weekly reports. The celeb weekly also tattles that the Mrs. “treated him badly” and that when it came to the divorce, “she was disconnected and disaffected.”
A-LIST EVENT
JIM BRICKMAN
When: 7:30p.m. Wednesday
Where: The Kentucky Center, Whitney Hall, 501 W. Main St.
Admission: $32-$75
Information: (502) 584-7777

QUOTE OF THE DAY
“There will be me and Russ and a pink Christmas tree and a tofurky.”
-- Singer Katy Perry, to Italy’s Grazia magazine, about spending her first Christmas with hubby Russell Brand.

description.hltext_display: 分析：谷歌遭遇欧盟调查 或被迫公开算法
description.content:
导语：国外媒体周三发表分析文章称，欧盟委员会正在对谷歌展开反垄断调查，调查其是否滥用市场主导地位打压网络搜索竞争对手。谷歌可能会像微软一样遭遇数年的诉讼，甚至可能被迫公开其搜索算法。
以下为文章全文：
谷歌的网络搜索算法就像可口可乐的配方一样，是该公司的最高机密。但在目前，该公司却面临欧盟委员会的反垄断调查，目的是确认其是否滥用市场主导地位压制互联网搜索市场竞争企业，蓄意降低对手链接排名，这可能迫使谷歌披露一些内部运作的详情。
研究公司Strategy Analytics分析师马丁·奥劳森(Martin Olausson)称，此事可能陷入僵局，因网络搜索算法乃谷歌的生存之本。如果欧盟确认谷歌滥用市场主导地位，便会责令该公司调整搜索方法或处以最高为年营收10%的罚金。
谷歌面临操纵网站搜索结果排名的指控。随着公司日益壮大，谷歌开始提供一些自己网站的搜索内容，而这些在搜索结果中排名的往往比较靠前，从而导致要求该公司进一步透明搜索结果算法的呼声高涨。本月初，欧盟委员会就谷歌是否滥用在搜索市场的主导地位展开正式调查。
此外，谷歌还面临降低竞争对手服务链接搜索结果排名、阻止广告合作伙伴在竞争对手网站投放广告并对客户转移广告数据到其他平台设置障碍的指责。博客网站Search Engine Land的网络顾问及编辑格雷格·斯特灵(Greg Sterling)称，树大招风，谷歌经常面临诸如此类的指责。
树大招风
谷歌在欧洲搜索引擎市场占有庞大份额。根据行业分析公司ComScore，该公司在欧洲搜索引擎市场所占份额约为77%。欧盟委员会本月证实，已经从德国竞争当局接到两起针对谷歌的投诉。谷歌随后表示，会配合欧盟进行调查。
面对这些投诉，谷歌披露了一些确定搜索结果排名的算法指导。该公司发言人亚当·科瓦切维奇(Adam Kovacevich)通过电邮称，“公司已经提供了许多有关搜索结果排名的算法指导，同时还会不断更新以便让搜索排名更透明。但披露具体细节对搜索引擎并无帮助，而且还会伤害我们的用户。”
参与投诉谷歌的包括英国价格比较网站Foundem及微软旗下的德国价格比较网站Ciao等。Foundem表示，他们并不是想让谷歌公布算法详情，只是想让该公司将网站搜索结果排名的根据原理透明化。
能否躲过一劫?
欧盟委员会对微软、苹果及英特尔等一些美国科技巨头一向不手软，曾经向微软开出过16.8亿美元的巨额罚单，现在谷歌也步其后尘遭遇调查。
哥伦比亚商学院教授布雷特·高登(Brett Gordo)称，欧盟委员会面临的主要挑战是证明谷歌滥用在搜索市场的主导地位伤害了一定的网站。
此前，法国反垄断机构警告谷歌勿要滥用在线广告市场的主要地位。谷歌的应对之策是承诺进一步明确并透明其AdWords广告政策。Hogan Lovells律师事务所合伙人斯托弗·汤玛斯(Christopher Thoma)称，在欧盟调查一事上，谷歌可能采用类似的应对策略。但问题的核心并不是搜索结果排名的算法，而是谷歌能否做出一些让欧盟委员会放心的调整。
Clifford Chance律师事务所合伙人托马斯·文耶(Thomas Vinje)指出，可以确定的是，谷歌面临的压力会越来越大。欧盟委员会展开正式调查可能还会引出其它指控，此事可能需要时段时日才能了结。(姜雪)

description.hltext_display: 中国企业家：如何应对互联网告别人口红利时代
description.content:
来源: 中国企业家网 时间:2010-12-22 11:34 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
互联网：告别“人口红利”时代
指望依靠网民数量爆炸性增长而迅速崛起，越来越不现实。习惯了“跑马圈地”、“抄袭模仿”的中国互联网企业，将开始一场ARPU值争夺战,中国互联网会迎来“失去的十年”吗?现在看来，这并非只是一种忧虑，它很可能会是即将发生的事实。
你可以说，野蛮生长十余年的中国互联网，终于站在了新的历史拐点上—“跑马圈地”渐进尾声，“抄袭模仿”行将没落。而这一切，大都与“人口红利”即将终结紧密相关，那曾是支撑互联网高速发展的关键因素。
通常意义上的“人口红利”概念，是说某一阶段社会中的适龄劳动人口多，老人和儿童少，会出现一个劳动力资源相对丰富、抚养负担轻、于经济发展十分有利的“黄金时期”。中国互联网经历了类似时期，由于适龄网民非常多、跳跃式的现代化进程等原因，上网人数在短短几年内急剧增加，一大批公司享受了互联网的 “人口红利”，得以飞速发展。
然而，安享“红利”的好日子总会过去。根据艾瑞咨询公布的数据显示，中国网民增速从2007年的53%一路放缓到2010年的25%，而且预计未来三年将继续放缓至8.5%。到2012年底，中国网民的总量大约达到6亿，相对于6亿的市场规模，个位数的增长率，几乎变成自然增长，单靠新增网民数量不足以支撑公司业绩如以前那样快速增长。
“后人口红利”时代的中国互联网业，将如何应对?
“全服务”告急
在乐享“红利”的年头，互联网公司很容易做到衣食无忧。
在刚结束的互联网“黄金三年”中，如果一个公司的用户增长率超过市场平均水平，即使ARPU值(每用户平均收入)没有提高，市场份额也会提高，业绩也不错，例如腾讯。
另外两种情形是，如果公司的用户增长率低于市场平均水平，ARPU值有所提高，尽管市场份额很难增加，但业绩也不会难看，如盛大;假如用户增长率低于市场平均水平，且ARPU值同时下降，虽然总产值和利润增加，但也可能出现市场份额下降，如新浪、搜狐。
由此可见，要么提高用户增长率，要么提高ARPU值，这是人口红利时代互联网公司保持业绩增速的两大法宝。到了“后人口红利”时代，一方面获取新增用户的成本大幅增加，一方面用户增长放缓，提高ARPU值遂成了保持业绩增速的不二法门。
腾讯已为此付出“代价”。
2010年6月中旬，腾讯港股在一周内暴跌近两成，市值缩水约470亿港元，同期恒生指数则上升1.5%。高盛随即发布报告称，腾讯自2008年以来已没有推出新游戏，这将妨碍公司业务的增长，甚至出现倒退。在发布对增长率构成大幅提振的大型游戏产品前，腾讯将进一步出现季节性及环比增长放缓。
腾讯业绩增长放缓，与过度依赖用户增长有着直接关系，没有新游戏吸引新增用户，必然导致业绩增长放缓。如果把腾讯历年的QQ在线人数和盈利状况放在一起，就会发现这两条上升曲线居然几乎重合，也就是说腾讯的盈利增长的核心动力源于用户增长，而在ARPU值这样的关键指标上，10年来几乎没有进步。
不单单腾讯，其它领域(门户、搜索、网游等)也出现了业绩增长放缓趋势。互联网观察人士刘兴亮对本刊表示：“根本原因还是与缺乏创新、过度依赖用户增长的全服务模式有关。”
此前，在人口红利的催化下，互联网巨头们纷纷从各自专注的领域向外扩张，打造全服务模式。该模式的好处在于，公司依靠原有优势每推出一项新服务，进入一块新领域，就能迅速扩大在该领域的市场份额。
在互联网历史上，曾经或正在尝试全服务模式的有雅虎和谷歌两家。腾讯和新浪等门户主要是沿着雅虎模式前进，腾讯是从IM扩展到全服务模式，新浪则从新闻扩展到全服务模式。而百度主要模仿谷歌的做法，从搜索扩展到全服务模式，走多平台道路，而且追逐热点，例如视频(奇艺)、SNS(贴吧)之类。
跑马圈地的结果是，原本在各自领域的领先公司，相互模仿，千人一面，不知不觉已经侵入对方的领域，形成恶性竞争。“你说现在3Q大战的背后深层原因有没有人口红利减少的原因?你会发现大家不择手段地恶性竞争。为什么?周鸿?其实说得很形象，‘腾讯什么都是老大，那我还没有活路了?你现在弄我的安全领域，那我就开始玩狠的。’”互联网分析人士谢文对本刊说。如果说，全服务模式在人口红利时代还可相安无事的话，在“后人口红利”时代，类似“3Q风波”的事情，只能更加频繁。
全服务模式带来的另外一个严重后果是，只顾跑马圈地，无暇深耕细作，创新的环境和能力严重缺失。因为任何一个创新产品的出现，都会得到巨头的关注，只要有成功的苗头，它们就大肆跟进，这对于创新者无疑是伤害。巨头不用创新，蚂蚁不敢创新，一度成为中国互联网的“噩梦”。至今，中国互联网仍缺乏行业性、世界级的创新，便是明证。在迭代周期越来越短的互联网世界，创新的重要性还需要解释或质疑吗?
你或许该问：如何创新，如何鼓励创新?苹果和Facebook给出了答案。这是两个对外开放的平台，所有机构和个人，都可以通过该平台把自己的创新应用分享出来，当然，收益与平台拥有者分成。这是对雅虎模式的颠覆，也比谷歌模式在鼓励外部创新上更进一步。在谢文看来，“无论腾讯还是新浪，在Facebook那里，也只能算是一个应用而已。”
显然，腾讯新浪们不甘于此。在2010(第九届)中国企业领袖年会上，马化腾宣布：“从今天，2010年12月5日起，腾讯公司将步入为期半年的战略转型筹备期，转型的原则是开放和分享。我们希望这是一次慎重、彻底、完整的转型。我们通过开放平台，让每个企业，甚至每个人都能够成为价值贡献者，并且从中获益。”
听了这话，坐在台下的新浪CEO曹国伟，立刻拿出手机发微博表示“非常同意”。新浪在一个月之前也正式宣布，微博平台开放。为此，新浪成立中国第一家针对微博开发者的创新基金，首轮资本2亿人民币，以扶植微博平台的第三方开发者。甚至百度也发布了一个开放平台。其实，腾讯QQ空间也早已开放，只是这种局部开放，显然离马化腾说的那种“彻底、完整的开放”还有一段距离。
通过开放平台，鼓励外部创新，通过创新增加用户黏性、提高ARPU值，将是中国互联网巨头们，在未来几年里的新路径。
谁的生死考验?
当然，人口红利的消失，对不同类别互联网公司的影响还是略有差异。
“大公司有上亿的用户群，有相当的市场规模，具有一定垄断性，一方面成本提高，一方面人口不增长，它最多是面临着滞胀，生死一时还谈不上。中型公司的压力要大很多，它好不容易到了盈亏平衡点了，想上市，想高利润，但规模效益就是出不来，破茧而出就破不了。小公司根本就达不到盈亏点，达不到那规模，没有空间了，你就是起不来。”谢文说。
而刘兴亮则提供了另外一个视角：“影响最大的领域包括腾讯、网游、SNS，它们的共同点是公司业务直接对C(个人用户);影响其次的是新浪等门户、百度、电子商务、视频，它们多半是由C到B(企业客户)的公司，靠C创造流量然后再去找企业客户要钱;而对于阿里巴巴这类B2B的公司，影响最小。”
无论哪种分析角度，相较于门户和搜索公司，网游恐怕是受人口红利消失影响最为明显的领域。除了盛大、巨人等几家网游巨头外，该领域更多的是中小公司。
目前，网游占据互联网经济27.5%的份额，高于任何一个领域，其面对的用户群体也是网民中最为活跃的群体，然而在经历了几年快速发展之后，面临着用户活跃性下降、内容同质化严重、盈利增幅下滑等问题。
根据艾瑞咨询监测数据显示，中国网络游戏市场在2010年第二季度遭遇首次市场规模的下跌。34款游戏，同时在线用户数同比下滑了10%，而26款上市至少一年的游戏则创下了14%的同比降幅。大多数游戏运营商都有不同程度的季度营收负增长。
这对于中国网游市场来说是一个不利的信号，在经历了纷纷上市与爆炸性增长的周期之后，第一次迎来了市场增长瓶颈期。
至于如何应对，至今未看到网游公司有什么实质性动作。此前，盛大推出过一个名为“18计划”的开放平台，意在鼓励第三方开发者创新产品，如今仍未见起色。
经过10多年的发展，中国网游依然只有两类，休闲游戏和角色扮演游戏，而且大部分趋同。在美国，网游则是一个全生态，战略类、益智类、家庭生活类、教育类⋯⋯遍地开花。这正是因为美国网民增长在2005年基本停滞后，才出现了很多细分市场。创新不足，产品单一且趋同，是中国网游公司增速放缓的内生原因，人口红利消失则加速了这一过程。
互联网商业模式除了依托资讯服务的品牌广告(如门户)，依托搜索服务的主题广告(如百度)，网络游戏和电子商务几个比较成熟的之外，还有几个在探索之中，包括视频、SNS和移动互联网。
视频领域，应该说起步并不晚，开始学的是YouTube模式(视频分享平台)，但没找到盈利模式，后来又学Hulu模式(影视剧等长视频)，由于中国的知识产权法律不健全，导致盗版盛行，盈利模式依然难觅。虽然，优酷网最近在纽交所挂牌，但是，人口红利的消失让盈利模式面临的挑战，似乎依然无解。你或许该问：这会是“最后的狂欢”吗?
以开心网为代表的SNS，理论上是复制的Facebook，实质上并没学到精髓，在经历了2009年的飞速发展之后，开心网、人人网等SNS网站最终变成了游戏网站，而非人际关系交互平台。加之人口红利将尽，用户增长放缓，还未找到盈利模式的中国SNS们，集体息声，面临抉择。
发展最晚的移动互联网，由于走的是“农村包围城市”路线，随着未来新增用户将从一二线城市的高端用户，向三四线城市乃至村镇的中低端用户转移，加之，“手机终端方便用户支付，手机实名制后用户信息可管理等因素，人口红利消失的大背景，对其影响目前看来并不是很明显。”刘兴亮说。
电子商务领域算是一个例外，由于真正的考验在于后端供应链、仓储、物流、售后服务等，在很多互联网观察人士眼里，它越来越像传统产业，互联网人口红利的消失对其产生的影响远远低于来自后端的考验。
在“后人口红利”时代，大公司依靠原有的实力可以转型做平台，而实力较弱的中小公司或将率先充当“炮灰”。在一场生死考验中，他们需要在“差异化竞争”与“甘做大平台上的一个应用”之间，艰难抉择。

description.hltext_display: A good knight, a great christening
description.author: Joanne DavidsonThe
description.content:
/scriptKevin McNicholas. (Special to The Denver Post ) if(requestedWidth 0)}
St. Paul's Cathedral in London, the site of such landmark occasions as Winston Churchill's funeral and the wedding of Prince Charles and Lady Di, is where Judy Fahrenkrog's granddaughter, Heidi Foster, is being christened this month.
And of course she'll be there for it.
Heidi is the daughter of Judy's daughter, Joy, and Joy's husband, Olympic rower Tim Foster. Their access to St. Paul's comes with Tim being a member of the Order of the British Empire; it's customary for Great Britain to knight subjects that have won Olympic gold. Tim and teammates Steve Redgrave, Matthew Pinsent and James Cracknell, took gold at the Sydney Games in 2000 and were knighted the following year. Seen Gallery View more pictures from social events around town in the exclusive "Seen" gallery. Tim and Joy began dating in 2000, when she was studying at the London School of Economics, but eventually parted ways. They met again at the 2008 Beijing Games and he basically proposed on the spot. The family now lives in Lucerne, where Tim is head coach of the Swiss national rowing squad.
Judy Fahrenkrog is a broker for Western Development Group's North Creek development in Cherry Creek North.
A visit with Cloris.
Someone else with a fun trip to talk about is Will Labahn, who just returned from Los Angeles where he was Cloris Leachman's guest on the set of the Fox sitcom, "Raising Hope."
The Emmy-winning actress had donated the experience when she was here last spring for a reception to benefit restoration at the Historic Elitch Theater.
"I had a truly memorable time," Labahn said. "Cloris is absorbed in her new role as Maw Maw, but she was gracious and welcoming, and as funny as could be. Everyone she introduced me to was genuinely interested in the Elitch Theater restoration project. Cloris said in more than one conversation that she is dedicated to helping us in Denver make the project a reality."
An award for Kevin.
Kevin McNicholas has been named 2011 Friend of the National Western and will be honored at a Jan. 13 dinner hosted by the Red Meat Club.
The event is at the National Western Beef Palace Club, where McNicholas, owner of K-M Concessions, has operated the food service for the past 40 years.
The award is given annually to long-standing supporters of the National Western, many of whom make substantial behind-the-scenes contributions to the show's success.
Joanne Davidson: 303-809-1314 or jdavidson@denverpost.com; also, blogs.denverpost.com/davidson and GetItWrite on Twitter

description.hltext_display: 全球IPv4可分配地址剩9千万 预测58天内分完
description.content:
亚太互联网络信息中心(APNIC)首席科学家Geoff Huston 专门为展示全球互联网IPv4地址剩下可以分配的地址数量网站显示，到北京时间2010年12月21日1时28分止，仅剩下约8600万个IP地址(2%)。预测58天内，即至2011年2月20日止，余下的最后7块265大的IPv4地址块将分配完毕,42年前启用的IPv4互联网40亿个地址池中，将彻底分配完，今后全球互联网用户再需要用IP地址，在所有IPv4地址在电信运营商(ISP)手中己经没有备用地址后，只能使用IPv6地址。
这个动态显示数据的网址在：http://www.potaroo.net/tools/ipv4/
目前用户的电脑终端支持系统中，都有可以从IPv4自动跳转到IPv6的设置，因此，在用户使用IPv6上网时并不会有同用IPv4上网时太多的不同感觉。
不过,由于IPv6支持的互联网应用软件开发比较缓慢，因此可能当用户使用IPv6上网时，会发现网速特别快，因为使用IPv6的用户全球仅占5%左右，但是使用像QQ、MSN等即时通讯工具、Outlook邮件都无法使用，因为这些软件厂商还未支持IPv6的版本，因此，也许58天后，全球互联网用户会面临着必须使用IPv6上网时、却必须借助电话系统向这些软件厂商呼叫“还我QQ使用权!”、“还我MSN使用权!”的局面。
IPv4之后的全球互联网IPv6时代就要到来了,我们是否准备好了?!

description.hltext_display: Lohan 'assault' worker dismissed
description.content: A woman who accused actress Lindsay Lohan of attacking her has been sacked by the Betty Ford rehab centre.

description.hltext_display: CBS Network: A Video Pirates best friend?
description.author: digitalhome
description.content:
In this YouTube video, Alki David delivers a stunning attack on CBS Corporation for playing both sides on the piracy front. David tells viewers how the CNET website, a subsidiary of CBS, is distributing illegal file sharing software, as well as DRM cracking software.
David is a digital media entrepreneur currently living in Beverly Hills, CA. In September of this year, he launched FilmOn.com claiming the site was the first high definition internet TV service in the U.S.A. Less than a month later, The Hollywood Reporter reported that CBS, NBC, ABC and Fox filed a copyright infringement lawsuit against FilmOn.com.
Considering the lawsuit, it?s clear that David has a reason to be bitter with CBS and he is fighting back through this video which makes a compelling argument that CBS, through its CNET website could be a video pirates best friend for delivering the various tools and software programs, free of charge, necessary for pirating video.
Discuss this damning video in Digital Home?s .

event_or_fact.property: how the CNET website, a subsidiary of CBS, is distributing illegal file sharing software, as well as DRM cracking software

description.hltext_display: Follow food safety tips for a healthy holiday
description.content:
Christmas is a big, festive holiday. We all try to eat and drink healthful food and beverages, but unfortunately, it's often difficult to stay on a smart eating regimen, especially this time of the year. But keeping things in moderation is the key for you and your guests.
Also, if you are hosting guests for the holidays, ask your friends and family if they have any food restrictions due to medications, allergies or disease conditions. Make sure you read the labels on food items. Your guests will be pleased to see your thoughtful substitutions for their special diets.
Food safety is especially important when planning your holiday spread.
Safety starts first in your kitchen and refrigerator. Try to keep your food in the refrigerator at 40 degrees and in the freezer at zero degrees.
When you see slimy, stinky, spotty or chunky changes in food, it should signal the leftovers have gone bad. Make sure to use the food within the recommended time frame. Food quality depends on the type of raw products, procedures used for processing and the length of storage. Bacteria may get into food through careless food handling, so keep your hands, refrigerator, freezer, storage areas and storage containers clean.
Know the signs
When shopping, look for the following information on the products you buy in the supermarket:
• Sell-by-date: This is the last recommended day of sale, but allows for home storage and use.
• Use-by-date: Tells how long the product will retain top quality after you buy it.
• Expiration date: This is the last day the product should be used or eaten.
• Packaged date: Canned or packaged foods may have dates that tell you when the product was processed.
It is also advised to wash all fruits, vegetables and even packaged greens that are labeled pre-washed to remove chemicals, pesticides and wax. Don't consume food that has been left out more than two hours, cool hot foods to 40 degrees and refrigerate promptly.
Keeping safety in mind and using moderation when it comes to holiday treats will help you through the season of parties and entertaining.
Have a happy, healthful and safe holiday to all.

description.hltext_display: K1 ve K2 Belgelerinde 31 Aralık'a Kadar İndirim
description.content:
Şanlıurfa Başkanı Sabri Ertekin, hafif ticari araçların da arasında bulunduğu, ticari olarak satışa sunulan kamyonet sınıfı araçlar için gerekli olan Yıldızlı K1 ve K2 yetki belgelerinin 31 Aralık 2010 tarihine kadar yüzde 93 indirimle alınabileceğini söyledi.
ŞUTSO Başkanı Ertekin, yaptığı açıklamada, indirim öncesi 6 bin 613 liradan verilen Yıldızlı K2 yetki belgesinin 426 TL'ye 31 Aralık 2010 tarihine kadar verilmeye başlandığını belirtti. Ertekin, indirim öncesi 13 bin 226 TL'ye verilen Yıldızlı K 1 belgesinin ise 925 TL'ye verildiğini ifade etti. Ertekin, Şanlıurfa üyelerinin mağduriyet yaşamamaları için bu fırsatı değerlendirmelerini istedi. Ertekin, 3,5 tonun altındaki kamyonetler için gerekli olan Yıldızlı K1 ve Yıldızlı K2 yetki belgelerini henüz alamayanların acele etmelerini istedi.
YÜZDE 93 İNDİRİM FIRSATINI KAÇIRMAYIN
Her iki belgenin de ŞUTSO'dan alındığını vurgulayan Ertekin, şehir içi eşya taşımacılığı yapanlara Yıldızlı K1, sadece kendi esas iştigal konusunda faaliyet gösteren firmalara Yıldızlı K2 belgesi verildiğini hatırlattı. Üyelerinin bu önemli fırsattan yaralanmasını istediklerini ifade eden ŞUTSO Başkanı Ertekin, 1 Mayıs 2010 tarihinden bu yana araçlara K1 ve K2 belgesinin sorulmaya başlandığını söyledi. (Cihan Haber Ajansı) 50 dakika önce.. [2430002]

description.hltext_display: Japan forecasts GDP growth to slow in 2011
description.content:
The pace of Japan's economic growth will halve in fiscal 2011 from this year as a stimulus-driven shopping rush eases and exports fall on a strong yen and softer demand, the government said Wednesday.
In its outlook report, the Cabinet Office also said consumer prices will stop falling but will not rise, dealing a blow to Prime Minister Naoto Kan's stated goal of ending deflation in the year.
Recent year-on-year falls in the consumer price index will halt in the middle of next year, the Cabinet Office said, but suggested this would not represent the defeat of chronic deflation in the economy.
Growth is forecast to slow to a real 1.5 percent from 3.1 percent in this year, the government said in its outlook report.
Government stimulus measures helped boost domestic production and consumption in the current year, including subsidy programmes for purchases of environmentally friendly vehicles and appliances.
Japan's economy grew 4.5 percent in the July-September quarter, amplified by a rush by car buyers to use expiring subsidies and smokers who stocked up on cigarettes ahead of a tax hike during the period.
The hottest summer on record also drove sales of items such as air conditioners, helping spur growth in the quarter. Private consumption accounts for around 60 percent of gross domestic product.
However, analysts warn of a contraction in the fourth calendar quarter as the removal of such one-off factors highlights Japan's exposure to a weakening export picture and slow domestic demand.
Recent data has shown a slump in industrial output, especially among carmakers, as well as weakening consumer confidence as such incentive programmes come to an end.
The economy remains mired in crippling deflation, as falling prices prompt consumers to hold off on purchase decisions in the expectation of further price drops, clouding future corporate investment.
Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading of a 9.1 percent increase fell short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
"The pick-up in the year-on-year growth rate of exports in November may look encouraging but exports are heading for a big quarterly fall," noted research consultancy Capital Economics.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing".
The central bank in October forecast that the country's economy would expand 2.1 percent in the fiscal year ending in April, and 1.8 percent in 2011.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession.
Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, at nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions.
Consumer spending growth is expected to slow next year to 0.6 percent from 1.5 percent this year.
However, the government forecast unemployment to continue to slowly improve, with the jobless rate expected to fall in the fiscal year starting April to 4.7 percent from 5.0 percent currently.

description.hltext_display: Witt to attend signing of 'don't ask' repeal
description.content:
Barack Obama (596)
Ronald B. Leighton (2)
Subjects:
Military affairs (114)
Military and defense (393)
Human rights and civil liberties (434)
Social issues (1436)
Social affairs (2741)
Government and politics (5231)
Places:
District of Columbia (214)
Washington (857)
United States (23509)
North America (23699)
SEATTLE — A Washington state flight nurse who sued to win reinstatement to the Air Force is planning to be there when President Barack Obama signs a repeal of "don't ask, don't tell."
Maj. Margaret Witt, of Spokane, was discharged just short of retirement after the Air Force learned she had been in a relationship with a civilian woman. She sued, and in September U.S. District Judge Ronald Leighton in Tacoma found that her dismissal was unconstitutional because it advanced no legitimate military interest.
He ordered that she be reinstated as soon as possible.
The state chapter of the American Civil Liberties Union, which represents Witt, says she flew to Washington, D.C., on Tuesday and will attend the ceremony on Wednesday.
Witt says she's excited to be there for all of those who can't be.
She expects to rejoin the Air Force Reserve early next year.

description.hltext_display: 美机构评今年十大互联网事故：维基解密上榜
description.content:
北京时间12月22日消息，据国外媒体报道，美国网站监测机构Royal Pingdom日前评出2010年年度十大互联网事故。以下是十大事故排名：
1. 维基百科数据系统崩溃
今年3月，维基百科在全球范围内遭遇系统崩溃长达几小时。
2. WordPress.com博客网宕机
在今年2月中旬，WordPress网站崩溃110分钟，这是该网站四年以来最大一次事故。
3. Gmail服务多次中断
Gmail邮箱服务在今年内遭遇多次服务中断事故，包括在今年2月发生的2个半小时检修，3月份发生的长达36小时服务中断，以及9月份2小时的宕机事故。
4. 互联网流量绕道中国电信
今年4月，全球近15%互联网流量数据在18分钟内跳转至中国电信服务器。
5. Twitter网站在世界杯期间崩溃
Twitter今年发展迅速，微博成为流行现象。但在世界杯期间，Twitter网站因不堪流量负荷出现短暂崩溃。
6. Facebook回复系统故障
今年9月，全球最大的社交网络Facebook因回复系统数据超负荷出现宕机2小时，这是Facebook运行4年以来停机最长时间。
7. Foursquare连续两次宕机
今年10月，Foursquare因数据库出现错误宕机达11小时，在第二天又出现停机6小时事故。
8. PayPal支付问题
网络设备故障导致PayPal服务在今年10月中断4.5小时。
9. Tumblr网络故障
美国微博网站Tumblr今年发展迅速。但在12月，网站出现一次长达24小时的宕机。Tumblr网站上1100条微博信息无法发送。
10. 维基解密事件
维基解密网站因泄露政府绝密文件而备受关注。网站在被迫关闭后迁至亚马逊网络服务中，但很快又遭驱赶。维基解密目前已失去Wikileaks.org域名。网站还可以通过其IP地址以及其他2000个镜像网站进行访问。维基解密事件已彻底摧垮该组织网站，维基解密支持者则对亚马逊、PayPal、Visa、MasterCard、EveryDN及其他机构发起黑客袭击。Royal Pingdom在报告中表示，“维基解密事件毫无疑问将成为本年度互联网最受关注事件之一。”

description.hltext_display: Штаб-квартиру ООН эвакуировали из-за утечки нечистот
description.content:
В здании штаб-квартиры Организации Объединенных Наций в Нью-Йорке была объявлена эвакуация из-за утечки нечистот.
Фоторепортажи
21 декабря, 20:30 В Киеве устанавливают обновленный "Биг-Бен"
Видеогалереи
«Санта на продажу». ТРЕЙЛЕР
Как сообщили представители спасательных служб, подозрительный запах был вызван аварией в канализации, к которой привел прилив реки.
Из-за этого инцидента пришлось отложить обсуждение вопроса об ужесточении наказания за убийства по расовым, национальным, этническим, религиозным или языковым признакам.
Сегодня заседания Совбеза и Генассамблеи продолжатся в другом здании.
Напомним, в настоящий момент в штаб-квартире идет ремонт. Пока непонятно, могли ли ремонтные работы стать причиной инцидента. Ремонт в штаб-квартире ООН проходит с мая 2008 года и должен завершиться в 2013.

description.hltext_display: Hypnosis Essay
description.content:
Sample Essay
Words 635
In 1774, Mesmer for the first time observed animal magnetism when he watched the priest apply magnets to the bodies of persons suffering from different illnesses. Mesmer built on ancient Masonic concepts of illness being evidence within the individual of an imbalance of a universal fluid. The induction of convulsive attacks, or crises, created a healthy redistribution of the fluid. Thus, Mesmer believed the process was physiological but as invisible as electricity and magnetism -- subjects of great interest to scientists of that era. (Knight, 2000)
A century later Sigmund Freud had helped to push hypnosis out of the limelight with his invention of psychoanalysis. There is, however, an intimate connection between hypnosis and psychoanalysis: (Robertson, 1998, Knight, 2000)
Hypnosis theory and practice anticipated much of psychoanalysis. Hypnotic procedures were adopted by the founder of psychoanalysis. In addition, the practice of psychoanalysis induces hypnosis. Clinical Hypnosis
Clinical hypnosis is an astonishingly versatile tool with several applications. For example, hypnosis has been demonstrated to speed recovery from surgery, facilitate healing in burn patients, offer anesthesia for surgical procedures for individuals for whom the chemical anesthesia is hazardous, relieve pain, alter the progress of auto-immune disorders, decrease anxiety, and facilitate the specialized learning process we call psychotherapy. Individuals have been assisted to lose weight or quit smoking using clinical hypnosis. Moreover, aside from specific therapeutic goals, clinical hypnosis and the allied practices of guided imagery and relaxation have been shown to improve immune system function and improve an individual's sense of well-being. (Pearson)
Please visit our website for academic help.

description.hltext_display: What Every Student Should Know: Essay on American Education
description.content:
Sample Essay
Words 2,188
There is a paradigm shift is taking grasp in American advanced education. The New York Times Article by McGrath (2006) shows how Harvard University President Summers has initiated a report which recommends some fundamental changes in the current curriculum for students in such a way that they are able to cope with the changing political and cultural trends at a time when more and more students opt for degrees that are vocational—like business or health professions. This is because a degree in humanities or liberal arts does not lead to a more financially secure career. And although colleges do encourage liberal arts, there is emphasis in a large number of colleges, for all students to take some core courses. The idea of president Summers was similar; he wanted students to have a well-rounded education.
The debate at Harvard though much discussed is not new, historically this debate has been going on for over a century and the courses and the instruction modes have changed and evolved with time and shifts in policies. (McGrath, 2006) the debate is always there as with cultural changes and a shrinking global village the students have to be prepared to deal with it.
The new proposal deconstructs the Core Curriculum followed by Harvard, which is a narrow combination of courses that students have to take. In its place the committee suggests all students have the freedom to take certain number of courses from three diciplines, Art and Humanities, Social Sciences and Science and technology.
Please visit our website for academic assistance.

description.hltext_display: Кои са по-стиснати по празниците - мъжете или жените?
邮箱扩容大战再次打响 万网启动最大规模邮箱增容活动
description.content:
来源:站长网原创 时间:2010-12-22 14:04 字体:[大 中 小] 收藏 我要投稿 分享至微博
时值年末，企业邮箱扩容大战再次轰轰烈烈打响。12月09日网易宣布免费扩容，10日，中国万网高调公布，对商务安全邮、集团邮局S系列免费扩容。据悉，这是中国万网历史上涉及用户数最多，规模最大的一次邮箱大跃进，商务安全邮总空间扩大3倍，集团邮局总空间扩大4倍。因此，吸引了业界的密切关注。
“多操作平台、多信息文件格式、海量数据传输是现今的三大趋势。因此，单一文字的邮件格式已经不能满足用户多变和个性的沟通需求，他们需要包括文字、图像、声音等多格式的沟通方式。在此基础之上，最直接的表象就是对邮箱容量的要求，要求电子邮件具有海量数据传输能力。”中国万网副总裁宋瑛桥告诉记者。
记者了解到，大容量的邮箱空间的好处是一方面可以让企业用户存储更多的邮件，不会出现因邮箱容量不足而收不到邮件的尴尬;另一方面，企业用户可以把大容量邮箱空间当作网络硬盘，上传大文件到邮箱中，比如：视频、图片等等，进行存储和分享，相当于企业用户拥有一个网络上的移动硬盘。不过，记者也发现，近几年，伴随着存储技术的不断发展，众多门户网站以及一些专业企业邮箱运营商纷纷增肥，推出海量邮箱空间产品吸引客户。
尽管，大容量邮箱已经不是什么新概念，但是，业内人士却认为，此次邮箱扩容运动最大亮点是不忽悠，对用户使用价值比较大。本次中国万网的扩容动作，不仅空间扩大，而且在 邮件 数量方面没有任何限制，对用户来讲颇为实用。以往一些邮箱扩容后，号称空间很大，然而与“大”相悖的是，对邮箱内可存放的邮件数量相对较小，比如仅允许保存5千或者1万封邮件，剩余空间即使再大也无法继续保存邮件，更要命的是用户一旦邮件数量存储达到限制，就会产生丢信等现象。这对于企业用户来说，相当致命，很可能造成严重的损失。
另对此次邮箱扩容运动，有人士认为;此举为2011年企业邮箱市场激烈争夺战的预演，据第三方统计显示，预计2008至2012年，中国企业邮箱的产业规模年复合增长率将达到23%，2012年将达到13亿人民币，目前发达国家企业邮箱的普及率已高达60%以上，而国内市场这一数字仅为10%，发展潜力巨大。由此可见，此次升级行动将给目前的市场留下更多想象空间。

description.hltext_display: Mannheimer Swartling has advised DocMorris on IT outsourcing agreement with Logica
description.content:
DocMorris Pharmacies (Admenta Sverige AB) has signed an agreement with Logica Sverige AB regarding outsourcing of IT services for their pharmaceutical business.
Admenta is a subsidiary within the Celesio Group, a world leading actor on the healthcare, medical and pharmaceutical market. The DocMorris pharmacies are currently situated on approximately 50 different locations throughout Sweden and are expanding on the Swedish market.
Admenta was advised by Mannheimer Swartling. The firm’s team was led by Niklas Bogefors, primarily assisted by Julia Brugge.

description.hltext_display: Renewal civil war in Ivory Coast feared
description.content:
United Nations Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon has warned there is a "real risk" of a return to civil war in Ivory Coast in the wake of the disputed presidential election.
Mr Ban says the incumbent, Laurent Gbagbo, is illegally trying to expel the UN's peacekeeping force after it recognised Alassane Ouattara as victor in the recent presidential election.
Incumbent Ivorian president Laurent Gbagbo at a news conference last month.
PHOTO: AFP
In his first television address since the poll Mr Gbagbo stressed his legitimacy, while offering to let a panel representing international powers examine the results of the election.
"I won the election with 51.45% of vote," he said. "I am the president of the Republic of Ivory Coast. I thank Ivorians for renewing their trust in me."
Mr Gbagbo said Mr Ouattara could leave the Golf Hotel in Abidjan, where he has set up his headquarters, protected by the UN, and go where he likes.
But the BBC's correspondent in Abidjan says roads leading to the hotel have been blocked and no supplies have been received for days.
Ban worried about UN mission
In a speech to the UN General Assembly on Tuesday, Mr Ban said he was worried about UNOCI, the 10,000-strong mission in Ivory Coast.
He said that any attempt to "starve the United Nations mission into submission" would not be tolerated, and warned those who perpetrated such acts would be held accountable under international law.
The election, delayed for five years, was supposed to reunify the world's largest cocoa producer, which has been divided since 2002.
But the UN says at least 50 people have been killed in violence linked to the dispute over who won the election.
Copyright © 2010, Radio New Zealand

description.hltext_display: Bank to put New Center's Hotel St. Regis up for auction Jan. 13
description.content:
After being in receivership since 2009, the Hotel St. Regis in Detroit's New Center may have a new owner by next month.
The hotel is being put up for auction on Jan. 13 by the bank that owns the hotel after its original owners defaulted.
Metro Detroit's hotel industry has been rocked by the local and national slowdown in business travel, a trend which has pushed sale prices to record lows.
That's why Barry Lefkowitz, receiver for the 225-room hotel, said he's not sure what kind of offers are going to come in or what price point the hotel will sell for.
"We're just going to see what interest is out there," he said. "There's no opening bid, but the bank has the right to refuse any offer."
Photo courtesy of The CoStar Group
The hotel was re-opened to much fanfare in 2007 after the once-posh location was re-developed by a group of local investors led by real estate developer Herb Strather.
In February, 2009 the hotel went into default with its original lender, Chicago-based ShoreBank Corp.
ShoreBank, however, was shut down in August, with much of its $2.2 billion assets and $1.5 billion in deposits bought by a new entity, Urban Partnership Bank. Urban Partnership, through that deal, acquired the hotel, and is now attempting to sell it.
During its time in receivership, the St. Regis has been a steal for overnight stays in Detroit. The hotel's stated rate is $89, though rooms have gone for $30 to $40 on discount hotel websites.
Lefkowitz, managing director of Southfield-based turnaround firm BBK, said the Jan. 13 auction will be held at 10 a.m. in the BBK offices. A $50,000 deposit is required and must either be wired to him prior to the auction or be in-hand with a cashier's check prior to the auction.
So far, there are three parties that have expressed interest, Lefkowitz said.
But if recent sales are any indication, a high sale price may be hard to come by.
The $11.8 million in local hotel sales in 2010 involved the sale of 625 hotel rooms, or $18,800 per room, compared with 2003, when 772 rooms sold for $65 million, or $84,200 per room, according to data from the hotel group with Chicago-based Jones Lang LaSalle.
The Omni Hotel on Detroit's riverfront was put up for sale for more than a year and was forced to close when no buyer could be found. The former Pontchartrain hotel has been closed for more than a year without a new use.
Well known for setting the bar low on hotel sales is the sale of the former Ritz-Carlton in Dearborn (since renamed The Henry), which went for $3 million. Estimated replacement cost is $100 million.
Lefkowtiz said that given the market, an auction was the best way to go.
"That seems to be the best way to shake out any interest," he said. "But if we can't sell it, we can't sell it."
